suitable discussion concerning the <span class="t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">Divine</span>
Hierarchy. The writer of the article on "Sheep
<span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">without</span> a Shepherd" seems to think the Clergy of
the present <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">day</span> are not much more ready for it.
However this may be, some of them must be ready,
and outside the Church a sufficient <span class="t3 t17 t26 hoverable">number</span> have
been found ready, to justify the <span class="t5 hoverable">full</span> blow of the
teaching which this paper partly embodies. Then,
again, for the last <span class="t15 t23 hoverable">thousand</span> <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">years</span> or so,
humanity has been getting ready for <span class="t1 t5 t11 t16 hoverable">higher</span>
teaching by perfecting its thinking capacity. The
study of <span class="t1 hoverable">physical</span> science has polished <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t26 t27 t29 hoverable">human</span>
brains to a <span class="t23 hoverable">high</span> degree of delicacy. That had to
be done before religion could be levelled up.
Habits of scientific thinking have certainly
paved the <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">way</span> for appreciating the credibility of
occult teaching, better than the mental training
of the theologian plodding in the path of
medieval creeds. A considerable <span class="t3 t17 t26 hoverable">number</span> of <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">people</span>
<span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">thus</span> prepared are ripe for superior enlightenment
- more than ripe: definitely craving for it. It
has become incumbent on the custodians of the
superior <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">knowledge</span> to give out that <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">knowledge</span> far
more freely than was necessary or desirable in
the past. Only as we become possessed of the
<span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">knowledge</span> can we appreciate the obligation. The
further growth of humanity towards <span class="t1 t5 t11 t16 hoverable">higher</span>
conditions of being can only be accomplished by a
humanity comprehending its purpose and potential
destinies. That level of the <span class="t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">Divine</span> Hierarchy
nearest to and immediately above ordinary
humanity has to watch over, guide, and promote
the <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t5 t7 t8 t9 t11 t12 t13 t14 t16 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t29 hoverable">spiritual</span> growth of that ordinary humanity.
As those ready for new conditions become more and

more numerous, the <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">work</span> of those who link
humanity with the hierarchy becomes more and more
important and exacting. The occult student
generally refers to those who are the links in
question as the Masters of Wisdom. The title will
serve for the moment, <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">though</span> we may eventually
adopt a better. Whatever name we use, they are
the immediate agents of Divinity in carrying out
the design in which this <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">world</span> and its
inhabitants play a part, and, as <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">time</span> goes on,
and they have more and more to do in a <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">world</span>
ripening by degrees, their numbers must be
recruited. That can only be done as the more
advanced claimants for <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t5 t7 t8 t9 t11 t12 t13 t14 t16 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t29 hoverable">spiritual</span> enlightenment
are mentally and morally cultivated. The
evolution of a humanity, in fact, is analogous to
that of a single entity. In childhood his growth,
well-being and education depend on others.
Teaching gradually enables him to realize that
his own will and effort must be <span class="t0 t4 t6 t8 t9 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t17 t19 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">brought</span> into play
to accomplish growth beyond a certain stage. His
later development must depend on himself. So with
humanity at large. The evolutionary <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t11 t13 t14 t15 t16 t18 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">law</span> <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t10 t11 t13 t14 t15 t16 t18 t19 t20 t21 t24 t25 t29 hoverable">works</span>
under loftier guidance for a time; but the race
cannot improve beyond a certain stage <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">without</span>
understanding its <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">place</span> in Nature, <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">without</span>
realizing the sublime <span class="t0 t2 t3 t4 t5 t7 t8 t9 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">truth</span> that it must for its
later development guide its own evolution, govern
itself.
We are now at an important turning-point in the
World's history, even as the situation might be
considered <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">without</span> reference to the enormously
significant <span class="t24 hoverable">fact</span> that the super-physical Powers
of <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">Good</span> and <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">Evil</span> are engaged in the fiercest
struggle for supremacy that has ever been waged
in the <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t24 t25 t26 t28 t29 hoverable">whole</span> history of the Solar System. The
issue of that struggle is not in doubt. Beyond
the horrors of the final crisis there stretches
the assured vision of a beautiful future, but its
beauty will be partly due to the continual
expansion of the <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">knowledge</span> which has been
gradually pouring into our <span class="t13 t23 hoverable">hands</span> during the last

thirty-odd years, the ever-growing appreciation
of which is no less certain than the ultimate
defeat of the Satanic <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">power</span> hitherto directed,
among other purposes, to stifle and impede its
dissemination. That defeat accomplished, the
World's progress along desirable paths will
proceed with a rapidity for which no previous
experience has prepared us, and the influence of
that comprehensive <span class="t1 t2 t19 hoverable">view</span> of <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">Nature</span> and <span class="t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">Divine</span>
<span class="t0 t2 t3 t4 t5 t7 t8 t9 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">truth</span> that has hitherto been "occult" - veiled or
partially obscured - will permeate religious
thinking and soon lead to a reconstruction even
of the orthodox clerical presentation thereof, so
that there will no longer be any inclination to
regard that as "litter and dust of the past." The
unseen laws governing the <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">world</span> and <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t26 t27 t29 hoverable">human</span>
evolution, the conscious agencies through which
they are administered, the <span class="t1 t5 t11 t16 hoverable">higher</span> realms of <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">life</span>
intimately associated with the <span class="t1 hoverable">physical</span> <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">life</span> on
the Earth's surface, will all come <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t7 t8 t11 t12 t13 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t25 t29 hoverable">within</span> the
range of <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t26 t27 t29 hoverable">human</span> understanding in a near future and
will <span class="t4 t6 t7 t9 t12 t13 t14 t15 t17 t18 t20 t22 t23 t24 t26 t27 hoverable">bring</span> about such a blend between science and
religion, that each will be regarded as the
complement of the other - the piety of the Church
no longer nonsense in the sight of Science, and
the critical insight of Science no longer a
terror for a Church which will lean on it for
support.

RELIGION UNDER REPAIR: A REPLY TO
PROFESSOR LINDSAY
ENDEAVOURING to frame a crushing "rejoinder" to
my attempt to show that conventional religion is
badly in need of repair, Professor Lindsay,
writing in the Nineteenth Century, provided his
readers with so fair a summary of its contents
that he is entitled to my thanks for bringing
these afresh to the notice of any among them who
may have overlooked their first presentation. But
in failing to appreciate their importance he
shows clearly how minds untrained in the study of
Nature's super-physical mysteries are embarrassed
with prepossessions partly derived from medieval
theology and partly from materialistic habits of
<span class="t1 t2 t3 t5 t6 t7 t8 t10 t12 t14 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t25 t26 t29 hoverable">thought</span> prevalent in the last century. Current
thinking meanwhile has been deeply coloured by
the recognition of some capacities of <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t26 t27 t29 hoverable">human</span>
<span class="t1 t7 t9 t12 t14 t19 t29 hoverable">consciousness</span> that transcend the <span class="t1 hoverable">physical</span> senses.
There are still many amongst us who resent subtle
discoveries outrunning their own experience. What
they can't understand they refuse to believe, and
must be <span class="t3 t13 t18 t24 hoverable">left</span> in the rear of mental progress. But
for those who do not protect their opinions by
carefully guarding their ignorance, some broad
convictions, at all events, are gathering
strength.
Foremost among these is the certainty that there
are avenues to perception over and above those
provided by the <span class="t1 hoverable">physical</span> senses. If anyone now
denies the possibility of clairvoyance, he does
not express an opinion; he merely shows himself
unacquainted with certain developments of
scientific research. Again, while crowds of
blatant assailants abuse the multitudes who know
that they have touch with conditions of <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t26 t27 t29 hoverable">human</span>
<span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">life</span> following on the change <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">called</span> death,
disbelief in that <span class="t25 hoverable">matter</span> where it exists is
merely due to ignorance of the <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">work</span> done in that
department of research. Those who challenge
either of the statements just made are not

entitled to attack a writer who takes them for
granted. The literature dealing with them is
abundant. No one addressing intelligent hearers
concerning any fresh development of superphysical research can be fairly <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">called</span> on to
waste his <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">time</span> in going afresh over the
rudimentary discoveries of fifty <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">years</span> ago. A
modern chemist, writing about the atomic weight
of thorium-lead, does not include in his essay an
elaborate argument to show that the measurement
of atomic weight is possible.
The stream of criticism Professor Lindsay directs
against my exposition of lately expanded teaching
concerning <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t26 t27 t29 hoverable">human</span> and super-human evolution may be
partly summed up in the question "How do you
know?" expressed in various phrases, few of which
offend <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">good</span> taste in their form. But the answer
is embodied in the various books I have <span class="t0 t11 t24 hoverable">written</span>
in the last thirty-odd years, and I do not want
to go over all that ground again. I will
summarize it briefly, recognizing this as by far
the most important question that can be put by
anyone meeting with the later results of occult
research before having grown familiar with the
earlier achievements of that <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">great</span> undertaking.
But in the first instance I am tempted to deal
with some amusing objections levelled by the
Professor against various "assumptions" I have
ventured to put forward as in no need of
elaborate proof.
My remark that occult research anticipated many
of the "conclusions arising from the discovery of
radium" is twisted into a statement that it
anticipated the discovery of radium, and treated
with sarcasm accordingly. The fact, as I stated
it, is simply indisputable to anyone who will
<span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">take</span> the trouble to read the <span class="t1 t4 t7 t15 t18 t20 t27 hoverable">book</span> I referred to,
Occult Chemistry, and observe the date of its
publication. It is obviously impossible to repeat
the contents of that <span class="t1 t4 t7 t15 t18 t20 t27 hoverable">book</span> here. It will be found
deeply significant for all persons interested in

chemical science.
Pantheism! There is some resemblance between the
<span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">true</span> doctrine and the speculation going by that
name, just as there is some resemblance between
metempsychosis and reincarnation, but also all
the difference that there is between a lump of
gold-bearing quartz and a finished gold coin.
Spinoza's pantheism absorbed <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">God</span> in <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">Nature</span> and
<span class="t3 t13 t18 t24 hoverable">left</span> no <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">God</span> behind. Occult pantheism recognizes
<span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">Nature</span> as an emanation of God, but also
recognizes the infinite, supreme, <span class="t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">Divine</span>
incomprehensible Being of omnipotent
<span class="t1 t7 t9 t12 t14 t19 t29 hoverable">consciousness</span> which is God, as losing nothing by
its infusion in matter. <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">Thus</span> occult pantheism
includes Deism while clearing that conception of
its limitations. It is <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">true</span> that almost all the
finished mental products of modern occult
research have been crudely anticipated in a <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">great</span>
many early philosophies and scriptures. The
splendour of their modern presentation is due to
the extraction of the interior <span class="t0 t2 t3 t4 t5 t7 t8 t9 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">truth</span> from the
rough ore - its re-statement in terms of Western
scientific thinking. That is the answer to the
objection that my "theory is as old as
Gnosticism," and to the somewhat inane charge
that "my pretensions to unfold a new and
satisfying cosmic world-view are simply
ridiculous." That which is ridiculous is the
suggestion that in its present <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t10 t11 t12 t13 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t29 hoverable">form</span> - with modern
scientific precision and detail - it can be found
either in Gnostic writings, or even in Sanscrit
Upanishads - with which by the <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">way</span> our Professor
may not be intimately acquainted as he refers
vaguely to "Hindoo philosophy." That phrase might
be paralleled by a Hindoo who should refer to
"the European language" as <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">though</span> there were only
one. It may be in a certain <span class="t0 t2 t3 t4 t5 t8 t10 t17 t19 t25 t26 hoverable">sense</span> <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">true</span> that
"there is nothing new under the Sun," but as <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">time</span>
goes on old ideas get sometimes so embellished by
advancing <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">knowledge</span> that they seem the product of
a new revelation. That is emphatically <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">true</span> of
the cosmology developed now by students of what -

for want of any better term - I have <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">called</span> the
<span class="t1 t5 t11 t16 hoverable">Higher</span> Occultism.
Reincarnation! Our Professor thinks it "has never
found favour in the West." I think it is
commanding the assent of all intelligent <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">people</span> whenever it is understood. Unhappily it is very
widely misunderstood - as by our Professor,
obviously, when he describes it as a paralyzing
doctrine of which fatalism is the natural
outcome. The natural outcome is exactly the
reverse, because it shows each <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">life</span> in turn the
expression of causes <span class="t0 t2 t3 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">set</span> in motion by the freewill of the Ego in former lives. Again, complete
explanation of the real doctrine <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">would</span> claim very
many of these pages. That doctrine is fairly <span class="t0 t2 t3 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">set</span>
forth in my own published writings, but I do not
feel entitled to advertise them here. If anyone
thinks, along necessitarian lines, that acts in
each <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">life</span> are inevitable, and therefore, as
causes, encouraging fatalism, the answer is,
firstly, a contradiction of the assumption
arising from our <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">knowledge</span> of the <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">way</span> Karma is
adjusted by the Elemental agents of the Lipika! I
<span class="t4 t18 hoverable">use</span> technical phraseology for the moment, to hint
that in dealing with the <span class="t1 t5 t11 t16 hoverable">Higher</span> Occultism I am
skirting the confines of an elaborate science.
The <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">words</span> <span class="t4 hoverable">used</span> above will have a definite <span class="t1 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t17 t18 t19 t24 t25 t26 t28 t29 hoverable">meaning</span>
for every Theosophical student, and will, I
venture to think, be quite destitute of <span class="t1 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t17 t18 t19 t24 t25 t26 t28 t29 hoverable">meaning</span>
for the Professor. Secondly, the <span class="t1 t3 t8 t25 hoverable">reason</span> why
incarnation provides for intellectual moral and
<span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t5 t7 t8 t9 t11 t12 t13 t14 t16 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t29 hoverable">spiritual</span> growth and expansion is to be discerned
in the fact, so ill-understood by the
materialistic science of the last century, that
<span class="t1 t2 t3 t5 t6 t7 t8 t10 t12 t14 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t25 t26 t29 hoverable">Thought</span> is a force. Again, that is a statement
that <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">people</span> ignorant of all that has been done in
psychic research during the last quarter of the
last century will not understand, and, therefore,
will foolishly deny. The influence of <span class="t1 t2 t3 t5 t6 t7 t8 t10 t12 t14 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t25 t26 t29 hoverable">thought</span> on
future incarnations has been elaborately traced
in my own and other current books. In <span class="t0 t2 t3 t4 t5 t7 t8 t9 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">truth</span> it
determines their course. And, when understood,

reincarnation becomes not only acceptable but the
only thinkable method of carrying on <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t26 t27 t29 hoverable">human</span>
evolution. Some <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">people</span> are frightened of it,
because they foolishly imagine that it means
their own individuality and <span class="t1 t7 t9 t12 t14 t19 t29 hoverable">consciousness</span>
immersed in a baby form, and miserable in such a
condition. Their <span class="t1 t7 t9 t12 t14 t19 t29 hoverable">consciousness</span> during the baby
period will be on a <span class="t1 t5 t11 t16 hoverable">higher</span> plane in another
vehicle. They will not enter their new bodies
till these are mature far beyond the stage of the
nursery. How can I convey a glimmer of the <span class="t0 t2 t3 t4 t5 t7 t8 t9 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">truth</span>
in a few words? The <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t5 t7 t8 t9 t11 t12 t13 t14 t16 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t29 hoverable">spiritual</span> entity of an
advanced representative of a highly civilized
race may be older than this world. His or her
incarnate personality, in any given case, may be
only a partial incarnation. There is a <span class="t1 t5 t11 t16 hoverable">Higher</span>
Self, the part of the <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t24 t25 t26 t28 t29 hoverable">whole</span> self, on a <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t5 t7 t8 t9 t11 t12 t13 t14 t16 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t29 hoverable">spiritual</span>
plane all the while. Clairvoyants, adequately
endowed, can see the <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t11 t13 t14 t15 t16 t18 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">law</span> at work. Mesmeric
practice will often enable one to get touch
through a personality with his or her <span class="t1 t5 t11 t16 hoverable">Higher</span>
Self, and <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">thus</span> not merely verify its <span class="t11 t16 hoverable">existence</span>
but acquire voluminous information concerning the
conditions of the super-physical realms of
<span class="t1 t7 t9 t12 t14 t19 t29 hoverable">consciousness</span> belonging to this world. These
become so familiar to the qualified occult
investigator, that current discussions as to
<span class="t10 t12 t16 t20 t21 t25 t26 t27 hoverable">whether</span> they do really exist or not are more
ludicrous in his sight than the outsider who
never concerns himself with such inquiries can
easily imagine. And students of occultism will be
even more amused by the Professor's criticism to
the effect that their studies throw "no <span class="t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">light</span> on
the problems of <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">life</span> and consciousness." Their
literature is saturated with ethical teaching of
an exalted order, which bears on every imaginable
problem of <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">life</span> and consciousness. Some
Theosophical writers, indeed, are so dominated by
the <span class="t1 t2 t3 t5 t6 t7 t8 t10 t12 t14 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t25 t26 t29 hoverable">thought</span> that nothing matters except the
cultivation of the loftiest moral virtues, that
they are less interested in the <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">knowledge</span>
concerning the previously hidden mysteries of
<span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">Nature</span> which it has been my special business to

unveil as far as possible. To say that the <span class="t1 t5 t11 t16 hoverable">Higher</span>
Occultism, which embraces or includes Theosophy,
does not concern itself with moral problems,
<span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">would</span> be like saying that the branch of science
<span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">called</span> Physics does not concern itself with
electrical phenomena.
So now let me turn to the supremely important
question Professor Lindsay puts impressively with reference to a statement I made about Venus
and Mercury - "How does he know?" Quite
unconsciously he answers his own question when,
intending to be satirical, he says: "Mr. Sinnett
<span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">would</span> appear to have sources of information not
generally available." Precisely so. I first came
into touch with those sources of information in
the year 1879, and a year or <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">two</span> later wrote a
book, The Occult World, fully detailing the
circumstances under which I obtained that touch,
and some of the intellectual results that ensued
from it. That touch has been maintained to the
present day, and it is hugely important that the
consequent authenticity of Theosophical and
Occult teaching should be properly appreciated.
Explanation of the reasons which led many of us
to trust them in the beginning, and of
experiences confirming that trust in later years,
is <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">thus</span> due not so much to any casual critic
exhibiting hostile incredulity, as to the everincreasing multitudes who are sympathetically
attracted to occult teaching on its own inherent
merits. Already the Theosophical Society, which
does not by any means exhaustively comprehend the
vast movement of Theosophical thought, numbers according to last year's general report - 989
distinct branches or "Lodges" all over the world,
with 26,280 members, leaving "enemy countries"
out of account. In the interest of these - now
constituting the <span class="t2 t3 t5 t10 t12 t18 t19 t21 t24 t25 t26 t27 hoverable">second</span> generation of
theosophical members, for I am almost the only
survivor of quite the first generation - as <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">well</span>
as in the interest of the far larger numbers who
will assuredly appreciate Theosophical teaching

as <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">time</span> goes on, it is supremely desirable that
the actuality and <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">nature</span> of that "Occult World"
described (very imperfectly) in my first <span class="t1 t4 t7 t15 t18 t20 t27 hoverable">book</span>
should be correctly realized. All <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">knowledge</span> on
which our welfare depends must be constantly
<span class="t0 t4 t6 t8 t9 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t17 t19 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">brought</span> up to date. A conviction once definitely
and justly established in the <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">mind</span> ought never to
fade, but for many <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">people</span> such convictions
require to be refreshed from <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">time</span> to time. So, in
reply to an inquiry, which on its own merits
alone need not perhaps have claimed very earnest
treatment, but may have a dull, wide echo if
undealt with, I shall venture to explain once
more "how I know" and what are my sources of
information.
The <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">great</span> developments, as far as they concerned
myself, began in 1879, and, <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">though</span> the Professor
thinks that Mme. Blavatsky and the Mahatmas are a
little démodé, the events of that period paved
the <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">way</span> for supremely important results. As
anyone who will read my first <span class="t1 t4 t7 t15 t18 t20 t27 hoverable">book</span> will see, Mme.
Blavatsky exercised abnormal powers. It is futile
to suggest that later on she was accused of
practising imposture. These accusations related
to events occurring <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t24 t26 t27 t29 hoverable">long</span> after I <span class="t3 t13 t18 t24 hoverable">left</span> India. They
are scorned by the multitudes who still reverence
her memory, but it is not my business to deal
with them. The record of her magical doings which
I put forward has never been challenged. Nor can
it be challenged except on the hypothesis that I
am not telling the truth. If <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">things</span> occurred
under the circumstances I describe, no possible
theory can be framed to <span class="t3 t4 t5 t7 t8 t10 t12 t16 t19 t21 t24 t25 t26 t29 hoverable">account</span> for them except
the theory that she exercised <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">power</span> over forces
of <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">nature</span> as <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">yet</span> unknown to science, producing
effects that were a defiance of conventional
beliefs relating to the natural laws governing
matter. No critics of my story accuse me of
intentional falsehood. They <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">would</span> be laughed at
by the large <span class="t3 t17 t26 hoverable">number</span> who know me of they did. They
may accuse me of having been deceived, but that
accusation falls to the ground for all who read

my records, because, if <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">things</span> happened as I
describe them, there was no room for deception.
That position could only be established afresh by
a tedious recapitualtion of definite occurrences,
and it is useless for critics to assail it unless
they will refer to the original statements and
show how, under the circumstances, there was room
for imposture. For the moment I must be content
to repeat that such showing is impossible. I was
far more deeply interested at the <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">time</span> than
anyone can be now, in eliminating from the
experiments I made all possibility of fraud.
Anyhow the result was that I came to know that
Mme. Blavatsky exercised, or was the agent
through whom were exercised, super-normal powers.
That made me inclined to listen to her statement
as to how such powers were obtained. The
statement was to the effect that they were a
relatively feeble reflection of mightier powers
and wider <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">knowledge</span> possessed by certain <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">men</span> whom
she had personally known - members of a <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">great</span>
Brotherhood representing a <span class="t1 t5 t11 t16 hoverable">higher</span> stage of <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t26 t27 t29 hoverable">human</span>
evolution than had been attained by the foremost
even of those representing the progress of
scientific <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">knowledge</span> in the open <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">world</span> at large.
This statement, <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">though</span> striking and impressive,
did not seem to me incredible. Why should <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t26 t27 t29 hoverable">human</span>
perfectibility after crossing such gulfs as those
which separate our greatest exponents of
intellectual evolution - Faraday, Newton,
Copernicus, Pythagoras, etc., etc. - from the <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">man</span>
in the street (not to <span class="t9 t11 t20 t21 t22 t23 t27 hoverable">speak</span> of the savage), why
should it stop short at the stage represented by
the names quoted? Nor was any mental difficulty
involved in the idea that still loftier stages
had to do with <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">knowledge</span> - and powers ensuing
from it - that could not desirably be diffused
through the <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">world</span> at large in its present stage
of development. That is obvious, and it accounted
for the reserve and seclusion of the advanced
"Masters of Wisdom," or, to <span class="t4 t18 hoverable">use</span> the favourite

Eastern term, "the Mahatmas." When I began to
write about them, shallow-minded readers fastened
on a story which lent itself to derision, while
more intelligent listeners in large numbers began
to think seriously of "Theosophy," the
comprehensive term assigned to the new views of
natural philosophy opening out before us.
Satisfied myself (to go back to the beginning)
that the exponents of the <span class="t1 t5 t11 t16 hoverable">higher</span> <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">knowledge</span> must
exist, I was eager to get into touch with them and succeeded. First a protracted correspondence
began. How did letters <span class="t6 t9 t13 t15 t17 t18 t23 t28 t29 hoverable">pass</span> between myself and
unknown correspondents, in Himalayian seclusion?
But that <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">time</span> I knew (see The Occult World) that
occult <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">power</span> could transport <span class="t1 hoverable">physical</span> objects
through space. I found that the "Master" could
"take" my letters by means unfamiliar to the
post, could give me the answers in strange and
unexpected ways. But the "wonder" of this grew
gradually subordinate to the importance of the
communications themselves. Moreover, it was
eclipsed by personal experiences of a supernormal character that put me in closer touch with
the Occult <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">World</span> than that established by the
correspondence. I am now merely sketching the
course of events. To describe them in detail
<span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">would</span> mean re-writing some of my books, but the
sketch will, at any rate, suggest the <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">nature</span> of
those "sources of information" which are <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t7 t8 t11 t12 t13 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t25 t29 hoverable">within</span>
my reach, <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">though</span> "not generally available." And a
moment's reflection will show how reasonable it
is to believe that the "Masters" (to <span class="t4 t18 hoverable">use</span> the
Western equivalent for the Indian <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">word</span> Mahatma)
are able, if willing, to give such information
concerning the other planets of the Solar System
and its general design as that which I made <span class="t4 t18 hoverable">use</span>
of in my former article¹ for the Nineteenth
Century, and in many books. Common <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">knowledge</span> here
amongst us relating to the capacities of our own
clairvoyants (though there are <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">people</span> claiming to
be cultured who remain absolutely ignorant of
them) shows us the <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">way</span> in which senses finer than

the familiar five will reveal what is going on at
<span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">great</span> <span class="t1 hoverable">physical</span> distances. Developed by Masters of
super-physical science is it surprising that they
should reach out to other worlds of our system?
_____________
¹ See Nineteenth Century and After, September 1917, pp.
536, 537.

Again, amongst us everyone following the progress
of modern psychic research will know that it is
possible for the <span class="t1 t7 t9 t12 t14 t19 t29 hoverable">consciousness</span> (Soul, Ego, <span class="t3 t11 t18 t27 hoverable">call</span>
it what you like) to <span class="t6 t9 t13 t15 t17 t18 t23 t28 t29 hoverable">pass</span> out of the <span class="t1 hoverable">physical</span>
<span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">body</span> for a <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">time</span> during life, to bid a conscious
good-bye to the <span class="t1 hoverable">physical</span> <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">body</span> <span class="t3 t13 t18 t24 hoverable">left</span> asleep, and
roam the spaces of the "astral" <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">world</span> immediately
around us, bringing back recollection of such
excursions when resuming the <span class="t4 t18 hoverable">use</span> of the <span class="t1 hoverable">physical</span>
body. And during such excursions it may be
possible, for those permitted, to have speech
with Masters, as <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">well</span> as with lesser <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t26 t27 t29 hoverable">human</span>
entities who have gone through the change <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">called</span>
death, and <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">thus</span> learn lessons of priceless
interest.
There are indeed other ways of gathering in such
teaching, and these have been to some extent at
my service since the far-away <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t6 t9 t10 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t27 t28 hoverable">days</span> of the
beginning that I have been describing, up to the
present time. I am now in a position to deal,
much more definitely than then, with the
functions of the Masters in connection with the
government of the <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">world</span> and of the stupendous
<span class="t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">Divine</span> Hierarchy to which they belong.
Vast numbers among us are ripe now to appreciate
this revelation, <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">though</span> other vast numbers are
still intellectually cramped by conventional
prejudice from which they cannot escape, and it
is to those <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">thus</span> ripe that I venture to address
what remains to be said, rather than to
assailants impatient with the disturbance of
their cherished limitations.

The condition described as Mastership can only be
attained by the sanction of still <span class="t1 t5 t11 t16 hoverable">higher</span>
authority, when the moral and <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t5 t7 t8 t9 t11 t12 t13 t14 t16 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t29 hoverable">spiritual</span> evolution
of the being in question has reached a condition
which I have described in an earlier writing as
follows:
When he is in a position to survey the <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t24 t25 t26 t28 t29 hoverable">whole</span> process on
which the <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t26 t27 t29 hoverable">human</span> family is launched, from its beginning in
the remote past to its conclusion in the almost
immeasurably distant future; when all the natural laws
and forces which play around it lie <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t7 t8 t11 t12 t13 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t25 t29 hoverable">within</span> his
comprehension and grasp, <span class="t10 t12 t16 t20 t21 t25 t26 t27 hoverable">whether</span> they are operative on
the <span class="t1 hoverable">physical</span> plane with its wonderful complexity of
molecules and forces, or on those other planes invisible
to ordinary sight which interpenetrate it or surround it
and are more bewildering in their complexity still; when
all the myriad enigmas of <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">good</span> and evil, of <span class="t0 t9 t11 t14 t17 t28 hoverable">sin</span> and
sorrow, and hope, are resolved into intelligible meaning,
and neither the <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">earth</span> below, nor the heavens above, nor
life, nor death, hold any riddles from his understanding,
the Adept is qualified to attain the final rank in the
vast concatenation of progress we have been surveying.

Concurrently with the advance in <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">knowledge</span> and
<span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">power</span> <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">thus</span> suggested, the <span class="t0 t2 t5 t7 t12 t17 t19 t20 t27 t29 hoverable">Master</span> has been
correctly described by another writer as
necessarily endowed with "perfect compassion, an
absolutely selfless devotion to the welfare of
all sentient beings, and a boundless <span class="t0 t2 t5 t7 t8 t13 t15 t17 t18 t21 t22 t23 t26 t27 t28 hoverable">love</span> and
fellow-feeling for them all." It has been my
privilige in recent <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">years</span> to pick up some bits of
information concerning former lives of some among
the <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">great</span> Masters, and these have illustrated
what the writer just quoted meant by absolute
selflessness, in a <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">way</span> that has thrilled me with
emotion, <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">though</span> on a <span class="t1 t5 t11 t16 hoverable">higher</span> level self-sacrifice
is <span class="t7 t10 t12 t26 hoverable">taken</span> as a <span class="t25 hoverable">matter</span> of course. How, it may be
asked, can a being on the Master's level be in a
position to incur self-sacrifice? If his <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">body</span> is
menaced by injury or destruction, he can quit it
at will and assume a new incarnation if he
chooses. Undoubtedly; but <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">though</span> he may have been

doing that at intervals (very protracted
intervals) for a <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t24 t26 t27 t29 hoverable">long</span> series of ages, he may
sometimes as a definite duty, to fulfil some
peculiar purpose, <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">take</span> quite a humbler or
commonplace incarnation in the ordinary world. He
will never in such cases be known as a <span class="t0 t2 t5 t7 t12 t17 t19 t20 t27 t29 hoverable">Master</span> in
the ordinary world, but he may, for reasons
connected with the welfare of other people,
choose to remain with them and die, even a
painful <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t29 hoverable">death</span> in the ordinary way, <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">though</span> he
might had he chosen have slipped out of the <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">body</span>
<span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">without</span> incurring the least inconvenience, or, as
Apollonius of Tyana is said to have done when
before Domitian, vanish from sight and remove
himself from danger by occult means. Nor indeed
does the mere exchange of one <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">body</span> for another
mean any trouble for the Adept of <span class="t0 t2 t5 t7 t12 t17 t19 t20 t27 t29 hoverable">Master</span> rank. He
can keep any one going for periods measured in
centuries that dazzle our imagination, but in the
course of ages may <span class="t11 t12 t22 t25 t27 hoverable">find</span> it convenient to <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">take</span> new
ones from <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">time</span> to time. And this <span class="t1 t2 t3 t5 t6 t7 t8 t10 t12 t14 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t25 t26 t29 hoverable">thought</span> alone is
one which will help to dissipate the erroneous
notion prevalent in the beginning of the
Theosophical movement, to the effect that there
was something especially Eastern in the <span class="t1 t5 t11 t16 hoverable">higher</span>
Adeptship. The <span class="t0 t2 t5 t7 t12 t17 t19 t20 t27 t29 hoverable">Master</span> of Occultism is bound by no
limitations of nationality, will be sometimes in
an Eastern as often in a Western incarnation. He
belongs to the World! not to any single section
of its people, however large that section may be.
The main idea in relation to the Masters that I
want to enforce is this: they belong to the
<span class="t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">Divine</span> Hierarchy that presides over the evolution
of mankind, and as regards their <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">work</span> in guiding
<span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t26 t27 t29 hoverable">human</span> progress, as definitely as they are able,
are absolutely at one, in <span class="t1 t2 t3 t5 t6 t7 t8 t10 t12 t14 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t25 t26 t29 hoverable">thought</span> and intention,
with the still <span class="t1 t5 t11 t16 hoverable">higher</span> agents in that sublime
hierarchy. They may not always <span class="t11 t12 t22 t25 t27 hoverable">find</span> it possible
to steer humanity exactly as they <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">would</span> wish. We,
in this life, collectively constitute a craft
that often fails to answer to the helm. And, as I
endeavoured to explain in a former article

entitled "Our Unseen Enemies and Allies," ¹ we
are terribly mixed up with inimical agencies bent
<span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">upon</span> interfering with the <span class="t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">Divine</span> purpose at every
available opportunity. If it were not for the
ceaseless, untiring efforts of our unknown
protectors to shield us from the consequences of
such attacks, the civilization of the world, the
further evolution of the <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t24 t25 t26 t28 t29 hoverable">whole</span> <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t26 t27 t29 hoverable">human</span> race, <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">would</span>
be utterly wrecked.
