<span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t26 t27 t29 hoverable">Human</span> Origins), <span class="t0 t11 t24 hoverable">written</span> previously to recent
clairvoyant research, but dealing with the
evidence afforded by geological strata, pushes
back the presence of <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">Man</span> on <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">earth</span> to the Tertiary
period. But a few hundred <span class="t15 t23 hoverable">thousand</span> <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">years</span>
represent a mere fraction of the <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">time</span> since the
<span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">earth</span> was first inhabited by humanity, and not
merely by humanity but by nations of advanced
civilization. The mists that hung at first over
traditions of Atlantis are now clearing up.
Incredulity, scoffing at Plato's story, gave <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">way</span>
at last to the soundings of the Challenger. The
Atlantic bed confessed part of the truth.
Geologists accepted the information and, having
<span class="t3 t13 t18 t24 hoverable">left</span> off laughing at the idea, proceeded to
indicate the exact region in which the last
surviving remnant of the original Atlantic
continent lies now under water. But it was not

the business of the Challenger or the geologist
to describe the inhabitants of either the last
remant or the <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">great</span> original continent. That was
accomplished by clairvoyant research and the
results were duly published, <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">years</span> in advance of
one occasion I remember when a map of the
Atlantic bed was exhibited at a conversazione of
the Royal Society, showing "Poseidonis" (the last
piece of the former continent submerged 9000-odd
<span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">years</span> B.C.) lying under the waves of the present
ocean. Recorded evidence concerning the character
and date of the <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">great</span> catastrophe has been
derived from the hieroglyphics of Mexico and
Yucatan, and fuller information on the subject
has been obtained - in another way. The few among
us qualified to carry on super-physical research
are enabled, by virtue of their abnormally
developed senses, to get in touch with still more
abnormally developed <span class="t1 t4 t8 t16 t21 t25 t29 hoverable">Beings</span> <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">whose</span> progress,
<span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">though</span> they have emerged originally from
humanity, has so far engaged them in <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">work</span> on
<span class="t1 t5 t11 t16 hoverable">higher</span> planes of <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">nature</span> that they are lost to
sight as regards ordinary mankind. But they have
attained to loftier conditions of <span class="t11 t16 hoverable">existence</span>
<span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">without</span> losing their sympathy with humanity of
the ordinary type. To do <span class="t5 hoverable">full</span> justice to the idea
<span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">would</span> mean re-writing books devoted to the
subject, but for the moment it should be enough
to feel that the influences making for variety in
<span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t26 t27 t29 hoverable">human</span> <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">life</span> - that show us an ascending scale
beginning with the savage and culminating in the
<span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">great</span> Masters of science, literature, and art,

exist also.
<span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">Thus</span> clairvoyant research and information
combined enable us to trace the origin and

progress of Atlantean civilization through
periods in the past to be counted not in
thousands but in millions of years. And behind
them again back into other millions during which
the <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t26 t27 t29 hoverable">human</span> form, as we know it, was gradually
developed from lower forms. Indeed, if we go far

points of <span class="t1 t2 t19 hoverable">view</span> we may <span class="t3 t11 t18 t27 hoverable">call</span> already human,
functioning in vehicles of <span class="t1 t7 t9 t12 t14 t19 t29 hoverable">consciousness</span> not <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">yet</span>
entirely physical. But leaving that part of the
story out of account, the information already
accumulated concerning the Atlantean races shows
conventional speculation relating to anthropology

Clairvoyant observation gives us a clear-daylight
comprehension of the actual facts. Commonplace
thinking on these subjects is entangled with
phrases that are utterly misleading - the stone,
bronze, and iron ages; the neolithic and the
paleolithic periods. Flint implements, of course,
have their story to tell. They show that regions
of the <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">world</span> where they are found, at dates
vaguely suggested by geology, were inhabited by
<span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">men</span> of a very primitive type. Very likely. At
early Atlantean periods before civilization had
developed, migrations of early sub-races of
Atlanteans spread all over the world. They slowly
outgrew early conditions <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">without</span> sharing the
stimulating influences operative in the
evolutionary vortex from which they had been
thrown off. Concurrently with a stone age in some
fragments of <span class="t0 t1 t3 t4 t6 t7 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">land</span> emerging from the sea in the
region we now <span class="t3 t11 t18 t27 hoverable">call</span> Europe, an age of advanced
science, of stupendous engineering achievements,
of intricate sociology was in <span class="t5 hoverable">full</span> activity in
the West. As the geography of the <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">world</span> was
shaped anew in some Eastern countries immense
progress was accomplished there. In <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t26 t27 t29 hoverable">Human</span> Origins
Mr. Laing is impressive concerning the certainty
that <span class="t23 hoverable">high</span> civilization prevailed in <span class="t28 hoverable">Egypt</span> <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t24 t26 t27 t29 hoverable">long</span>
before Menes - or the 7000-odd <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">years</span> of Egyptian
history. Certainly it prevailed for hundreds of
thousands of <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">years</span> before then, the direct gift

of Atlantean civilization previous to its
decline.
Perhaps, however, the most deeply interesting
aspect of the <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t24 t25 t26 t28 t29 hoverable">whole</span> Atlantean story has to do
with the moral changes that have gone on in the
<span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">world</span> since that strange period in which the
decline becomes manifest. In their intellectual
perfection the Atlanteans in some ways were
farther on than ourselves. They controlled some
forces of <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">nature</span> we have not <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">yet</span> got commmand of,
and they were past-masters in the arts of
metallic transmutation, which, as a theoretical
possibility, our chemists have only just
discerned. But they had not even got a glimpse of
the moral beauty of unselfishness, care for the
welfare of others, love, in any of its loftier
aspects. Altruism, philanthropy, <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">would</span> have been
ideas for which their language furnished no
equivalent expression.
<span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">Thus</span> we gain a comprehension of <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t26 t27 t29 hoverable">human</span> progress on
the large scale as a series of spiral cycles, in
the course of which we return to previous
conditions, but on a <span class="t1 t5 t11 t16 hoverable">higher</span> level. Modern
civilization is now returning to a stage in
intellectual progress reached by the Atlanteans
at remote periods in the past, but with certain
very important embellishments. Aviation and
transmutation, now beginning to engage our
attention, were, as already said, Atlantean
achievements; but we must resume acquaintance
with them, plus moral progress, in which Atlantis
was sadly deficient.
The limitations of sense, besides obscuring the
past, veil the prospects of the future. Once they
are broken through, the <span class="t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">Divine</span> plan of <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t26 t27 t29 hoverable">human</span>
evolution stretches out before us on a scale of
startling magnificence. Clairvoyance of the
<span class="t1 t5 t11 t16 hoverable">higher</span> <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t29 hoverable">order</span> introduces us, as already explained,
to those advanced leaders of our race described
above as Masters of <span class="t12 t20 t25 t26 t29 hoverable">Wisdom</span> and Knowledge. We are

enabled to recognize them as linking ordinary
humanity with the <span class="t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">Divine</span> Hierarchy. This extends
upwards to infinity, but we touch a sublime <span class="t0 t2 t3 t4 t5 t7 t8 t9 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">truth</span>
in realizing that on what may be <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">called</span> (though
only by comparison) its lower levels, it is
recruited from ordinary humanity. The prettiest
among conventional conceptions of the after-life
show us no more than happy conditions of superphysical existence, dignified no doubt by the
actual recogniton of Divinity. But such beatitude
seems, regarded by ordinary religious teaching,
as a finality. Clearer vision shows the <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t5 t7 t8 t9 t11 t12 t13 t14 t16 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t29 hoverable">spiritual</span>
future as infinitely progressive, and the sublime
conditions attained by Masters of <span class="t12 t20 t25 t26 t29 hoverable">Wisdom</span> merely a
stage of progress: a stage which the majority of
the <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t26 t27 t29 hoverable">human</span> race ought to attain in the <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t24 t26 t27 t29 hoverable">long</span> run,
<span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">though</span> the length of that run is all but beyond
the reach of imagination. As some have attained
it already, many more may do so in the future,
greatly in advance of its attainment by the
majority. The conditions of such relatively rapid
progress are the principal subjects of study for
pupils of the <span class="t1 t5 t11 t16 hoverable">higher</span> occultism. Incidentally in
connection with that study <span class="t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">light</span> is let in on
many regions of scientific research besides those
to which allusion has already been made.
Emerging from the entirely primitive or childish
<span class="t1 t2 t19 hoverable">view</span> of the <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t8 t10 t11 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t21 t24 t25 t26 t27 t29 hoverable">Sun</span> and Moon and starry heavens as
designed merely to <span class="t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">light</span> up the earth,
commonplace modern speculation assigns
inhabitants to some, at all events, of the
planets. And the stars are known to Astronomy as
Suns, probably with families of planets in each
case. That <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">knowledge</span> can be reached by simple
<span class="t14 t24 hoverable">intelligence</span> working with the results of
observation carried out on <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t7 t8 t11 t12 t13 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t25 t29 hoverable">within</span> the limits of
normal sense-perception. The methods of
observation available for the advanced leaders of
our race put them in touch with a new kind of
astronomy that may be <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">called</span> "Vital," as
distinguished from the mechanical astronomy which
deals only with magnitude and motion. Mechanical

astronomy is as different from the Vital as a
mere geography book, just defining the boundaries
of the various countries, <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">would</span> differ from
exhaustive accounts of the <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">people</span> inhabiting
each, their manners, customs, arts and sciences,
their political organizations and their
sociology. <span class="t1 hoverable">Physical</span> observation has shown that
Mars must be inhabited by intelligent and
competent beings, their huge artificial <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t10 t11 t13 t14 t15 t16 t18 t19 t20 t21 t24 t25 t29 hoverable">works</span>
proving this - in spite of tenacious incredulity
clinging in the <span class="t1 t3 t5 t16 t19 t25 hoverable">case</span> of a few astronomers to the
idea that the Lowell's Canals are the offspring
of chance. Vital Astronomy enables us to
understand that the inhabitants of Mars are
linked in evolution with ourselves, the
inhabitants of this Earth, but at an earlier
stage of progress. The various planets of the
Solar System are not disconnected from one
another in their design and destinies, as they
seem disconnected in space. On <span class="t1 t5 t11 t16 hoverable">higher</span> planes of
manifestation - regions of which the imprisoning
senses give us no hint - the immortal units of
humanity, the conscious Egos, migrate at
stupendous intervals of <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">time</span> from some globes to
some others. The plan in detail is much more
elaborate than this rough sketch <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">would</span> suggest,
but it has the intellectual charm of showing the
<span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t24 t25 t26 t28 t29 hoverable">whole</span> system to be one coherent organism. The
planet Mercury is also blended as regards its
vital purpose with the <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t26 t27 t29 hoverable">human</span> <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">life</span> of the Earth,
while already the <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t26 t27 t29 hoverable">human</span> <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">life</span> of the planet Venus
has attained to far loftier conditions than we
here have reached as <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">yet</span> - is, in fact, a senior
evolution as compared with our own, and one in
which humanity is <span class="t0 t2 t3 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">set</span> entirely <span class="t8 t11 t14 t19 hoverable">free</span> from the
limitations of the <span class="t1 hoverable">physical</span> senses. If anyone
mentally still imprisoned in these objects to
this statement on the ground that proximity to
the <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t8 t10 t11 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t21 t24 t25 t26 t27 t29 hoverable">Sun</span> must make Venus and Mercury very hot, the
answer is that while <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">Nature</span> has adapted <span class="t21 hoverable">flesh</span> and
blood to suit (with more or less success) the
climatic conditions of the Earth, it is quite
equal to the task of providing vehicles of

consciousness for climates above our boilingpoint, that can breathe comfortably in an
atmosphere at the temperature of super-heated
steam. Chemistry has still some discoveries to
make, and the composition of liquids that provide
Mercury, for instance, with lakes and rivers
defying evaporation at, say, 300º F. <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">would</span> be very
interesting if it could be ascertained. But less
so after all than the contemplation, possible for
our prison-breakers, of the delightful conditions
of harmony and <span class="t13 hoverable">peace</span> which are the keynotes of
<span class="t11 t16 hoverable">existence</span> on Mercury, and in greater degree still
on Venus.
The hints I have given so far of the <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">way</span> in which
senses - avenues of <span class="t1 t7 t9 t12 t14 t19 t29 hoverable">consciousness</span> - superior to
those we are most of us <span class="t4 hoverable">used</span> to, enlarge our
comprehension of Nature, will naturally suggest
the inquiry how they affect our comprehension of
the conditions each of us encounters when we <span class="t6 t9 t13 t15 t17 t18 t23 t28 t29 hoverable">pass</span>
through the change <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">called</span> death. The answer is
simple. They make the change perfectly
intelligible; they render the region of <span class="t11 t16 hoverable">existence</span>
into which we shall <span class="t6 t9 t13 t15 t17 t18 t23 t28 t29 hoverable">pass</span> after undergoing the
change a pays de connaissance. That is the
foremost discovery with which they are concerned.
Current discussion as to <span class="t10 t12 t16 t20 t21 t25 t26 t27 hoverable">whether</span> we really do
live again - a possibility rendered doubtful for
many <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">people</span> because religious teachers seem to
know so little about it - is sadly ludicrous in
<span class="t1 t2 t19 hoverable">view</span> of the certain <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">knowledge</span> on the subject
lying ready for us only just outside our prison
doors. People, indeed, still <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t7 t8 t11 t12 t13 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t25 t29 hoverable">within</span> them are
already inexcusable if they doubt the main
principle, for abundant information has been
smuggled through to them, and telephones - so to
<span class="t9 t11 t20 t21 t22 t23 t27 hoverable">speak</span> - have been <span class="t0 t2 t3 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">set</span> up <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t7 t8 t11 t12 t13 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t25 t29 hoverable">within</span> the prison walls
which enable us to talk with <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">people</span> outside. But
one must go outside fully to understand what lies
beyond. Dartmoor is big, but England is bigger,
and beyond England lie other countries of
stupendous magnitude. The <span class="t1 hoverable">physical</span> plane is an
extensive region, but regions <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t7 t8 t11 t12 t13 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t25 t29 hoverable">within</span> the

cognizance of superior senses are more extensive
in more than a corresponding fashion. Our astral
<span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">world</span> into which we <span class="t6 t9 t13 t15 t17 t18 t23 t28 t29 hoverable">pass</span> when escaping from the
prison of the senses is an envelope surrounding
the <span class="t1 hoverable">physical</span> globe, but enormous in comparison.
To the appropriate senses it is as solid and
variegated as this. And there are numberless
variations of condition for dwellers in the vast
astral globe. The Earth-life has been <span class="t4 hoverable">used</span> by
some in a manner productive as its consequence of
<span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">great</span> happiness and wide views of <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">Nature</span> - by
others unhappily in ways that entail consequences
of a very different order, with which <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">people</span> who
lead commonly decent lives need not trouble their
imagination; unless, indeed, <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">without</span> any selfregarding apprehension, they want to understand
the sublime harmonies of a <span class="t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">Divine</span> design which
<span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">would</span> be violated disastrously if the ulterior
results of <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">good</span> and bad lives were uniformly the
same. <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">Thus</span> the astral <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">world</span> provides purgatorial
conditions of highly varying intensity, through
which those who have badly misused the
opportunities of <span class="t1 hoverable">physical</span> <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">life</span> must <span class="t6 t9 t13 t15 t17 t18 t23 t28 t29 hoverable">pass</span> before
attaining happier conditions, while, for a very
large <span class="t3 t17 t26 hoverable">number</span> of <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">people</span> who have led fairly
creditable lives, the happy conditions are
reached at once. The study of the <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">way</span> in which
these vary in turn - meeting the needs of the
simply innocent immigrants as appropriately as
they provide for highly evolved entities - the
foremost representatives of earthly <span class="t12 t20 t25 t26 t29 hoverable">wisdom</span> and
achievement - is a profoundly interesting but a
very elaborate study, to subserve which, however,
abundant literature is now in existence.
This, moreover, will enable anyone who wishes to
push the inquiry farther to gather some
information as to the <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">way</span> in which the five
senses may be reinforced by the development of
new ones. In an imperfectly developed condition
there are <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">two</span> organs in the <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t26 t27 t29 hoverable">human</span> brain which,
when fully matured, will respond to the <span class="t1 t5 t11 t16 hoverable">higher</span>
vibrations of certain media in which we are

unconsciously immersed, and convey impressions to
the brain as vivid as those conveyed by the eye
when dealing with objects normally visible. These
organs are the Pineal Gland and the Pituitary
body. In some few cases they are already active;
in some others they might be cultivated into
activity; in the vast majority of cases they are
hopelessly incapable of such development during
the current <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">life</span> of the Ego concerned. Their
development in the next <span class="t1 hoverable">physical</span> <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">life</span> depends on
the extent to which, in the current life, the
<span class="t1 t8 t11 t16 t20 t21 t25 t29 hoverable">person</span> in question devotes thought, study, and
effort to super-physical aspiration, for the laws
governing the growth of <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t10 t11 t12 t13 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t29 hoverable">form</span> recognize <span class="t1 t2 t3 t5 t6 t7 t8 t10 t12 t14 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t25 t26 t29 hoverable">thought</span>
and effort as potent forces contributing to the
result.
Indeed, if we cling to the prison metaphor the
situation is abnormal in more ways than one, for
the authorities are by no means anxious to keep
their prisoners <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t7 t8 t11 t12 t13 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t25 t29 hoverable">within</span> their respective cells.
They must - in obedience to still <span class="t1 t5 t11 t16 hoverable">higher</span>
authority - refrain from actually helping
prisoners to escape, but they do not interfere
with those trying to do so. Prison-breaking, far
from being an offence, is their right - is
regarded as altogether meritorious. Once clear of
the walls the fugitive is never pursued or
<span class="t0 t4 t6 t8 t9 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t17 t19 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">brought</span> back. Authority wishes him well, and
cheers him farther progress. He must, however,
break out by daring and force, not by cunning.
There is a door leading out of the prison into
the <span class="t8 t11 t14 t19 hoverable">free</span> <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">world</span> beyond that is always unfastened.
Any prisoner can push it open and go out that <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">way</span>
if he chooses, but all are put <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">upon</span> their honour
not to attempt an escape that way. And if they
break <span class="t4 t7 t12 t16 hoverable">faith</span> and do so, they are terribly
disappointed, for the door leads out of the
prison, it is true, but to regions in which the
conditions are still more distressing than those
of the prison itself, and there is no short cut
leading out of them in turn. To plod through the
forbidden country may <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">take</span> a longer <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">time</span> than

would have been spent in the prison waiting for
the <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t29 hoverable">order</span> of release, due in any <span class="t1 t3 t5 t16 t19 t25 hoverable">case</span> sooner or
later.
Nor must it be imagined that the period spent in
prison is wasted time. <span class="t1 hoverable">Physical</span> <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">life</span> is, indeed,
subject to limitations trying to the patience of
those who know something about the infinite
realities that lie beyond, but the <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t11 t13 t14 t15 t16 t18 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">law</span> of all
progress defines the <span class="t1 hoverable">physical</span> plane as the region
of Beginnings. No one <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">word</span> precisely fits the
idea; nor does it apply to the beginnings of
Form. <span class="t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">Divine</span> Ideation, Creative Thought, takes
its rise on much <span class="t1 t5 t11 t16 hoverable">higher</span> planes, but culminates on
the Physical. There, individualized
consciousness, <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t26 t27 t29 hoverable">human</span> Egos - working in forms
completed from one point of view, <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">though</span> very far
from perfection as contemplated from another can start on an upward journey. From that <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">time</span>
on, their progress depends on themselves. They
are launched on the upward arc of evolution and
all the limitations accumulated during the
downward arc fall away, or rather are shaken off
as the onward progress is accomplished. The <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">work</span>
of shaking them off is difficult in the
beginning. Most <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">people</span> are imperfectly aware of
the disabilities under which they labour. The
senses have given them a rich and apparently
ever-growing store of <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">knowledge</span> and power. They
are - the foremost of them - proud and content <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t7 t8 t11 t12 t13 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t25 t29 hoverable">within</span> their Palace. The multitude have not even
risen to the appreciation of its opulent
resources. None the less, the Beginning, for
every single Ego of the countless millions, must
be made from the <span class="t1 hoverable">physical</span> point of departure. And
on the <span class="t1 hoverable">physical</span> plane - the prison of my
favourite metaphor - the countless millions will
accumulate and remain until they make it. In that
<span class="t24 hoverable">fact</span> lies the clue to the course that has been
pursued in recent <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">years</span> by agents of the <span class="t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">Divine</span>
Hierarchy who have guided the current outburst of
information relating to the <span class="t1 t5 t11 t16 hoverable">higher</span> destinies
available for mankind, information which

constitutes a feature of ever-increasing
importance in modern civilization. The steps
<span class="t7 t10 t12 t26 hoverable">taken</span> were impossible at a former time. Bigotry
dominated the mental atmosphere. Ignorant <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">power</span>
stamped <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">upon</span> all manifestation of independent
thought. It was only when freedom had "broadened
slowly from precedent to precedent" that a <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">place</span>
was found among <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">men</span> for messengers from a loftier
world. Now the message has been poured forth
through many channels. In varying forms of
expression it is the same in all cases. Look
beyond the perishable interests of transient <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">life</span>
in the <span class="t1 hoverable">physical</span> body. Comprehend the scheme of
infinite magnificence to which you belong. Get
the clear <span class="t1 t2 t19 hoverable">view</span> now attainable of the <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t24 t25 t26 t28 t29 hoverable">whole</span> <span class="t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">Divine</span>
programme. Make the beginning that every <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t26 t27 t29 hoverable">human</span>
creature must make soon or late, and the results
are bound to transcend even the most glowing
anticipation.

OUR VISITS TO THIS <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">WORLD</span>
THE materialist who regards <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t26 t27 t29 hoverable">human</span> <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">life</span> as
beginning in the cradle and ending in the grave
is at all events consistent, <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">though</span> he insults
<span class="t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">Divine</span> intelligence. But <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">people</span> who shrink from
believing in final extinction, and nevertheless
regard each new <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">life</span> as a fresh beginning insult
<span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t26 t27 t29 hoverable">human</span> understanding. They ask us, in other words,
to accept the idea of a stick with only one end.
We can think of a stick with no ends at all, or
anyhow can talk of it as we talk of Eternity, but
to be on speaking terms with Infinitude we must
avoid the acquaintance of futurities that have no
past. Some phenomena - a bonfire, for instance may begin and cease to be, but <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t26 t27 t29 hoverable">human</span> immortality
is an idea that claims in the forward direction
to share the attributes of Duration, and cannot
do <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">without</span> them in the other.
The <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">word</span> "life" needs to be handled with care. If
<span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">people</span> go on living after their bodies are buried
or burned, their presence on the <span class="t1 hoverable">physical</span> plane
is merely an episode in their lives. If these
continue they must, under other conditions, have
been going on before on other planes. Seventy or
eighty <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">years</span> of activity in the <span class="t1 hoverable">physical</span> <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">body</span>
constitute part of a life. Its continuance has
ceased to be a <span class="t25 hoverable">matter</span> of guesswork for the
millions concerned with the simple variety of
occult research described as Spiritualism, and
the current interest in that research is rapidly
rendering the current contempt for it in most
newspapers an illustration of their patient
efforts to represent the greatest stupidity of
the greatest number. A deeper research than that
content with merely proving that <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">people</span> are still
alive after they are "dead" introduces us to the
logical conclusion that they were alive before
they were born, and thus, by stages, to the
inevitable conclusion that <span class="t1 t7 t9 t12 t14 t19 t29 hoverable">consciousness</span>
functioning sometimes on the plane of Nature,
sometimes on another, is never "to one engine

bound," but always cycles round and round. In
hard scientific language this conclusion brings
us up against the doctrine of Reincarnation,
which, sharing the fate of many others, is made
to seem an offence to lofty aspiration by getting
itself profoundly misunderstood.
At first, introduced to the Western <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">world</span> in the
earliest theosophical writings, it captured a
<span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">great</span> array of supporters because, for the first
time, it enabled them to contemplate the
inequalites of <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t26 t27 t29 hoverable">human</span> condition <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">without</span> feeling
that they were incompatible with belief in <span class="t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">Divine</span>
justice. Once could fall back on the theory that
<span class="t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">Divine</span> ways were inscrutable, but it was
comforting to grasp a new idea that prevented
them from seeming, on the face of things, ways we
should personally be ashamed of. Objections were
forthcoming none the less. Spiritualists said our
friends on the other <span class="t6 hoverable">side</span> do not know anything
about the new idea. Others declared that they did
not like this world, and did not want to come
back to it, confident that <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">Nature</span> <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">would</span> not be so
rude as to disregard their wishes. To others,
again, the notion of beginning <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">life</span> afresh at the
perambulator stage was intolerable; and
affectionate parents, mourning a loved daughter,
were horrified to think that on passing on
themselves they might be greeted with the news
that she had been reincarnated in Timbuctoo. From
another point of <span class="t1 t2 t19 hoverable">view</span> the disbeliever declared
that he did not remember having had a previous
life, <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">therefore</span> it was obvious that neither he
nor anyone else ever had done. Objections of
these varied kinds are very amusing to all who
understand more or less completely the conditions
of <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t26 t27 t29 hoverable">human</span> progress through the ages. The friends
of the Spiritualist on "the other side" are
enjoying the freshness of renewed life, the
reunion with others they may have cared for, the
vivid reality of that next <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">world</span> they have
reached; they are no more concerned with further
changes that may lie in the remote future than

boys at a school, <span class="t5 hoverable">full</span> of enthusiasm for cricket,
ponder on problems that perplex the invalid of
sixty or seventy. Nor if they did develop a
premature interest in the remote future could
they readily get information. If they have it in
them to advance to <span class="t1 t5 t11 t16 hoverable">higher</span> levels of the Astral
world, beyond that they touch on first going
over, they will ultimately acquire knowledge; but
even that is not certain unless they have been
tinged during <span class="t1 hoverable">physical</span> <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">life</span> with some aspiration
towards <span class="t1 t5 t11 t16 hoverable">higher</span> knowledge.
A fundamental and deeply important <span class="t24 hoverable">fact</span> connected
with <span class="t1 t5 t11 t16 hoverable">higher</span> <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t5 t7 t8 t9 t11 t12 t13 t14 t16 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t29 hoverable">spiritual</span> progress is hinted at by
what has just been said. The <span class="t1 hoverable">physical</span> plane of
<span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">life</span> is pre-eminently associated with all
beginnings. Its importance in this respect cannot
be overrated. This condition underlies the
principle of Reincarnation, is the root of its
necessity. Spiritualism and other forms of belief
concerning the future <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">life</span> include a vague
expectation that infinite <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t5 t7 t8 t9 t11 t12 t13 t14 t16 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t29 hoverable">spiritual</span> progress is
possible after <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t29 hoverable">death</span> down here. So it is, but the
permanent Ego is not spoon-fed with <span class="t1 t5 t11 t16 hoverable">higher</span>
<span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">knowledge</span> unless he has engendered a <span class="t3 t8 t9 t10 t11 t18 t19 t20 hoverable">desire</span> for
it in his working period on the <span class="t1 hoverable">physical</span> plane.
If he has not done this <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">Nature</span> gives him such
blissful rest on <span class="t1 t5 t11 t16 hoverable">higher</span> levels of <span class="t1 t7 t9 t12 t14 t19 t29 hoverable">consciousness</span>
as he may be entitled to by the <span class="t4 t18 hoverable">use</span> he has made
of his <span class="t1 hoverable">physical</span> opportunities, and then another
<span class="t0 t2 t3 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">set</span> of opportunities in the shape of renewed
<span class="t1 hoverable">physical</span> life. Of course, there are other
purposes to be served by that renewed <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">life</span> to be
discussed later on, but for the moment, in
reference to the first steps in our comprehension
of loftier destinies, Reincarnation may be
<span class="t1 t2 t3 t5 t6 t7 t8 t10 t12 t14 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t25 t26 t29 hoverable">thought</span> of as the system or method adopted by
<span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">Nature</span> for teaching the <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t11 t13 t14 t15 t16 t18 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">law</span> of Reincarnation. At
earlier stages of <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t26 t27 t29 hoverable">human</span> progress the young Ego
has not begun to concern itself with the study of
natural <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t11 t13 t14 t15 t16 t18 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">law</span> - is merely gathering, <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">life</span> after
life, preliminary experience of pleasure and
pain, of right and wrong, of emotion and <span class="t3 t8 t9 t10 t11 t18 t19 t20 hoverable">desire</span>

and their consequences. Does the <span class="t4 t18 hoverable">use</span> of the <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">word</span>
"young" in this <span class="t0 t2 t3 t4 t5 t8 t10 t17 t19 t25 t26 hoverable">sense</span> seem to involve the fallacy
of assigining a beginning to that which has no
end? There is no real inconsistency in the
language used. The essence of the young Ego has
emerged from infinite <span class="t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">Divine</span> life, but at one
period has crystallized as a centre of
<span class="t1 t7 t9 t12 t14 t19 t29 hoverable">consciousness</span> <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t7 t8 t11 t12 t13 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t25 t29 hoverable">within</span> the <span class="t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">Divine</span> life, and in
conformity with laws coming to be understood
develops expanded capacity by degrees. Gradually
and slowly this result is accomplished.
<span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">Man</span> as <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">yet</span> is being made and ere the crowning Age of
ages,
Shall not æon after æon <span class="t6 t9 t13 t15 t17 t18 t23 t28 t29 hoverable">pass</span> and touch him into shape?

But his <span class="t1 t7 t9 t12 t14 t19 t29 hoverable">consciousness</span> may be traced back through
animal and vegetable forms, through solar systems
and nebulæ to past infinitudes of manifestation.
Perhaps a simpler answer than has been given
above might more easily meet the objection of
spiritualists who say that their <span class="t0 t1 t2 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">spirit</span> friends
do not know anything of Reincarnation. Some of
them do! But the <span class="t24 hoverable">fact</span> that some of them deny it
is quite intelligible when we comprehend their
limitations, and unimportant. For most of us
belief in the rotundity of the <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">Earth</span> is not
shaken by the denial of a few who still believe
it to be flat.
When disbelief in the <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t11 t13 t14 t15 t16 t18 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">law</span> of Reincarnation arises
from dislike for the idea, one may first of all
suggest that <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">people</span> who deeply dislike the <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t11 t13 t14 t15 t16 t18 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">law</span>
which brings trouble on those who pick other
people's pockets do not by such dislike divert
its course. But in truth, <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">people</span> only dislike the
idea for want of understanding it. They do not
realize, for one thing, that the force which
gives rise to Reincarnation in each individual
<span class="t1 t3 t5 t16 t19 t25 hoverable">case</span> is a <span class="t3 t8 t9 t10 t11 t18 t19 t20 hoverable">desire</span> on the part of the Ego to
reincarnate. If no such <span class="t3 t8 t9 t10 t11 t18 t19 t20 hoverable">desire</span> were generated, on

the plane of the Ego, after the personal <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">life</span> of
the entity in question has been fully enjoyed or
worked out in the Astral world, and then has
merged itself in the Ego on a <span class="t1 t5 t11 t16 hoverable">higher</span> plane,
Reincarnation <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">would</span> not <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">take</span> place; but the
hypothesis for the occultist is unthinkable. The
<span class="t3 t8 t9 t10 t11 t18 t19 t20 hoverable">desire</span> for such experience is as inevitably
engendered in the Ego when all so far gathered
has been absorbed, as the <span class="t3 t8 t9 t10 t11 t18 t19 t20 hoverable">desire</span> for fresh <span class="t2 t4 t11 t13 hoverable">food</span>
is engendered during <span class="t1 hoverable">physical</span> <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">life</span> in the body,
when previous supplies have been finally disposed
of. This <span class="t1 t2 t5 t8 t10 t16 t19 hoverable">state</span> of <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">things</span> invests the familiar
protest against having to come back to this vale
of tears with a very ludicrous aspect. Even after
eating too much and being for the moment
disinclined for more food, <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">people</span> in general know
that at some future <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">time</span> they will be hungry
again; but, if while suffering from repletion
they declared that for ever and ever they <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">would</span>
detest food, the declaration <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">would</span> be
unconvincing. The advanced Ego knows that he must
come back to <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">life</span> on <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">Earth</span> in <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t29 hoverable">order</span> eventually to
get on. Certainly, by some, a god-like stage is
reached when an Ego may have risen above the laws
affecting ordinary humanity, but <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t24 t26 t27 t29 hoverable">long</span> before then
his lives in connection with the <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">Earth</span> will have
included complete comprehension of all such laws.
<span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">People</span> who criticize them on the basis of
profound ignorance of the <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">way</span> they <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">work</span> have
certainly not attained the condition which might
enable them to be a <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t11 t13 t14 t15 t16 t18 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">law</span> <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">unto</span> themselves.
Of all the misconceptions prompting disbelief in
Reincarnation, the most ridiculous is that which
makes some critics shrink with horror from the
idea of beginning <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">life</span> again in the cradle. They
somehow imagine themselves with their present
elaborate <span class="t1 t7 t9 t12 t14 t19 t29 hoverable">consciousness</span> subject to its miserable
limitations. The <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t11 t13 t14 t15 t16 t18 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">law</span> does not give rise to any
such ghastly absurdity, but to get rid entirely
of the painful delusion in question we have to go
into a closer study of the <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">way</span> the process of
rebirth is effected than was usually possible for

those who accepted the main idea at the first
blush, as accounting for the inequalities of
life.
The method <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">Nature</span> pursues in providing an Ego
with a fresh incarnation shows the absurdity of
what may be <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">called</span> the perambulator objection.
When - <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t24 t26 t27 t29 hoverable">long</span> after the close of the <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">Earth</span> period
of the previous <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">life</span> - the <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">time</span> has come for the
Ego to plunge again into the experiences of the
<span class="t1 hoverable">physical</span> plane, the preparations for this are
very gradual. And they vary <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t7 t8 t11 t12 t13 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t25 t29 hoverable">within</span> a very wide
range of possibility according to the stage of
growth the Ego has reached. But in any <span class="t1 t3 t5 t16 t19 t25 hoverable">case</span> the
child in its baby stage is not an embodiment of
the Ego, or of the last personality in which it
manifested, any more than the sloppy clay
foundations of a new <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">house</span> are already inhabited
by the <span class="t1 t8 t11 t16 t20 t21 t25 t29 hoverable">person</span> who is destined to live in it when
it is fully built and furnished. The
amplification of this all-important <span class="t1 t2 t19 hoverable">view</span> of the
<span class="t25 hoverable">matter</span> may be postponed for the moment, for the
broad <span class="t24 hoverable">fact</span> disposes of the delusion <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">people</span> suffer
from if they think of themselves as enduring the
limitations of childhood when coming back to
Earth-life. Before dealing fully with the gradual
<span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">way</span> in which a new child's <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">body</span> is rendered fit
for occupation by the appointed tenant, attention
may as <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">well</span> be paid to a difficulty of a more
dignified <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t29 hoverable">order</span> than any already noticed. Does
the <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t11 t13 t14 t15 t16 t18 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">law</span> of Reincarnation conflict with the
supremely important aspect of the next world, in
which we think of it as reuniting under happy
conditions the loving friends, wives and
daughters, <span class="t0 t2 t3 t6 t7 t13 t14 t15 t20 t22 t23 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">sons</span> and fathers, torn asunder by
<span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t29 hoverable">death</span> - so cruelly torn asunder as it often seems
to limited vision. Reincarnation no more
interferes with the reunion on <span class="t1 t5 t11 t16 hoverable">higher</span> planes of
those who have loved one another on this one than
our next summer's holiday will be interfered with
by the precession of the equinoxes. That
astronomical process will affect climate in
future, but it need not worry us for the moment.

Nor, indeed, as regards the <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t11 t13 t14 t15 t16 t18 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">law</span> of Reincarnation
need the most far-sighted <span class="t1 t2 t19 hoverable">view</span> of the future
embarrass the conditions - on the Astral plane of those who have loved one another on Earth. On
the contrary it expands to infinitude the value
of that relationship. Other natural conditions
operate at first in the Astral life, and no
<span class="t25 hoverable">matter</span> what intervals of our <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">time</span> elapse between
the passing over of the persons concerned,
experience of Astral <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">life</span> shows that the old look
of an old-age <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">body</span> - reflecting itself for a
brief period in the Astral <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t10 t11 t12 t13 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t29 hoverable">form</span> - rapidly
disappears. As a broad rule <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">people</span> all grow young
again in appearance, after passing over in old

the prime of life, the aspect best worthy of
perpetuation. The few <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">years</span> that for a <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">time</span>
separate the <span class="t1 t8 t11 t16 t20 t21 t25 t29 hoverable">person</span> who dies first from the
beloved other who lingers <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t24 t26 t27 t29 hoverable">long</span> in <span class="t1 hoverable">physical</span> life,
fade into insignificance in the <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t24 t26 t27 t29 hoverable">long</span>
companionship of the Astral life. Then eventually
(after certain developments on <span class="t1 t5 t11 t16 hoverable">higher</span> levels),
those who really care for one another reincarnate
more or less simultaneously, and come into
renewed relationships or intimacies on the <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">Earth</span>
plane. To quarrel with the <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t11 t13 t14 t15 t16 t18 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">law</span> of Reincarnation,
because it separates <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">people</span> who can only be happy
together, is a blunder for which it is difficult
to imagine a parallel. One might as <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">well</span> complain
of the <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t8 t10 t11 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t21 t24 t25 t26 t27 t29 hoverable">Sun</span> for not shining, or of the <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">Earth</span> for
not turning round. Reincarnation is a force that
does not disperse people, but gathers them
together. It does this not merely as regards
loving couples: it unites <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">great</span> groups of <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">people</span>
in sympathetic friendship. Whenever exceptional
opportunities have enabled occult students to
gain <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">knowledge</span> concerning the former lives of
themselves and their friends or belonings,
current intimacies are always found to be the
fruit of similar relationships in former times.
Where some <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">man</span> and woman are found united in this
<span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">life</span> by the beautiful bond of a real mutual love,
they are invariably found to have been <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">man</span> and

wife in repeated lives for thousands of years.
And community of interest in devotion to
<span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t5 t7 t8 t9 t11 t12 t13 t14 t16 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t29 hoverable">spiritual</span> progress links large groups of <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">people</span>
<span class="t1 t2 t3 t5 t6 t9 t11 t15 t17 t18 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">together</span> in <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">life</span> after life. Through the ages
they may scatter sometimes, when individual
attractions draw them off in one direction or
another. They always come <span class="t1 t2 t3 t5 t6 t9 t11 t15 t17 t18 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">together</span> again sooner
or later.
In <span class="t1 t2 t19 hoverable">view</span> of what has just been said it is hardly
necessary to deal seriously with the selfsufficient foolishness of <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">people</span> who contend
that, because they do not remember any former
life, no one has lived formerly. Many <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">people</span> do
remember, as one result of awakening faculties
not <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">yet</span> common to all, and the <span class="t24 hoverable">fact</span> that the vast
majority do not remember is easily accounted for.
The <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t26 t27 t29 hoverable">human</span> race, as a whole, is not far enough
advanced to <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">work</span> with the senses that have been
<span class="t0 t4 t6 t8 t9 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t17 t19 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">brought</span> into activity by a few pioneers of
progress. The cultured minority of civilized
countries, even, is little more than half-way on
along the course marked out for the millions of
<span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">years</span> of <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t26 t27 t29 hoverable">human</span> activity, while, if we strike an
average between an Australian savage and the
President of the Royal Society, the result will
be rather disheartening. And, indeed, <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">though</span> we
may <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">take</span> the holder, at any time, of the exalted
office referred to as one who "stands on the
height of his life," and of <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">life</span> as generally
understood, the occult student at all events
enjoys "a glimpse of a height that is higher,"
and expands his <span class="t1 t7 t9 t12 t14 t19 t29 hoverable">consciousness</span> accordingly. But
apart, indeed, from the <span class="t24 hoverable">fact</span> that the majority
even of cultured <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">people</span> in civilized communities
have not <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">yet</span> developed faculties that enable them
to remember past lives, there is a very <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">good</span>
<span class="t1 t3 t8 t25 hoverable">reason</span> why <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">Nature</span> does not allow them to do so,
at their present stage of progress. Very often
they have complicated "Karma" to <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">work</span> out. They
have done <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">things</span> in past lives that entail
painful consequences in the current life. To be
able in advance, by remembering the incidents, to

foresee the painful consequences impending, <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">would</span>
be an arrangement cruelly aggravating the pain.
For the clear sight of past causes it is much
better that most of us should wait. When
<span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t5 t7 t8 t9 t11 t12 t13 t14 t16 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t29 hoverable">spiritual</span> attainment has cured us of the
tendencies that engender <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">evil</span> consequences; when
appropriate aspirations and acquired <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">knowledge</span>
co-operate, the <span class="t1 t5 t11 t16 hoverable">higher</span> senses (which include the
<span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">power</span> of looking back) will certainly dawn among
earnest students of the <span class="t1 t5 t11 t16 hoverable">Higher</span> Occultism - the
super-physical science of <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">Nature</span> which
illuminates the <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t24 t25 t26 t28 t29 hoverable">whole</span> <span class="t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">Divine</span> scheme for those who
devoted it. There are some who already have these
<span class="t1 t5 t11 t16 hoverable">higher</span> senses in <span class="t5 hoverable">full</span> activity, and can not only
look back on the former lives they themselves
have passed through, but on the companionships
and acquaintanceships of these lives, so that a
<span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">great</span> many others now in <span class="t1 hoverable">physical</span> <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">life</span> are
enabled at <span class="t2 t3 t5 t10 t12 t18 t19 t21 t24 t25 t26 t27 hoverable">second</span> <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">hand</span> to acquire <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">knowledge</span> of
their former doings. <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">Thus</span> we can observe in
actual operation the working of the <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t11 t13 t14 t15 t16 t18 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">law</span> referred
to above, which brings sympathetic friends,
besides those linked by the supreme tie of love,
into incarnation together. In this <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">way</span> I have
been able to identify twenty or thirty of my
present friends and acquaintances, as having
played parts <span class="t1 t2 t3 t5 t6 t9 t11 t15 t17 t18 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">together</span> in former dramas - parts
that have curiously varied in character
sometimes, under Karmic influences of diverse
kinds.
Before examining the method - or methods, for
they vary - by means of which reincarnations are
accomplished, let us glance at the esoteric
necessity for the process. Theologians, by
thoroughly misunderstanding <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">God</span> and <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">Nature</span> i.e., supreme <span class="t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">Divine</span> <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">power</span> and the mechanism of
manifestation - have taught <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">people</span> to think of
the Earth-life and its conditions with disdain
(if they can), and to contemplate an <span class="t20 hoverable">eternal</span>
future of hymns, wings and inferior musical
instruments with as much ardour as the prospect
