conception of <span class="t1 t2 t3 t5 t6 t7 t8 t10 t12 t14 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t25 t26 t29 hoverable">thought</span> as a power. The thoughts
that flew back and forward among readers of the
earlier books gave rise to the Theosophical
Society. A <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t24 t26 t27 t29 hoverable">long</span> <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">time</span> elapsed before the <span class="t1 t5 t11 t16 hoverable">Higher</span>
Powers felt sure that it <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">would</span> last. Many <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">people</span>
imagine that it was founded in 1875. Look back to
the first volume of Isis Unveiled (p. 12 of the
Introduction), and reconsider that impression. It
was not until nearly ten <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">years</span> later that the
<span class="t1 hoverable">Society</span> began to excite real interest in the
Western world, and nearly another ten <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">years</span>
elapsed before it was so firmly rooted that the
Masters could regard it as an accomplished fact.
In the interval between the early eighties and
the early nineties it <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t9 t10 t11 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">went</span> through vicissitudes
that almost killed it outright, but it survived
them, and its <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">life</span> became assured.
Then it was that restrictions, frightfully in my
<span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">way</span> at first, faded away. Certainly the Masters
could not even then give out to the <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">world</span> at
large what are <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">called</span> the secrets of initiation,
but, as far as pure <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">knowledge</span> of natural law, the
course of <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t26 t27 t29 hoverable">human</span> evolution, the conditions of
other worlds and their relations with our own,
the details of super-physical schemes in relation
to rebirth, after-death experiences, progress on
the Path, etc., etc., all these subjects were

thrown open to our inquiries, and the result has
been the enormous expansion of our <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">knowledge</span>
exhibited in writings some of us have been able
to put forth during the last dozen years.
A <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">great</span> deal of important teaching came through
during the latter end of the critical period
before the restrictions above referred to were
altogether swept away. The <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">years</span> from 1885 to
about 1902 were remarkable <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">years</span> in connection
with instruction from the Masters. The early
London Lodge included during those <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">years</span> a <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">good</span>
many earnest and qualified students, among them
Mr. Leadbeater and Mrs. Besant. And I had the
advantage of touch with my own <span class="t0 t2 t5 t7 t12 t17 t19 t20 t27 t29 hoverable">Master</span> through an
appropriate channel. The <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t24 t26 t27 t29 hoverable">long</span> series of London
Lodge Transactions which appeared during those
<span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">years</span> will be seen, by anyone who looks back, to
be milestones on the road leading to the <span class="t1 t2 t5 t8 t10 t16 t19 hoverable">state</span> of
theosophical <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">knowledge</span> at the end of the period
they covered. All they contained has <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t24 t26 t27 t29 hoverable">long</span> since
been absorbed into theosophical literature. Only
for those who may care to trace the history of
our teaching can they have an interest now. The
new series of London Lodge Transactions,
beginning in 1913, are on a different footing.
They have to do with later corrections and
additions to the earlier teaching obtained in
very recent years.
This <span class="t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">light</span> sketch of the history of our
theosophical education will, perhaps, help to
make some embarrassments intelligible. Few
students can be in constant touch with every
fragment of theosophical information that finds
its <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">way</span> into print, and <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">though</span> some of us are
keenly interested in Occult Science - knowledge,
that is to say, of super-physical <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">Nature</span> and its
marvellous machinery of <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t11 t13 t14 t15 t16 t18 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">law</span> - that interest is by
no means felt with the same intensity by all. The
Masters, in my opinion, <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">would</span> be the last <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">people</span>
to wish that it should be the main <span class="t2 hoverable">object</span> of
pursuit for members of the <span class="t1 hoverable">Society</span> in general.

And <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">yet</span> that cannot be attained <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">without</span> some
appreciation of the <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">great</span> <span class="t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">Divine</span> scheme of which
we are a part.
It is desirable that all should absorb as much as
they conveniently can of the magnificent Occult
Science that explains our <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">place</span> in <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">Nature</span> and the
possibilities of our future growth. Broad, vague
impressions on these subjects are, however,
enough to give colour and meaning, so to speak,
to efforts we may all make toward living up to
the ethical teachings from the <span class="t0 t2 t5 t7 t12 t17 t19 t20 t27 t29 hoverable">Master</span> level, the
comprehension of which puts no strain on even the
most humble estimate we can <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t10 t11 t12 t13 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t29 hoverable">form</span> of our
intellectual capacity.

EXPANDED THEOSOPHICAL <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">KNOWLEDGE</span>
FIRST I propose to deal with the <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">great</span> mystery of
Consciousness, one which at the first glance
seems the most unfathomable of any we have to
study; then to <span class="t0 t2 t3 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">set</span> forth, in fuller detail than
has hitherto been found possible, the actual
present condition of <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t26 t27 t29 hoverable">human</span> <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">life</span> on the planetary
chain to which we belong, and thirdly, to show
how our comprehension of the realm immediately in
touch with the <span class="t1 hoverable">physical</span> life, <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">though</span> just beyond
its boundaries, the Astral world, has been
developed to an extent that we never attempted to
reach when Theosophical study thirty-five <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">years</span>
ago was mainly directed towards still wider
horizons.
1. - THE <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">NATURE</span> OF <span class="t1 t7 t9 t12 t14 t19 t29 hoverable">CONSCIOUSNESS</span>
<span class="t1 t7 t9 t12 t14 t19 t29 hoverable">Consciousness</span> is recognized by all physiological
students as a mystery they do not attempt to
explain. We can trace the activities of <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">life</span> back
<span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">though</span> the muscles and the nerves, back to the
brain, but whence came the original impulses in
obedience to which the brain <span class="t0 t2 t3 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">set</span> the nerves to
<span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">work</span> on the muscles? That question is <span class="t3 t13 t18 t24 hoverable">left</span> aside
as relating to a mystery beyond <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t26 t27 t29 hoverable">human</span>
understanding. Nor shall I attempt to clear up
the mystery in the <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">way</span> we can sometimes
accomplish this when dealing with purely <span class="t1 hoverable">physical</span>
phenomena; we must be content to treat
<span class="t1 t7 t9 t12 t14 t19 t29 hoverable">Consciousness</span> as the fundamental <span class="t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">Divine</span> Principle
of all manifestation, but the illuminating idea
which I want to convey, is that <span class="t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">Divine</span>
Consciousness, itself, is, in its nature,
identical with any <span class="t1 t7 t9 t12 t14 t19 t29 hoverable">consciousness</span> of which we can
<span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">take</span> cognizance; that in a <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">word</span> there is only one
kind of <span class="t1 t7 t9 t12 t14 t19 t29 hoverable">Consciousness</span> in all <span class="t1 t2 t3 t5 t9 t12 t15 t16 t17 t19 t22 t24 t25 t26 hoverable">creation</span> - the
<span class="t1 t7 t9 t12 t14 t19 t29 hoverable">Consciousness</span> of God, working through vehicles of
varying capacity. Limited as we feel our own
<span class="t1 t7 t9 t12 t14 t19 t29 hoverable">consciousness</span> to be, it is in its <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">nature</span>

identical with that of Infinite Divinity, as in
the other direction with that of animal and even
vegetable life. That which may be <span class="t1 t2 t3 t5 t6 t7 t8 t10 t12 t14 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t25 t26 t29 hoverable">thought</span> of as
the efficient value of <span class="t1 t7 t9 t12 t14 t19 t29 hoverable">consciousness</span> depends <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">upon</span>
the vehicle in which it is working. <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t7 t8 t11 t12 t13 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t25 t29 hoverable">Within</span> the
<span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">body</span> of a sheep its limitations are narrow
indeed, <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t7 t8 t11 t12 t13 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t25 t29 hoverable">within</span> that of an enlightened <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t26 t27 t29 hoverable">human</span> being
they seem enormously widened; but <span class="t10 t12 t16 t20 t21 t25 t26 t27 hoverable">whether</span> we go
down in <span class="t1 t2 t3 t5 t6 t7 t8 t10 t12 t14 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t25 t26 t29 hoverable">thought</span> far below the sheep level, or
ascend in imagination far above the <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t26 t27 t29 hoverable">human</span>
condition, we shall <span class="t11 t12 t22 t25 t27 hoverable">find</span> that the vehicle of
<span class="t1 t7 t9 t12 t14 t19 t29 hoverable">consciousness</span> in all cases determines the extent
to which <span class="t1 t7 t9 t12 t14 t19 t29 hoverable">consciousness</span> itself can range over the
infinitude of knowledge.
When Darwin first started the evolutionary
theory, some of us were inclined to regard him as
having made the mistake of concerning himself
with vehicles alone, ignoring the concurrent
evolution of intellectual and <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t5 t7 t8 t9 t11 t12 t13 t14 t16 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t29 hoverable">spiritual</span> capacity.
Without, perhaps, fully realizing the magnitude
of his own achievement, he was embracing in his
<span class="t1 t2 t19 hoverable">view</span> of <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">nature</span> both the <span class="t1 hoverable">physical</span> and superphysical processes of evolution. Although by
profound study the process can be comprehended
even at the level of its obscure beginnings, the
principle is better grasped if we confine our
attention to the development of <span class="t1 t7 t9 t12 t14 t19 t29 hoverable">consciousness</span> in
the <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t26 t27 t29 hoverable">human</span> being. By what <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t11 t13 t14 t15 t16 t18 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">law</span> is the gradual
improvement of the vehicle as <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">time</span> goes on
provided for? Putting the answer in a brief
phrase, susceptible of further development in
detail, the <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t11 t13 t14 t15 t16 t18 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">law</span> is that when <span class="t1 t7 t9 t12 t14 t19 t29 hoverable">consciousness</span> <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t7 t8 t11 t12 t13 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t25 t29 hoverable">within</span>
any given vehicle exerts itself to the utmost, or
in other words, makes the best <span class="t4 t18 hoverable">use</span> of the vehicle
in which it finds itself at any given time, the
<span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t11 t13 t14 t15 t16 t18 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">law</span> - really a part of the <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">great</span> aggregation of
Karmic laws - proceeds to invest that volume of
consciousnss, that Ego, with a better vehicle for
its next <span class="t1 hoverable">physical</span> manifestation.
I must here quote a line or <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">two</span> from Tennyson,
<span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">whose</span> poetry, as we grow to appreciate it, is

saturated with occult knowledge. He writes in one
fragment to be found in almost the last published
volume of his works:The <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">Lord</span> let the <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">house</span> of a brute to the <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">soul</span> of a man;
And <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">man</span> said, "Am I Your debtor?"
The <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">Lord</span> - "Not yet; but make it as clean as you can,
And then I will let you a better."

In these compact lines we have the <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t24 t25 t26 t28 t29 hoverable">whole</span> idea I
want to convey suggested, if not elaborately
expressed."Make it as clean as you can" means, of
course, make the best <span class="t4 t18 hoverable">use</span> of it, and establish a
Karmic claim on an improved <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">house</span> or vehicle. We
see the system working as we study the principles
of Reincarnation, working, of course, like most
processes in <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">Nature</span> in what seems at the first
glance a lopsided fashion. The lover of music
makes the best <span class="t4 t18 hoverable">use</span> of his musical faculties in
the <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">life</span> when that <span class="t3 t8 t9 t10 t11 t18 t19 t20 hoverable">desire</span> first governs him, and,
while perhaps neglecting other possibilities of
improvement, he obtains in his next <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">life</span> a
vehicle better adapted to the expression of
musical thought. So with any other line of <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t26 t27 t29 hoverable">human</span>
activity. The lover of <span class="t1 hoverable">physical</span> science finds
<span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">life</span> after <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">life</span> his capacity for comprehending
the laws of <span class="t1 hoverable">physical</span> <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">nature</span> ever and ever
improving; the philanthropist, unconsciously to
himself, is imbuing his permanent atoms with an
ever-increasing eagerness to benefit his fellowcreatures. Down to the minor developments of
intellectual capacity, the study of mathematics
or philology, the same invariable principle may
be discerned. No one can in one <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">life</span> clean all
the rooms in his <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">house</span> - to follow Tennyson's
metaphor; but by degrees all in turn will be
found to have claimed his attention, with the
ultimate result that the Ego acquires a vehicle
of <span class="t1 t7 t9 t12 t14 t19 t29 hoverable">consciousness</span> perfected beyond the needs of
commonplace life, and passes into the ranks of
Those we know something of, the Masters of
Wisdom.

As one burst of sunshine may illumine a landscape
previously obscured by shadow, this simple idea
seems to clear up <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t24 t25 t26 t28 t29 hoverable">whole</span> realms of vague
speculation concerning the processes we commnly
refer to by the vague term "evolution." And by
the <span class="t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">light</span> so shed on the <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t24 t25 t26 t28 t29 hoverable">whole</span> subject, we begin
to put a scientific face <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">upon</span> a vast range of
cloudy speculation embodied sometimes in the
phrase 'The Immanence of <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">God</span> in Nature."
Imagination, of course, reaches out vaguely
towards the supreme problem: What is the <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">nature</span>
of the vehicle <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t7 t8 t11 t12 t13 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t25 t29 hoverable">within</span> which <span class="t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">Divine</span> <span class="t1 t7 t9 t12 t14 t19 t29 hoverable">Consciousness</span>
works? and in that direction, at present, at all
events, it is useless for us to aspire. But fully
appreciated, the present interpretation of
<span class="t1 t7 t9 t12 t14 t19 t29 hoverable">consciousness</span> gives unity and <span class="t1 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t17 t18 t19 t24 t25 t26 t28 t29 hoverable">meaning</span> to the
<span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t24 t25 t26 t28 t29 hoverable">whole</span> design of <span class="t1 t2 t3 t5 t9 t12 t15 t16 t17 t19 t22 t24 t25 t26 hoverable">creation</span> from mineral
manifestation upward through organized <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">life</span> to
infinitudes beyond. It will be found to harmonize
with every <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">great</span> idea that Theosophical <span class="t1 t2 t3 t5 t6 t7 t8 t10 t12 t14 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t25 t26 t29 hoverable">thought</span>
has been endeavouring to deal with. A compact
phrase I have often been fond of quoting rests in
its significance on the principle I have been
endeavouring to define: "Whatever is, is, has
been, or will be, human." At the first glance the
value of the phrase seems to reside in the
promise it holds forth that all <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t26 t27 t29 hoverable">human</span> creatures
may aspire in thinking of the possibilities that
await them towards absolute infinitudes of
glorified existence; and it does that, but it
puts, so to speak, a scientific face <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">upon</span> the
maginficent prospect, and it fits in with every
idea we have been taught to <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">work</span> with concerning
the dependence of progress on individual
exertion. No one is lifted to a loftier level of
being than that on which he finds himself at any
given moment, by any <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">Power</span> exterior to himself.
Helped by suggestion I Yes, we may all welcome
such help as that; we can none of us dispense
with it; but the suggestion must in all cases be
a hint pointing to individual exertion. Actual
progress in every <span class="t1 t3 t5 t16 t19 t25 hoverable">case</span> must be the product of

individual will and effort, the effort to make
the maximum <span class="t4 t18 hoverable">use</span> of life's opportunities; or, in
other words, of the vehicle in which
<span class="t1 t7 t9 t12 t14 t19 t29 hoverable">consciousness</span> for the <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">time</span> being is working.
Hardly any of the misty thoughts in which oldfashioned psychology indulged will remain clouded
by vagueness when the principle I am dealing with
gives them definite shape.
I will venture on a subtle illustration of this
idea. Thinkers who rather resent than aspire to
clearly defined <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">knowledge</span> concerning the
<span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t5 t7 t8 t9 t11 t12 t13 t14 t16 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t29 hoverable">spiritual</span> aspect of their own nature, are often
fond of treating <span class="t0 t1 t3 t4 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t13 t16 t19 t20 t21 t22 t24 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">Christ</span> as a <span class="t1 t2 t5 t8 t10 t16 t19 hoverable">state</span> of
consciousness. "The awakening of the <span class="t0 t1 t3 t4 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t13 t16 t19 t20 t21 t22 t24 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">Christ</span>
<span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t7 t8 t11 t12 t13 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t25 t29 hoverable">within</span> us," or some such vague interpretation of
the idea, is held preferable to any specific
<span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">knowledge</span> concerning the levels in the <span class="t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">Divine</span>
Hierarchy at which we <span class="t11 t12 t22 t25 t27 hoverable">find</span> definitely in
manifestation a Being from whom the <span class="t0 t1 t3 t4 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t13 t16 t19 t20 t21 t22 t24 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">Christ</span>
Principle actually emanates. Attached as many
thinkers are to the cloudiness of mysticism, the
recognition of such a specific Being seems to
them to degrade the idea, and <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">yet</span> with the
<span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">knowledge</span> concerning the <span class="t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">Divine</span> Hierarchy that
has been in Theosophical possession almost since
the beginning, we know that there is a specific
Being at a certain level <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t7 t8 t11 t12 t13 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t25 t29 hoverable">within</span> the <span class="t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">Divine</span>
Hierarchy of the Solar System, to whom we may
definitely look up as the conscious source of all
<span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t5 t7 t8 t9 t11 t12 t13 t14 t16 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t29 hoverable">spiritual</span> influence. This clear knowledge, far
from degrading the aspiration in each individual
Ego to comprehend spirituality, is just as
superior to the <span class="t1 t2 t5 t8 t10 t16 t19 hoverable">state</span> of <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">mind</span> with which the
mystic is content, as the landscape illuminated
by sunshine is superior to the dim suggestion of
partial obscurity. Undoubtedly in all research or
teaching connected with <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t5 t7 t8 t9 t11 t12 t13 t14 t16 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t29 hoverable">spiritual</span> <span class="t0 t2 t3 t4 t5 t7 t8 t9 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">truth</span> mysteries
still lie beyond any that are being by degrees
cleared up - stretching beyond these to all
Infinity; but the more our <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">knowledge</span> is expanded,
the better we realize that cloudiness of thought,

uncertainty as we gaze upward, vagueness of
expression as we attempt to put aspiration into
words, are merely due to want of further
knowledge. As definite and precise as our
<span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">knowledge</span> has now become in reference to the
simple phenomena of chemistry, so defined and
precise to a <span class="t1 t5 t11 t16 hoverable">higher</span> understanding must the
conditions of <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t5 t7 t8 t9 t11 t12 t13 t14 t16 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t29 hoverable">spiritual</span> <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">life</span> ultimately become,
<span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">though</span> to the ordinary <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t26 t27 t29 hoverable">human</span> brain they must <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t24 t26 t27 t29 hoverable">long</span>
remain incomprehensible. There is no inherent
value in cloudiness of thought. That which we
ought all to be aiming at in dealing with any of
the mysteries hitherto embraced by the vague term
"occultism" is clearness and precision of
understanding. The Truth, if we could comprehend
it, is as clear and precise as any of those
simpler truths of <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">nature</span> <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t7 t8 t11 t12 t13 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t25 t29 hoverable">within</span> our grasp, and
the task before us is not that of continuing to
treat <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t5 t7 t8 t9 t11 t12 t13 t14 t16 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t29 hoverable">spiritual</span> research as something too sacred
to be cramped by outline or form. There can be no
<span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t5 t7 t8 t9 t11 t12 t13 t14 t16 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t29 hoverable">spiritual</span> <span class="t0 t2 t3 t4 t5 t7 t8 t9 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">truth</span> so exalted and for us at the
moment incomprehensible, which does not have as
clear an outline and as defined a mental shape
for <span class="t1 t7 t9 t12 t14 t19 t29 hoverable">consciousness</span> working in appropriate vehicles
as the simpler relationships of molecular physics
already have for ourselves.
2. - THE PLANETARY CHAIN
The first idea we had about the progress of <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">life</span>
on planetary chains was, looking back <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">upon</span> it,
all we could be expected to understand at the
first blush. It was a huge expansion of the
elementary idea that this <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">world</span> was the beginning
of all things, and that its gradual <span class="t1 t2 t3 t5 t9 t12 t15 t16 t17 t19 t22 t24 t25 t26 hoverable">creation</span>
could be traced in the familiar language of
scripture.
The very notion of planetary chains was an
entirely new one which had to be assimilated by
degrees, and has needed in later <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">years</span> very
elaborate explanation. The planetary chain that

we belong to consists, as the early teaching
showed, of seven globes, the first and last on
the Manasic level, <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">two</span> others below these on the
Astral level, <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">three</span> on the <span class="t1 hoverable">physical</span> plane. We
jumped to the conclusion in the beginning that
all planetary chains were alike, consisting of
seven globes, and the idea has unhappily
permeated Theosophical literature to that extent
that it has misled many thinkers. It is really
only the middle chain of a manvantaric series
that consists of seven planets; in the previous
Manvantara a chain had only five; in the one
before it, only three; and in the one before
that, only one. I will not stop to <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">work</span> out this
idea in all its scientific beauty. A mere hint
will be enough to show how the <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t24 t25 t26 t28 t29 hoverable">whole</span> series of
Manvantaras is a harmonious conception beginning
with the <span class="t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">Divine</span> <span class="t1 t2 t3 t5 t6 t7 t8 t10 t12 t14 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t25 t26 t29 hoverable">Thought</span> - the first Manasic globe
- culminating in some supreme results that are
beyond our present comprehension in that far-away
future when the <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t24 t25 t26 t28 t29 hoverable">whole</span> series will be complete.
But keeping our attention fixed for the moment on
our present planetary chain of seven globes, the
first idea we have to realize is that, when we
were told in the beginning about the <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">great</span> <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">life</span>
wave sweeping on from <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">world</span> to world, and for the
present occupying this earth, we were put in
possession of a broad idea which is perfectly
true, but which requires elaboration. The main
part of the <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t26 t27 t29 hoverable">human</span> family to which we belong does
occupy this <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">earth</span> at the present time, but during
the various rounds of progress which have been
going on for an almost incalculable past, the
family has to a certain extent straggled over the
<span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t24 t25 t26 t28 t29 hoverable">whole</span> series of worlds constituting the Chain. At
present we shall <span class="t11 t12 t22 t25 t27 hoverable">find</span> it impossible to understand
the conditions of <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">life</span> on the super-physical
planets, and we may leave them out of <span class="t3 t4 t5 t7 t8 t10 t12 t16 t19 t21 t24 t25 t26 t29 hoverable">account</span> for
the moment; but on the <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">three</span> physical, including
Mars behind us and Mercury in advance of us, the
<span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t26 t27 t29 hoverable">human</span> family is now distributed - part of it
already established on Mercury, part <span class="t3 t13 t18 t24 hoverable">left</span> behind
on Mars. The explanation is simple. While the

great majority swept forward to this earth, the
laggard remnant not <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">yet</span> qualified for incarnation
here remains on the planet Mars, a superior
vanguard already getting forward to the planet in
advance. The retarded condition of the Martian
remnant - counted, of course, by a fairly large
<span class="t3 t17 t26 hoverable">number</span> of millions - consists of those who have
(reverting to my former explanation about
consciosuness) failed to make the exertions
required for the acquisition of superior
vehicles. There is no vehicle of <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t26 t27 t29 hoverable">human</span>
<span class="t1 t7 t9 t12 t14 t19 t29 hoverable">consciousness</span> on this <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">earth</span> amongst even the
lowest savages that is not definitely superior in
some important ways to the vehicles of
<span class="t1 t7 t9 t12 t14 t19 t29 hoverable">consciousness</span> now inhabiting Mars. Strange to
say, as often happens on the downward arc, some
capacities are still active amongst them, which
enable them to do <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">things</span> that we ourselves, in
spite of our superior development, are unable to
accomplish. The Martian <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">people</span> can handle <span class="t25 hoverable">matter</span>
by arts that we, to a certain extent, have lost,
<span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">though</span> the <span class="t4 t18 hoverable">use</span> of such arts does not represent
superior <span class="t14 t24 hoverable">intelligence</span> any more than a spider's
capacity to make a web that no <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t26 t27 t29 hoverable">human</span> <span class="t2 t6 t8 t9 t10 t15 t18 t19 t21 t22 t23 t24 t28 t29 hoverable">art</span> could
imitate, represents intellectual superiority on
the part of the spider. Morally, the condition of
the Martian <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">people</span> is below any level that we can
easily comprehend. Their forms are to our more
cultivated taste grotesquely ugly, and they
practically exemplify a saying applied with less
appropriateness to some savage races of our own
globe: "manners they have none, and their customs
are beastly." The animal <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">life</span> on Mars is at a low
level, corresponding to that of the people. It is
purely reptilian in its character, and the
development of taste amongst the <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">people</span> may be
imagined from the <span class="t24 hoverable">fact</span> that their <span class="t2 t4 t11 t13 hoverable">food</span> consists
of the blood of the reptiles swarming in the vast
inland lakes, with which the habitable portions
of the planet are covered.
Even amongst the Martians the evolutionary <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t11 t13 t14 t15 t16 t18 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">law</span>
which presses gradually on the multitude is

slowly working. Some Egos - for already the
Martians must be <span class="t1 t2 t3 t5 t6 t7 t8 t10 t12 t14 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t25 t26 t29 hoverable">thought</span> of as <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t26 t27 t29 hoverable">human</span> - gradually
establish claims on a better vehicle of
<span class="t1 t7 t9 t12 t14 t19 t29 hoverable">consciousness</span> than those around them, and then
they become qualified for incarnation on this
earth, and are <span class="t0 t4 t6 t8 t9 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t17 t19 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">brought</span> over under the guidance of
appropriate emissaries from the White Lodge in
batches sometimes of fairly considerable number.
I have <span class="t13 t14 t15 t18 t27 hoverable">heard</span> of a recent <span class="t1 t3 t5 t16 t19 t25 hoverable">case</span> in which <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t7 t8 t11 t12 t13 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t25 t29 hoverable">within</span> the
last year or two, a batch of about a hundred
<span class="t15 t23 hoverable">thousand</span> Martian Egos were imported into this
world, finding incarnation, some of them, in the
aborigines, as they are called, of Australia,
some in the lowest types of Central Africa, the
best of them amongst the populations of Central
Asia.
The conditions on the other <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">hand</span> involving the
premature migration of Egos from this <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">earth</span> to
Mercury are curious and interesting when
understood, but at this step of the explanation
it will be more convenient to stop and <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">take</span> a new
departure having to do with the relations of the
various planetary systems or chains of our Solar
System with one another.
Even in the first sketches of occult teaching, as
soon as the notion of the planetary chain had
been established in the mind, it became clear
that Egos evolving around any given planetary
chain, granting <span class="t8 t11 t14 t19 hoverable">free</span> will to each, must <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">work</span> out
different destinies. Some Egos <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">would</span> advance more
rapidly than others, so that at a fairly advanced
stage in the <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t24 t25 t26 t28 t29 hoverable">whole</span> process there <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">would</span> be immense
intervals of conditions between those in the
vanguard and those in the rear. Then it was
explained that at a certain stage in the
development of any given planetary chain some
<span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">would</span> have fallen so far back, as compared with
their more persevering companions, that <span class="t1 hoverable">physical</span>
progress for the best <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">would</span> have advanced to a
condition in which the worst <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">would</span> not be
qualified to make <span class="t4 t18 hoverable">use</span> of the forms then in

process of development. In other words, and in
the rougher language of our first explanations, a
period is inevitable in each planetary sheme when
those who cannot advance farther drop off from
the main current of evolution, only those who
have made better <span class="t4 t18 hoverable">use</span> of their opportunities
reaching onwards towards the final possibilities
of their existence. This period <span class="t4 hoverable">used</span> to be spoken
of as the critical period of the fifth Round, and
for a <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t24 t26 t27 t29 hoverable">long</span> <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">time</span> no information reached us as to
what <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">would</span> be the final destiny, in the <span class="t1 t3 t5 t16 t19 t25 hoverable">case</span> of
our own planetary scheme, of those who <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">would</span> fall
off from evolution at that remote period far
ahead of us, the middle of the Round destined to
succeed that with which we are at present
concerned.
Later information filled up this gap in our
knowledge, and in so doing threw a flood of <span class="t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">light</span>
<span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">upon</span> the constitution of the Solar System as a
whole. Obviously the senior planetary scheme, of
which Venus is the <span class="t1 hoverable">physical</span> world, has <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t24 t26 t27 t29 hoverable">long</span> since
passed that critical period, although for us it
lies so far still in the future. Already the
course of events must have decided the fate of
the failures of Venus at the critical period, and
the answer given me, when I was eventually
enabled to put the question, at once showed how
various planetary chains of the Solar System are
not to be regarded as entirely independent
undertakings. They are linked <span class="t1 t2 t3 t5 t6 t9 t11 t15 t17 t18 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">together</span> in an
extremely intelligent fashion by the <span class="t24 hoverable">fact</span> that
the Egos who become the failures of one planetary
scheme <span class="t6 t9 t13 t15 t17 t18 t23 t28 t29 hoverable">pass</span> into the evolution of the planetary
scheme next in <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t29 hoverable">order</span> of development; so the
simple answer to the question, "Where are the
failures of the Venus scheme?" is embodied in the
one word, "Here!" Certainly, in my own
experience, no one <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">word</span> ever before threw such
<span class="t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">light</span> on vast regions of speculation. One saw the
<span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t24 t25 t26 t28 t29 hoverable">whole</span> seven (or rather ten) planetary schemes,
all forming part of one coherent design; one saw
the <span class="t1 t3 t8 t25 hoverable">reason</span> why they were not all at this moment

in similar stages of progress; one could look
forward to the <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">time</span> when, for example, the planet
Jupiter, now an incandescent mass of mineral
matter, will become an inhabited home of future
races, when those which inhabit our <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">earth</span> will no
longer <span class="t3 t17 t26 hoverable">number</span> among them any <span class="t1 t4 t8 t16 t21 t25 t29 hoverable">beings</span> of a less
exalted <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t5 t7 t8 t9 t11 t12 t13 t14 t16 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t29 hoverable">spiritual</span> rank than those we now think of
as the Masters, and when the future Jupiter
evolution will afford opportunities for a new
beginning to those who may have dropped out of
the evolutionary course designed in connection
with later developments of this world.
Now we come back to the further details of the
process. The Venus failures are here; more
precisely, what does that mean? In truth,
although failures from the present standpoint of
Venus attainment, they failed at a period in the
evolution of their own race already far in
advance of that reached by the <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">great</span> bulk of our
own people. None of them could be content with
such incarnations as are offered to humanity at
present, even by the most civilized races
inhabiting this world, or, at all events, no such
offers can be provided in anything resembling
adequate abundance. The problem as <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">thus</span> stated
almost hints at its own solution. I have already
said that the planet Mercury, belonging to our
chain, is actually the home of Egos constituting
the vanguard of our humanity. For the moment I am
leaving out of <span class="t3 t4 t5 t7 t8 t10 t12 t16 t19 t21 t24 t25 t26 t29 hoverable">account</span> those who, along the Path,
attain sublime <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t5 t7 t8 t9 t11 t12 t13 t14 t16 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t29 hoverable">spiritual</span> conditions which, for
that matter, make them <span class="t8 t11 t14 t19 hoverable">free</span> of all the planets of
our chain. But Mercury, inhabited by the very
best, so to speak, of the <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t26 t27 t29 hoverable">human</span> family, became a
region in which Venus failures could freely
incarnate, and at the present moment "Mercury" is
the more precise <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t10 t11 t12 t13 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t29 hoverable">form</span> of the <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">word</span> "here," which
impressed me so much when I first <span class="t13 t14 t15 t18 t27 hoverable">heard</span> it <span class="t4 hoverable">used</span>
in this connection.
And now let us realize more in detail the <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">nature</span>
of the <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">life</span> of which Mercury is the home. In many

ways it is so far superior to the conditions we
are familiar with here, that only by degrees can
we <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t10 t11 t12 t13 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t29 hoverable">form</span> any conception of it. In some respects we
are helped to do this by a <span class="t1 t4 t7 t15 t18 t20 t27 hoverable">book</span> which, at the
first glance, has nothing whatever to do with
scientific occultism - Bulwer Lytton's delightful
story, The Coming Race. We do not go far in
occult study before coming into touch with the
frequent occurrence of literary inspiration.
Masters taking an interest in that work, and
finding sensitive authorship, will constantly
inspire poetry and fiction, while others, indeed,
are inspiring scientific thought; but that need
not be dealt with at this moment. The <span class="t0 t2 t5 t7 t12 t17 t19 t20 t27 t29 hoverable">Master</span> who
inspired Bulwer Lytton with the ideas so prettily
<span class="t0 t2 t3 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">set</span> forth in The Coming Race did not, so to
speak, give Himself the trouble to invent an
imaginary <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">world</span> of dignity and beauty; He simply
drew on His personal <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">knowledge</span> of the conditions
actually prevailing on the planet Mercury conditions absolutely familiar, not merely to the
<span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">great</span> Masters, but to many of those of somewhat
lesser rank, who are already able, on the Buddhic
plane, to roam the Solar System at discretion.
Perfect harmony prevails in the delightful
Mercurial community: the Satanic influence which
has filled this <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">world</span> with strife and confusion,
<span class="t10 t12 t16 t20 t21 t25 t26 t27 hoverable">whether</span> we contemplate political, industrial, or
international relationships, has never penetrated
the peaceful regions of our beautiful sister
planet. Intellectual advancement has far
outstripped our own, and for many thinkers
amongst us speculating on the possibilities of
future sociology, it will be interesting to know
that in reality on Mercury, as in Bulwer Lytton's
story, the female half of humanity is distinctly,
<span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">though</span> in no inconvenient degree, superior to and
predominant over the other half. It is difficult
to make the statement in any <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t10 t11 t12 t13 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t29 hoverable">form</span> of <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">words</span> which
does not convey at the first glance a
misunderstanding, because the very <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">words</span> male and
female, as we <span class="t4 t18 hoverable">use</span> them here, have very different
meanings on Mercury, especially from the

physiological point of <span class="t1 t2 t19 hoverable">view</span> from those we attach
to the <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">words</span> in this less beautiful world. And,
again, when we talk of superiority and
predominance, we can hardly keep touch with ideas
that seem from our experience incompatible with
those others - the ideas of perfect harmony and
love. Really all these apparently conflicting
principles are susceptible of combination in a
perfect chord like varying notes in music, and
the <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t24 t25 t26 t28 t29 hoverable">whole</span> subject tempts imagination. But for the
moment I must revert to the connection between
Mercury conditions and the claims on <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">nature</span> of
the Venus failures.
In its later evolution, possibly in obedience to
a <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t11 t13 t14 t15 t16 t18 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">law</span> which may govern other worlds, the <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">people</span>
of Venus became very much more advanced students
of beauty - among other <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">things</span> - than we on this
<span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">world</span> can claim to be as yet. That drift of
development was already operative with the <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t24 t25 t26 t28 t29 hoverable">whole</span>
race before the critical period. So, as a <span class="t25 hoverable">matter</span>
of fact, Venus failures now on Mercury are
enormously in advance of the earthly population,
as a whole, as regards the appreciation of beauty
on a level only represented amongst us, if at
all, by the greatest artists of our period.
Parenthetically I may here just mention a bit of
information that reached me a <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t24 t26 t27 t29 hoverable">long</span> <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">time</span> ago, and
seemed puzzling at the moment, concerning the
peculiar Karma which, in some cases, makes it
possible for Earthly Egos to be prematurely
transferred to incarnations on Mercury (I am not
talking about the inner round, which is a subject
apart). It is just possible for <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">people</span>
appropriately qualified by their Karma to be <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">thus</span>
transferred. I must not stop to go into the
numerous details of the subject, but one
characteristic required by <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">people</span> unconsciously
becoming qualified for the transfer, is the
artistic temperament. They must have some
qualification for appropriately enjoying the
heredity of Mercurial parents.

This <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t24 t25 t26 t28 t29 hoverable">whole</span> department of the subject is curiously
fascinating. Of course, the <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">word</span> "beauty" must
not be <span class="t4 hoverable">used</span> in any narrow sense, but in one which
includes the natural beauty of trees and flowers,
the loveliness of colour in a landscape, the
harmony of <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t10 t11 t12 t13 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t29 hoverable">form</span> in a structure, as <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">well</span> as that
beauty in the feminine aspect of humanity which
is perhaps the variety of beauty we all think of
first when we make <span class="t4 t18 hoverable">use</span> of the word.
As above suggested, not quite all the Venus
failures are already established on Mercury.
Some, if not actually amongst us yet, are
awaiting earthly incarnation, due, no doubt, to
their exact <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">place</span> on the scale of evolution, and
are meanwhile, from <span class="t1 t5 t11 t16 hoverable">higher</span> levels either on the
Astral of Manasic worlds, influencing artistic
thought, inspiring artistic achievement actually
in progress amongst us at the present time, and
this has been going on over what we are in the
habit of thinking of as <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t24 t26 t27 t29 hoverable">long</span> periods; short, of
course, as measured on the scale of natural
evolution. The <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t24 t25 t26 t28 t29 hoverable">whole</span> outburst of artistic
capacity in Greece during that period the other
<span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">day</span> which we <span class="t3 t11 t18 t27 hoverable">call</span> "ancient" was due to the <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">way</span> in
which Venus failures in our <span class="t1 t5 t11 t16 hoverable">higher</span> worlds
discerned in that race <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">great</span> capacities for the
reception of their influence. Roughly speaking,
all Greek <span class="t2 t6 t8 t9 t10 t15 t18 t19 t21 t22 t23 t24 t28 t29 hoverable">art</span> in sculpture may be regarded as
having been a gift to us from the Venus
immigrants, whom, from the Venus point of view,
we must still <span class="t9 t11 t20 t21 t22 t23 t27 hoverable">speak</span> of as failures.
There is something eminently suggestive in the
<span class="t24 hoverable">fact</span> that a more highly evolved, more morally and
intellectually perfect a race than our own, at
its present stage, should also be identified with
beauty for that matter, not merely in regard to
capacity to appreciate it, but in actual
manifestation. Looking back far to the rear of
our own <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">place</span> in evolution, we always <span class="t11 t12 t22 t25 t27 hoverable">find</span> early
forms, more or less to our senses, ugly and
repulsive. The forms, indeed, of the degraded

remnants of the <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t26 t27 t29 hoverable">human</span> family on Mars are simply
hideous, as compared with the best examples among
us. The animal <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">life</span> there is uncouth and
repulsive as compared with the animal <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">life</span> of
this world. Doubtless there are exceptions that
will leap into <span class="t1 t7 t9 t12 t14 t19 t29 hoverable">consciousness</span> for everyone who
thinks on the subject, but very broadly the <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t11 t13 t14 t15 t16 t18 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">law</span>
of <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">nature</span> appears to link the moral improvement
of conscious <span class="t1 t4 t8 t16 t21 t25 t29 hoverable">beings</span> with corresponding
improvement in the beauty of form. When we
understand the intricacies of Karma better than
we do at present, it may be possible to <span class="t11 t12 t22 t25 t27 hoverable">find</span> out
why <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">men</span> and women amongst us are sometimes
conspicious at the same <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">time</span> for beauty of <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t10 t11 t12 t13 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t29 hoverable">form</span>
and atrociously defective character. But
exceptions without, according to the stupid
proverb, "proving the rule," are at all events
compatible with its operation on a large scale.
And one more suggestion in connection with this
line of <span class="t1 t2 t3 t5 t6 t7 t8 t10 t12 t14 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t25 t26 t29 hoverable">thought</span> arises from definite information
about the <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">people</span> on Mercury. <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">Without</span> going into
indecorous detail, it is enough to say that the
birth of <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">children</span> is absolutely unattended with
distress or inconvenience for the mother. The
<span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t24 t25 t26 t28 t29 hoverable">whole</span> business of race propagation is in point of
<span class="t24 hoverable">fact</span> so unlike our own, so infinitely more
charming and attractive to the imagination, that
incidentally it must mean differences in the
<span class="t1 hoverable">physical</span> confirmation of <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">men</span> and women which may,
at the first glance, seem to conflict with our
present conceptions of perfect female beauty. And
<span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">yet</span> I am assured by one, at all events, in a
position to <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t10 t11 t12 t13 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t29 hoverable">form</span> an opinion, that, <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">without</span> for a
moment denying the beauty of a perfect female
<span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t10 t11 t12 t13 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t29 hoverable">form</span> of our kind at present, the perfect Mercury
woman, <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">though</span> very different, is the more
beautiful of the two. The perception of beauty is
a faculty that grows and changes in its growth,
and this <span class="t1 t2 t3 t5 t6 t7 t8 t10 t12 t14 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t25 t26 t29 hoverable">thought</span> reaches in both directions, so
that when I have sometimes sought to ascertain
why Nature's early experiments in <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t10 t11 t12 t13 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t29 hoverable">form</span> have
generally been uncouth and ugly, I have been told

they were neither from the point of <span class="t1 t2 t19 hoverable">view</span> of the
lowly developed <span class="t1 t7 t9 t12 t14 t19 t29 hoverable">consciousness</span> they were designed
to express.
3. - THE ASTRAL <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">WORLD</span>
Any reference to the real conditions of astral
<span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">life</span> must <span class="t4 t6 t7 t9 t12 t13 t14 t15 t17 t18 t20 t22 t23 t24 t26 t27 hoverable">bring</span> us first of all into touch with a
situation - as lamentable as it is ludicrous that has established an almost impassable chasm
between the vast <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">body</span> of super-physical inquirers
engaged with the methods of spiritualism, and
those who have appreciated what with all respect
to the other I cannot but describe as the
infinitely more important line of study identifed
with the Theosophical movement. One might
laboriously trace the <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">way</span> mistakes were made in
the beginning, but as regards authentic teaching
from the Masters, on the strength of which the
Theosophical movement was launched, the subject
of astral <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">life</span> immediately following the <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t29 hoverable">death</span> of
the <span class="t1 hoverable">physical</span> <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">body</span> was simply neglected. Somehow
we were drifted in the beginning into concerning
ourselves with the gigantic principles governing
<span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t26 t27 t29 hoverable">human</span> evolution on a large scale, and disregarded
opportunities of understanding our immediate
future better than before, in a <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">way</span> which
painfully reminds one of the old story about the
star-gazer who fell into the ditch. The pity of
it, looking back, is intense. The Theosophical
movement ought to have been recruited wholesale
from the ranks of the spiritualists. As <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">things</span>
have turned out, it is only a few who can be
drawn across the gulf dividing most of them from
loftier work.
But now, forgetting all this, let us turn to the
accurate information which in later <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">years</span> some of
us have been able to obtain from lofty sources of
information concerning that astral <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">world</span> which
thirty of forty <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">years</span> ago the spiritualists
understood better than the first writers on

Theosophy, but which now we are able to examine
and interpret to an extent which puts the
<span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">knowledge</span> acquired by the ordinary methods of
spiritualism in the background altogether.
To survey the astral <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">world</span> in its entirety and to
comprehend its manifold varieties of condition,
the survey must be on an altogether <span class="t1 t5 t11 t16 hoverable">higher</span> level
of <span class="t1 t7 t9 t12 t14 t19 t29 hoverable">consciousness</span> than that of the normal
inhabitants. This idea, which is obvious as soon
as stated, is ignored, altogether by
spiritualists of the simpler type, who imagine
that because their friend has passed to a new
<span class="t1 t2 t5 t8 t10 t16 t19 hoverable">state</span> of <span class="t11 t16 hoverable">existence</span> he must know, not merely all
about it, but all that relates to <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t26 t27 t29 hoverable">human</span> destinies
beyond his own condition. And many spiritualists
will even accept negative testimony; a <span class="t0 t1 t2 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">spirit</span> who
quite truly says that he cannot perceive any
reincarnations in progress is held by his friend
on this plane to have proved that no
reincarnations <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">take</span> place; but in <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">thus</span> indicating
the necessary imperfection of the spiritualistic
method as a means of acquiring knowledge, let me,
before passing on to deal with <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">knowledge</span> acquired
in other ways, bear testimony to the maginficent
<span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">work</span> that has been done in the <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">world</span> by
spiritualism in its relations with religious
thinking. The growth of materialistic belief in
the middle of the last century was so powerful
that, if entirely unchecked, it <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">would</span> probably
have extinguished religious thinking forever.
Spiritualism, by proving that there was another
<span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">life</span> after this, and one with which we could get
into touch, broke up the domination of the
materialistic school in a <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">way</span> which no
theological influence could possibly have
accomplished.
Coming to detail, we <span class="t11 t12 t22 t25 t27 hoverable">find</span> the <span class="t3 t17 t26 hoverable">number</span> seven
playing an important part in the astral economy,
as in many other ways with which we are familiar.
It is a <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">great</span> mistake to imagine that seven as a
key <span class="t3 t17 t26 hoverable">number</span> is one of any deep significance in the

universe at large. It has a deep significance as
regards our world, of which, after all, the
astral plane is merely a part - a part as
definitely objective as so much granite rock to
appropriate senses of perception. To those the
