that it is only on such levels of <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">life</span> that <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">great</span>
<span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t5 t7 t8 t9 t11 t12 t13 t14 t16 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t29 hoverable">spiritual</span> natures are to be sought for. Indeed,
the normal rule is rather the other <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">way</span> about.
There is a tendency in <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">Nature</span> to a gradual upward
drift in social station in the <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t24 t26 t27 t29 hoverable">long</span> progress of
incarnations. This ensues from the <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">way</span> in which
desire, in ordinary life, is one of the factors
making up the next Karmic programme. The <span class="t3 t8 t9 t10 t11 t18 t19 t20 hoverable">desire</span>
must be clear and definite to be operative in
this way, and it <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">would</span> not amount to much if a
costermonger desired to be a king. He <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">would</span> not
know enough about the king's <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">life</span> to <span class="t3 t8 t9 t10 t11 t18 t19 t20 hoverable">desire</span> that
with precision, nor even if his <span class="t3 t8 t9 t10 t11 t18 t19 t20 hoverable">desire</span> pointed to
a less exalted station could it be definite
enough to have a Karmic value. But he may fully
realize the conditions of <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">life</span> a little better
than those he might be <span class="t4 hoverable">used</span> to, and then the
<span class="t3 t8 t9 t10 t11 t18 t19 t20 hoverable">desire</span> assumes creative force, always supposing
the <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">man</span> does not engender, in other directions,
bad Karma that conflicts with his desire. But all
these last remarks obviously apply to levels of
<span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">life</span> below those inspired by genuine <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t5 t7 t8 t9 t11 t12 t13 t14 t16 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t29 hoverable">spiritual</span>
aspiration. When this is sufficiently developed
for the Ego to feel it as his predominant motive,
it sweeps away all minor ambitions.
So, as I say, on the <span class="t1 t5 t11 t16 hoverable">higher</span> levels choice enters
into this matter. When it does not enter - which
is the <span class="t1 t3 t5 t16 t19 t25 hoverable">case</span> with the vast majority of our fellowcreatures - the guidance is accomplished again in
various ways. For those sufficiently advanced,
but not on the path, there are <span class="t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">Divine</span> <span class="t1 t4 t8 t16 t21 t25 t29 hoverable">beings</span> in
the <span class="t1 t5 t11 t16 hoverable">higher</span> <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t29 hoverable">order</span> of the <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">great</span> adept hierarchy

whose function it is to direct incarnations and
actually guide each Ego, with a perception of its
<span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t5 t7 t8 t9 t11 t12 t13 t14 t16 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t29 hoverable">spiritual</span> needs, into the incarnation suitable
for its further expression. On a lower level
again, if we go back to the conditions of savage
life, or even to the conditions of very humble
<span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">life</span> in civilized countries - well, the <span class="t0 t2 t3 t4 t5 t7 t8 t9 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">truth</span> is,
as I have definitely been told, for a <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">great</span> many
Egos, that anyone of fifty incarnations <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">would</span> do
equally well, and <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">therefore</span> there is no specific
individual guidance in such cases. You will
always remember that the <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t26 t27 t29 hoverable">human</span> race is a vast
procession proceeding through the ages, the
members of which represent very different
conditions of growth and progress, very different
claims <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">upon</span> the authority which rules the whole.
Let us consider the course of events in the <span class="t1 t3 t5 t16 t19 t25 hoverable">case</span>
of an ordinary Ego representing civilized
development, a certain amount of progress along
the lines of evolution and intelligence, and so
forth, but no abnormal <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t5 t7 t8 t9 t11 t12 t13 t14 t16 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t29 hoverable">spiritual</span> growth. Such an
Ego will be drafted into an appropriate
incarnation under pressure of forces of which it
has no practical consciousness, and for a <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t24 t26 t27 t29 hoverable">long</span>
<span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">time</span> will be unconscious of having re-entered
this plane of <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">life</span> at all. There is a link
established between itself and the new <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">life</span> - we
do not know what terms to use, <span class="t1 hoverable">physical</span> plane
<span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">nature</span> does not enable us to handle phrases which
suit these conditions - but some mysterious
magnetic thread or tie attaches the Ego to the
new birth, and for a <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t24 t26 t27 t29 hoverable">long</span> <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">time</span> it is quite
unconscious of any such attachment - unconscious
probably for at least seven years. The first
seven <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">years</span> of a child's <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">life</span> do not represent
intelligent <span class="t1 t7 t9 t12 t14 t19 t29 hoverable">consciousness</span> <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t7 t8 t11 t12 t13 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t25 t29 hoverable">within</span> that organism.
Perhaps that statement will shock enthusiastic
mothers who believe that from a very early age
they detect all sorts of charming attributes in
their offspring. They may, but I do maintain from
what I have been told that as far as the real Ego
<span class="t1 t7 t9 t12 t14 t19 t29 hoverable">consciousness</span> is concerned it is not really
active <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t7 t8 t11 t12 t13 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t25 t29 hoverable">within</span> the child until at least seven

years have been spent, and then only to a very
limited degree. Then, no doubt, the Ego will be
conscious of its re-attachment to the <span class="t1 hoverable">physical</span>
plane, but not conscious to any extent which is a
serious impediment to its <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t5 t7 t8 t9 t11 t12 t13 t14 t16 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t29 hoverable">spiritual</span> <span class="t1 t7 t9 t12 t14 t19 t29 hoverable">consciousness</span>
on <span class="t1 t5 t11 t16 hoverable">higher</span> planes. It will not be until another
septenary period has been passed - for these
septenary periods have a very definite
significance in connection with the growth of new
lives - it is not until another stage of distinct
progress has been accomplished that the etheric
and astral elements in the new child's
composition become identified with the Ego in the
background. I am not going to attempt a very
minute explanation of the successive stages
through which <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">Nature</span> <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t10 t11 t13 t14 t15 t16 t18 t19 t20 t21 t24 t25 t29 hoverable">works</span> in bringing an Ego
into a new incarnation, but the <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">two</span> septenary
periods that I have mentioned are by no means all
that are recognizable as stages in the process.
The real <span class="t0 t2 t3 t4 t5 t7 t8 t9 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">truth</span> I believe to be that it is not
until <span class="t5 hoverable">full</span> maturity is reached, not till such an
age as twenty-eight, or even a later period than
that, that the <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t8 t10 t12 t16 t19 t20 t21 t22 t25 t29 hoverable">highest</span> elements in the Ego are
capable of functioning in the new organism. I
believe, even as far as the period of thirtyfive, it may sometimes be said that the new
incarnation is not absolutely in its completely
perfected condition. So that no conception of
this subject can be more wide of the <span class="t0 t2 t3 t4 t5 t7 t8 t9 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">truth</span> than
that which embarrasses the idea of reincarnation
with the belief that, in the earlier stages, the
experience is distressing to the entity coming
back.
One or <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">two</span> other thoughts still remain to be
emphasized in connection with this process of
reincarnation. A <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">great</span> deal was said in earlier
writings on the subject of Devachan, and later
interpretations have modified <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">without</span>
contradicting what was said in the beginning.
There are numerous cases in which Devachan is
little more than a blissful idleness in which the
personality that has passed from this <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">life</span> into

the Devachan state, exists in a perfectly happy
condition for as <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t24 t26 t27 t29 hoverable">long</span> a period as the energies
<span class="t16 hoverable">created</span> or <span class="t0 t4 t6 t8 t9 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t17 t19 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">brought</span> into activity during the past
<span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">life</span> are capable of manifesting themselves on a
<span class="t1 t5 t11 t16 hoverable">higher</span> plane. In all such cases the mergence into
the Ego is effected unconsciously. All such
processes are guided by <span class="t1 t5 t11 t16 hoverable">higher</span> <span class="t14 t24 hoverable">intelligence</span>
outside that of the Ego itself, and it <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">would</span> only
be in a very advanced condition indeed that the
Ego <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">would</span> be perfectly conscious of what it was
doing as it gradually absorbed into itself the
experiences of the last life. You have always to
remember that on the <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t8 t10 t12 t16 t19 t20 t21 t22 t25 t29 hoverable">highest</span> conditions that <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">men</span>
are capable of reaching we <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">take</span> our destinies
into our own hands; on intermediate conditions
they are guided for us by <span class="t1 t4 t8 t16 t21 t25 t29 hoverable">beings</span> of a <span class="t23 hoverable">high</span> <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t29 hoverable">order</span>
in the hierarchy supervising <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t26 t27 t29 hoverable">human</span> affairs, and
on much lower levels, what we may <span class="t3 t11 t18 t27 hoverable">call</span> the common
levels of nature, operating in a vast area, they
are guided for us by <span class="t1 t4 t8 t16 t21 t25 t29 hoverable">beings</span> of a lower <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t29 hoverable">order</span> in
the <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t5 t7 t8 t9 t11 t12 t13 t14 t16 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t29 hoverable">spiritual</span> hierarchy.
A <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">good</span> deal was said in the beginning of our
studies in reference to the periods which usually
elapse between incarnations. In my own first <span class="t1 t4 t7 t15 t18 t20 t27 hoverable">book</span>
on the subject, those who have read it may
remember that I spoke - under guidance of course
- of the intervening period which applied to the
average of mankind, as running from 1,500 to
2,000 years, during which, of course, <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">life</span> was
divided between astral conditions and Devachanic
or Manasic conditions. Only after this very ample
scope had been given for the exhaustion of all
the forces of the previous <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">life</span> did the entity
come back into incarnation. There was nothing
untrue in that statement at the time, but a very
remarkable condition of <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">things</span> has arisen since
that statement was put forward. We live in a very
remarkable period, remarkable not merely for its
extraordinary development of theosophical
<span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">knowledge</span> amongst us in the <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">world</span> at large, but
in other ways as well, and amongst other features
that are remarkable in this period is the

extraordinary acceleration of all processes which
have to do with <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t26 t27 t29 hoverable">human</span> evolution. I think we have
many of us noticed this acceleration as applied
to the phenomena of <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">life</span> around us, even in
reference to the changes that have been going on
on the <span class="t1 hoverable">physical</span> plane. Looking back over the past
fifty <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">years</span> we see that immense progress has been
made in science, in discovery, in moral
development, in religious <span class="t1 t2 t3 t5 t6 t7 t8 t10 t12 t14 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t25 t26 t29 hoverable">thought</span> all over the
world; and that acceleration has been going on
with even greater rapidity and energy on the
<span class="t1 t5 t11 t16 hoverable">higher</span> planes of nature. It has to do, of course,
with the difference between the downward and the
upward arcs of evolution. On the downward arc of
evolution - the <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">great</span> preparatory process of
<span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">nature</span> - progress is slow; on the upper arc of
the cycle it is quick, and we are beginning now,
having turned the corner as regards this <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">world</span>
period, to feel the accelerating influence of the
upward arc of evolution; and the accelerating
influence, I am told, has definitely operated
<span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t7 t8 t11 t12 t13 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t25 t29 hoverable">within</span> the last thirty years, to accelerate the
return to incarnation of such <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">people</span> as we are
talking about when we <span class="t9 t11 t20 t21 t22 t23 t27 hoverable">speak</span> of civilized
communities. I leave out of <span class="t3 t4 t5 t7 t8 t10 t12 t16 t19 t21 t24 t25 t26 t29 hoverable">account</span> those who are
on the Path; a condition that probably applies to
a <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">good</span> many of my readers, <span class="t10 t12 t16 t20 t21 t25 t26 t27 hoverable">whether</span> they are fully
aware of it or not, most likely to a majority of
those who <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">take</span> a real, deep and serious interest
in theosophical teaching. They come under the
operation of a new <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t11 t13 t14 t15 t16 t18 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">law</span> altogether, and their
incarnation may be accelerated far beyond any
such periods as we have been talking about. But
dealing with the general run of civilized
mankind, the acceleration is producing this
effect: for a considerable <span class="t3 t17 t26 hoverable">number</span> of advanced
Egos in the civilized world, a period of only
about <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">three</span> hundred <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">years</span> is now going to be an
average period for the intervening <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">time</span> between
lives. For a larger <span class="t3 t17 t26 hoverable">number</span> representing, of
course, a somewhat less evolved condition of
either <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t5 t7 t8 t9 t11 t12 t13 t14 t16 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t29 hoverable">spiritual</span> or intellectual growth, a seven
hundred year period is going to be the average,

and for probably a still larger <span class="t3 t17 t26 hoverable">number</span>
representing normal conditions of ordinary <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">life</span> a
<span class="t15 t23 hoverable">thousand</span> year period is going to be the average
instead of that fifteen hundred year period which

century.
We all <span class="t13 t14 t15 t18 t27 hoverable">heard</span> a <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">great</span> deal at the beginning of
theosophical <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">work</span> of the wonderful drift of
<span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">knowledge</span> from the Eastern <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">world</span> to the West. Ex
oriente lux is the most familiar maxim connected
with theosophical study and one which represents
a profound truth. But as so many other <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">things</span>
have changed in the process of time, a change is
coming over the <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t24 t25 t26 t28 t29 hoverable">whole</span> condition of what may
roughly be <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">called</span> the occult <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">world</span> in
incarnation. By that I mean the <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t24 t25 t26 t28 t29 hoverable">whole</span> <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">body</span> of
<span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">people</span> who are moving in the direction of <span class="t1 t5 t11 t16 hoverable">higher</span>
knowledge, who are gradually coming in
considerable numbers on to what we <span class="t3 t11 t18 t27 hoverable">call</span> the path
leading to the <span class="t1 t5 t11 t16 hoverable">higher</span> life, who are coming to
appreciate the openings of <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">knowledge</span> that have
been available for us in recent years. In former
times such <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">people</span> were more numerous in the
Eastern than in the Western world; and the
consequence <span class="t4 hoverable">used</span> to be that incarnations drifted,
in the <span class="t1 t3 t5 t16 t19 t25 hoverable">case</span> of <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">people</span> with distinct <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t5 t7 t8 t9 t11 t12 t13 t14 t16 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t29 hoverable">spiritual</span>
aspiration, from the Western <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">world</span> to the
Eastern. Indeed, when our theosophical teaching
began to excite interest here, I know that some
of my own friends aspired to Eastern incarnations
as probably conducive to more rapid <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t5 t7 t8 t9 t11 t12 t13 t14 t16 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t29 hoverable">spiritual</span>
growth than could be accomplished in any other
way. That idea I think was an erroneous
aspiration so far as it applied to any <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">people</span>
<span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t7 t8 t11 t12 t13 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t25 t29 hoverable">within</span> our own lifetime, <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">though</span> not erroneous in
times <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t24 t26 t27 t29 hoverable">long</span> gone by. But now it is distinctly out
of date. The drift of incarnation for those who
represent exalted conditions of preparedness for
<span class="t1 t5 t11 t16 hoverable">higher</span> things, is now rather from the East to the
West. The <span class="t0 t2 t3 t4 t5 t7 t8 t9 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">truth</span> of the <span class="t25 hoverable">matter</span> is that, although
we are so far only concerned with beginnings, the
Western <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">world</span> is going, in by no means a remote

future, to be the <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">great</span> radial centre from which
<span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t5 t7 t8 t9 t11 t12 t13 t14 t16 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t29 hoverable">spiritual</span> influence will spread over the
civilized world; and therefore, as I say, at the
present <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">time</span> such an aspiration as that which I
referred to a while ago as operative with some of

theosophical study, the <span class="t3 t8 t9 t10 t11 t18 t19 t20 hoverable">desire</span> for Eastern
incarnations, is wholly out of date. What we have
to do now is to recognize the duties that are
gradually coming to be incumbent on the Western
<span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">world</span> in connection with the <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t5 t7 t8 t9 t11 t12 t13 t14 t16 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t29 hoverable">spiritual</span> progress
of mankind.
Looking back to the beginning of civilization, to
the Atlantean period, when there was not any
Europe to talk about at all, all the development,
such as it was, both <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t5 t7 t8 t9 t11 t12 t13 t14 t16 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t29 hoverable">spiritual</span> and intellectual,
was centred in the Atlantean world. Of course the
Atlantean population gradually spread over the
<span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t24 t25 t26 t28 t29 hoverable">whole</span> of the habitable globe, and all that we now
<span class="t9 t11 t20 t21 t22 t23 t27 hoverable">speak</span> of as the Eastern <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">world</span> was, please to
remember, once Atlantean. Earlier sub-races of
the Atlantean period accounted for the earliest
populations, <span class="t10 t12 t16 t20 t21 t25 t26 t27 hoverable">whether</span> of India, of any part of
Central Asia, or of any part of the Eastern
world, and as the <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t5 t7 t8 t9 t11 t12 t13 t14 t16 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t29 hoverable">spiritual</span> civilization of
Atlantis became defiled by the growth of <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">evil</span> in
the shape of what we commonly <span class="t3 t11 t18 t27 hoverable">call</span> black
tendencies, so the best representatives of
advanced Atlantean spirituality migrated
eastward, and in that <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">way</span> established in the
Eastern <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">world</span> the <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">great</span> radiating centre of
<span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t5 t7 t8 t9 t11 t12 t13 t14 t16 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t29 hoverable">spiritual</span> energy in <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t6 t9 t10 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t27 t28 hoverable">days</span> gone by. And that
condition of <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">things</span> lasted for a very <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t24 t26 t27 t29 hoverable">long</span> while.
Of course at a period which again is a very <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t24 t26 t27 t29 hoverable">long</span>
while ago from our point of view, <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">two</span> or <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">three</span>
hundred <span class="t15 t23 hoverable">thousand</span> <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">years</span> ago, when Atlantean adepts
migrating from Atlantis proper to escape the <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">evil</span>
developments of its civilization, established
themselves in Egypt, they met another stream of
<span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t5 t7 t8 t9 t11 t12 t13 t14 t16 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t29 hoverable">spiritual</span> civilization flowing west-ward from
India and regions beyond India that had been
engendered, so to speak, by the fermentation of

loftier <span class="t1 t2 t3 t5 t6 t7 t8 t10 t12 t14 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t25 t26 t29 hoverable">thought</span> in the earlier races of the
Atlantean period. <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">Thus</span> when Atlantis ultimately

Eastern <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">world</span> have been developed and evolved in
what is now the Western world. So now the <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">great</span>
wave of spirituality is sweeping back again
towards the West. Ex oriente lux! From the East
the <span class="t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">light</span> is coming. But the very <span class="t4 t18 hoverable">use</span> of that
phrase indicates that it is moving westward. Some
Western Americans are fond of a boastful
expression: "Westward the Star of Empires takes
its way." I am not concerned for the moment with
the Star of Empire - but westward the <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">great</span>
forces of <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t5 t7 t8 t9 t11 t12 t13 t14 t16 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t29 hoverable">spiritual</span> energy and development are
distinctly moving. And we have to be worthy, as
it were, of that condition of things; we have to
rise to meet it.
If we properly appreciate our functions, they are
much more dignified than at the first glance
<span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">people</span> believe. The Theosophical <span class="t1 hoverable">Society</span> is
charged with the <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">great</span> task of leading <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t5 t7 t8 t9 t11 t12 t13 t14 t16 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t29 hoverable">spiritual</span>
progress in the Western world. The <span class="t1 hoverable">Society</span> is a
nucleus which in future generations, at no very
distant period, will be enormously expanded
beyond its present conditions, expanded let us
trust by virtue of the <span class="t24 hoverable">fact</span> that those who are
now concerned with it will appreciate the duties
incumbent on them, and act in a manner which may
pave the <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">way</span> for that further development which
undoubtedly is contemplated by <span class="t1 t5 t11 t16 hoverable">Higher</span> Powers as
the programme of the future. That can be carried
out if we can respond adequately to the influence
that they are radiating.
That is the most important <span class="t1 t2 t3 t5 t6 t7 t8 t10 t12 t14 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t25 t26 t29 hoverable">thought</span> that I have to
deal with just now, but there are one or <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">two</span>

other minor matters having to do with
misconceptions or misunderstandings of
theosophical teaching, which seem trivial and
almost trumpery compared with those which I have
been talking about, but which none the less claim
notice. I am referring to views which are
sometimes put forward, connecting aspirations for
<span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t5 t7 t8 t9 t11 t12 t13 t14 t16 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t29 hoverable">spiritual</span> growth and progress with questions
relating to what we <span class="t28 hoverable">eat</span> and drink or refrain from
eating and drinking. Now this is a very delicate
subject which has been a <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">good</span> deal discussed by
theosophical writers lately, and in reference to
which I am very anxious not to be misunderstood
myself by theosophical friends. No one can
entertain a more definitely appreciative
admiration for what may roughly be <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">called</span>
superior or cleaner modes of life, as compared
with those of the multitude, that I myself; but I
do venture to say - and I say it on authority
that I respect - that however beautiful in its
conception purer diet may be, that "perfect <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">way</span>
in diet" that Mrs. Kingsford so admirably wrote
about many <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">years</span> ago has nothing to do with
<span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t5 t7 t8 t9 t11 t12 t13 t14 t16 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t29 hoverable">spiritual</span> progress. That is all that I am driving
at. Do not let <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">people</span> who, <span class="t10 t12 t16 t20 t21 t25 t26 t27 hoverable">whether</span> for reasons of
health, conveninence, family environment, or for
any other reasons worthy of consideration, <span class="t11 t12 t22 t25 t27 hoverable">find</span>
it difficult to adopt the rules of the perfect
<span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">way</span> in diet - do not let them suppose that in any
<span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">way</span> they are prejudicing their <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t5 t7 t8 t9 t11 t12 t13 t14 t16 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t29 hoverable">spiritual</span> growth
by disregarding them. That is all I am
emphasizing. The all-important consideration in
regard to <span class="t1 hoverable">physical</span> <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">life</span> - I am not speaking now
of the moral attributes that should guide our
conduct in <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">life</span> - our all-important duty in
regard to the <span class="t1 hoverable">physical</span> instrument with which we
have to <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">work</span> when we are trying to do the right
<span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t13 t15 t16 t20 t21 t22 t23 hoverable">thing</span> in this life, is that we should keep it in
health. And at the present time, when most of our
bodies - not our Egos, but most of our bodies may have come down through a line of heredity
familiarized with the old-fashioned diet, it does
not always happen that the present

representatives of that line can be healthy on an
entirely new régime. That is the important point
to remember. Your duty, so to speak, to the <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">body</span>
is to keep it in health, and you must determine
for yourself what particular course of <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">life</span> in
regard to this <span class="t25 hoverable">matter</span> of eating and drinking is
best calculated to have that effect. I have made
efforts to get information on this subject from
exalted teachers. I think I have succeeded, and
of course what I have been saying to you is the
outcome of such success. Going more into detail,
it may be recognized that in a certain very
limited <span class="t0 t2 t3 t4 t5 t8 t10 t17 t19 t25 t26 hoverable">sense</span> it is <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">true</span> that what, for want of a
better term, we <span class="t3 t11 t18 t27 hoverable">call</span> "magnetism" of a bad <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t29 hoverable">order</span>
does attach to meat as a food. It has a very
slight influence, and I am told that those who
look on from a <span class="t1 t5 t11 t16 hoverable">higher</span> plane at the efforts of
some vegetarian thinkers to follow the perfect
<span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">way</span> in diet, are rather amused to see that they
ignore this question of magnetism as between
various kinds of vegetable food. If there is any
point in the idea that certain foods have a bad
magnetism, then certain kinds of vegetable foods
have a bad magnetism to just the same extent as
meat, and in neither <span class="t1 t3 t5 t16 t19 t25 hoverable">case</span> does that <span class="t25 hoverable">matter</span>
seriously. The same applies to alcohol with
slightly greater emphasis. And again the question
is <span class="t10 t12 t16 t20 t21 t25 t26 t27 hoverable">whether</span> <span class="t1 hoverable">physical</span> heredity is of such an <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t29 hoverable">order</span>
as to render any particular <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">body</span> incapable of
maintaining health and efficiency for whatever
<span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">work</span> it has to do, <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">without</span> some little of that
otherwise undesirable beverage.
One other theory claims notice in this connection
- that which relates to the habit of smoking. Let
nobody be under the impression - if they are
inclined to attach any importance to the
information I have been priviliged to obtain that there is any harm in that practice in regard
to the conditions it engenders in the <span class="t1 hoverable">physical</span>
body, in reference to health, to <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t5 t7 t8 t9 t11 t12 t13 t14 t16 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t29 hoverable">spiritual</span> or
moral progress, or to any of the loftier duties
of life. It is perfectly harmless; it has no bad

effect on astral or etheric conditions - in
moderation of course. We always assume that we
are talking to <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">people</span> who are not going to
extremes in the pursuit of any pleasures of a
<span class="t1 hoverable">physical</span> order. But <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t7 t8 t11 t12 t13 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t25 t29 hoverable">within</span> reasonable limits that
particular practice, I am told, has a rather
beneficial effect than otherwise on the etheric
conditions of <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">people</span> who live in modern
communities, <span class="t5 hoverable">full</span> of astral swirls of all kinds
and of a complicated order. There remains only
one other remark to make on this subject, that of
course in reference to smoking, however agreeable
and innocent it may be in itself, nobody who is
thinking along the lines that are probably
operative with theosophical students <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">would</span> dream
of doing anything of that kind in a manner which
<span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">would</span> be disagreeable to others. That is the clue
to the correct understanding of this matter. It
hinges on to very much loftier principles,
because the idea that we should do nothing for
our own sake which is injurious to the comfort or
welfare of other <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">people</span> is a crude <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">way</span> of putting
the fundamental conception which has to do with
<span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t5 t7 t8 t9 t11 t12 t13 t14 t16 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t29 hoverable">spiritual</span> progress in all its aspects. We are not
segregated atoms in consciousness, living only
for our individual selves; we are simply parts of
a stupendous design, the identity of ourselves
with which at some future period we shall fully
realize, as we may now even intellectually
appreciate it. That idea can never be
misunderstood, because of its utter simplicity.
Simple on this plane, it is equally simple and
equally <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">true</span> on planes above, and is the one idea
which, if it thoroughly saturates our
understanding, and becomes the guide of <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">life</span> and
action, will render <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">people</span> theosophists in the
truest acceptation of the term.

THE SUPER-PHYSICAL LAWS OF <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">NATURE</span>
TO <span class="t9 t11 t20 t21 t22 t23 t27 hoverable">speak</span> of the change which has come over the
public mind, or that portion of the public <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">mind</span>
which represents the advanced culture of the
period, as a movement of thought, is, in truth,
to <span class="t4 t18 hoverable">use</span> an inadequate expression, for that
movement is largely due to an inflow of new
<span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">knowledge</span> and information concerning the superphysical mysteries of nature, which were not at
the disposal of those who, in the middle of the
last century, represented the incredulity which
then prevailed in reference to all matters having
to do with mystic research. Those of us <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">whose</span>
memories stretch back to the middle of the last
century will remember how determined and
contemptuous that incredulity generally was. To
attain any <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">knowledge</span> concerning super-physical
states of <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t26 t27 t29 hoverable">human</span> <span class="t1 t7 t9 t12 t14 t19 t29 hoverable">consciousness</span> was held to be
eternally impossible. Sporadic phenomena,
reported from <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">time</span> to <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">time</span> as indicating that it
might be possible to obtain communication with
the surviving <span class="t1 t7 t9 t12 t14 t19 t29 hoverable">consciousness</span> of <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">people</span> who had
departed this life, were treated as <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">though</span> of
necessity they represented imposture and fraud.
Stories of clairvoyance, and records of curious
results obtained by mesmerism, fortune-telling,
in all its curious varieties, <span class="t10 t12 t16 t20 t21 t25 t26 t27 hoverable">whether</span> concerned
with cards, palmistry, or astrology, and all the
confused traditions of medieval magic, were
lumped up <span class="t1 t2 t3 t5 t6 t9 t11 t15 t17 t18 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">together</span> as representing ignorant
superstition. The Science of the period, dealing
exclusively with the phenomena of <span class="t25 hoverable">matter</span> - with
theories that could be substantiated by <span class="t1 hoverable">physical</span>
experiment - was enthroned in public esteem, not
merely, as it deserved, by <span class="t1 t3 t8 t25 hoverable">reason</span> of representing
a magnificent development of <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t26 t27 t29 hoverable">human</span> intelligence,
but as expressive of finality in regard to <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t26 t27 t29 hoverable">human</span>
knowledge; not finality along the lines of its
own activity, but finality as regards the
character of such knowledge, held to be
necessarily limited by the resources of <span class="t1 hoverable">physical</span>
sense. Philosophy even, vaguely conscious of

something beyond the characteristics of matter,
did not hesitate to describe whatever lay beyond
the reach of <span class="t1 hoverable">physical</span> research as "unknowable,"
and those who ventured to attempt the exploration
of the unseen or intangible mysteries of Nature,
did so at the expense of being treated with
contempt by the orthodox opinion of their time.
But <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">without</span> stopping to trace the steps by which
the <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">great</span> change has been <span class="t0 t4 t6 t8 t9 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t17 t19 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">brought</span> about, what is
the actual <span class="t1 t2 t5 t8 t10 t16 t19 hoverable">state</span> of <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">things</span> which we have now to
recognize as distinguishing the <span class="t1 t2 t3 t5 t6 t7 t8 t10 t12 t14 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t25 t26 t29 hoverable">thought</span> of our
own period? To begin with, those who feel
themselves in possession of certain <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">knowledge</span> to
the effect that it is possible to communicate
with those who have been passed on to other
states of existence, are to be counted by
millions both in Europe and America. Their
conviction does not imply that it is always
possible to command such communication in
individual cases. The laws relating to all such
methods are, as yet, but imperfectly understood;
but the broad certainty that, under some
circumstances, such communication is possible, is
enough to establish the main principle that <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t26 t27 t29 hoverable">human</span>
<span class="t1 t7 t9 t12 t14 t19 t29 hoverable">consciousness</span> survives the change <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">called</span> death,
and it is impossible to overrate the value of the
widespread conviction to that effect permeating
our civilization, in which the progress of
<span class="t1 hoverable">physical</span> science was tending in the opposite
direction, while the influence of religious
teaching was insufficient to counteract that
tendency. Concurrently with the growth of
confidence in the main idea represented by
spiritualism, the various manifestations of
Nature's finer forces operative amongst those
still in <span class="t1 hoverable">physical</span> <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">life</span> have been steadily
securing attention. Psychic research became, by
degrees, not merely emancipated from the
intolerance it formerly encountered, but has been
gradually established amongst us as almost a
fashionable pursuit. Mesmerism, so fiercely
flouted in the beginning, became recognized, in

some of its aspects, at all events, as a curative
agent in some conditions of disease, and <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">though</span>
ill-understood as <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">yet</span> by those who only know it
under the modern and misleading designation
"hypnotism," is actually recognized as a system
of treatment by many orthodox practitioners. And,
sharing in the growing changes of opinion, the
fascination of fortune-telling in all its
varieties has proved only too attractive to many
enthusiasts of our generation. Finally we have to
recognize that in the scientifc <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">world</span> itself, a
few, at all events, of those most distinguished
in research, and many indeed beside those who
have had the courage to acknowledge their
conviction, are conscious already that they are
standing on the threshold of a new scientifc
dispensation, in which super-physical laws and
super-physical faculties must be made available
by those <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">whose</span> destiny it may be to expound the
natural philosophy of the future. Problems
connected with the ether, the electron, and
unseen emanations from the Sun, credited with the
production of those curious phenomena known as
magnetic storms, are all of them imperatively in
need of illumination of a kind that can only be
derived from super-physical investgation. The
present situation is <span class="t5 hoverable">full</span> of promise for
developments, at no distant future, which will
involve in the embrace of recognized science the
resources and achievements of occultism.
That is the change that has <span class="t7 t10 t12 t26 hoverable">taken</span> <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">place</span> <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t7 t8 t11 t12 t13 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t25 t29 hoverable">within</span>
the last five and twenty or thirty years. Beyond
the influence of spiritualism, to which I have
already referred, what are the other influences
which have <span class="t0 t4 t6 t8 t9 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t17 t19 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">brought</span> it about?
I am not eager to claim credit in any exclusive
degree or to any predominant extent for the
literature which, <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t7 t8 t11 t12 t13 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t25 t29 hoverable">within</span> the period to which I
refer, has been devoted to the exposition of that
teaching generally known as Theosophy, but it
<span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">would</span> be affectation to suppose that the change

has not been attributable, in some measure, to
the wide diffusion of that clearly-defined,
coherent, scientific interpretation of a vast
<span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">body</span> of natural <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t11 t13 t14 t15 t16 t18 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">law</span> relating to <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t26 t27 t29 hoverable">human</span> evolution
which the literature of Theosophy has put at the
disposal of the cultured <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">world</span> since that system
of teaching was first formulated in approximate
detail. <span class="t10 t12 t16 t20 t21 t25 t26 t27 hoverable">Whether</span> it has been the cause or the
effect of the <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">great</span> change in modern <span class="t1 t2 t3 t5 t6 t7 t8 t10 t12 t14 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t25 t26 t29 hoverable">thought</span>
which I have been endeavouring to trace, no one
who has adequately studied theosophical teaching
will deny that for the first <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">time</span> in the overt
history of <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t26 t27 t29 hoverable">human</span> enlightenment it presents us
with a complete theory of life; reaching back to
its beginnings, reaching forward to its
possibilities, and incidentally foreshadowing the
ultimate synthesis into a complete science of
super-physical nature, of all the miscellaneous
phenomena with which psychic research is
concerned. Spiritualism established the reality
of a future life, but aimed, I venture to think,
as regards its original inspiration, at nothing
more. Occult research, independently of
spiritualism, has established the <span class="t24 hoverable">fact</span> that <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t26 t27 t29 hoverable">human</span>
consciousness, still expressed in incarnation,
has resources at its disposal far transcending in
their significance the senses of the <span class="t1 hoverable">physical</span>
body. Theosophy, accepting and interpreting these
conclusions, has illuminated, for our benefit,
the <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t24 t25 t26 t28 t29 hoverable">whole</span> scheme of <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t26 t27 t29 hoverable">human</span> evolution, the laws
governing <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t5 t7 t8 t9 t11 t12 t13 t14 t16 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t29 hoverable">spiritual</span> progress, the possibilities
awaiting mankind in a remote future, the
continuity of <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">life</span> in successive manifestations
on this <span class="t1 hoverable">physical</span> plane of existence, and the
growth of the soul, under the influence of the
experience which those successive manifestations
afford. No hurried phrases of this <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">nature</span> can
adequately convey to minds, as <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">yet</span> unfamiliar
with the literature of Theosophy, a complete
comprehension of its sublime significance. But in
<span class="t0 t2 t3 t4 t5 t7 t8 t9 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">truth</span> the teaching itself, when properly
understood, enables us to realize that everyone
who aspires sooner or later to realize the

potentialities of <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t26 t27 t29 hoverable">human</span> progress, must absorb
that teaching into his <span class="t1 t7 t9 t12 t14 t19 t29 hoverable">consciousness</span> as a
necessary preparation for the efforts he will be
<span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">called</span> <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">upon</span> to make, in connection with his
ulterior development.
This statement may seem extravagant, but will be
readily appreciated by those who have studied,
with any degree of earnestness, the fundamental
principles of <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t26 t27 t29 hoverable">human</span> evolution rendered apparent
by the teaching of the <span class="t1 t5 t11 t16 hoverable">Higher</span> Occultism. Ignoring
detail, we are able to perceive the <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t24 t25 t26 t28 t29 hoverable">whole</span> scheme
of <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t26 t27 t29 hoverable">human</span> evolution as divided into <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">two</span> mighty
halves, during the first of which the forces of
<span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">Nature</span> carry forward the <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t26 t27 t29 hoverable">human</span> Ego to a stage of
development fairly represented by the average
culture of our own time. But the subtle forces
generated by the Ego itself are essential to the
ulterior progress during the <span class="t2 t3 t5 t10 t12 t18 t19 t21 t24 t25 t26 t27 hoverable">second</span> <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">great</span> half of
the evolutionary period, and these cannot be
<span class="t0 t4 t6 t8 t9 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t17 t19 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">brought</span> into activity <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">without</span> a clear
comprehension of the design they are intended to
subserve. To the half-way period of the <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t24 t25 t26 t28 t29 hoverable">whole</span>
journey, <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">Nature</span> brings us <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">without</span> claiming any
help from ourselves; the next half of the journey
can only be accomplished by the union of our own
enlightened will with the forces which <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">Nature</span>
will still contribute to assist us in our upward
growth.
The phrase I have employed as the title of this
essay may not at once be intelligible, but if I
had not shrunk from expanding it to inconvenient
length, I should have rendered it more
unintelligible still by employing the <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">words</span> <span class="t4 hoverable">used</span>
with a double signification, proposing to deal,
not merely with the super-physical aspect of
natural forces, but also with the natural aspect
of super-physical forces. The inversion of the
phrase may not at once convey a specific meaning,
but I venture to think that before I have done
its significance will be clearly appreciated, and
in <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t29 hoverable">order</span> that what I have to say may be at once

intelligible in its bearing on the main idea, let
me explain very concisely at the outset the
conclusions I shall endeavor to reach.
I want to show, first of all, that the forces
with which we are all familiar, in their
relationship with matter, the laws of <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">Nature</span> as
they are commonly called, can only be correctly
understood if we think of them as the expression
of <span class="t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">Divine</span> Will consciously operating to produce
the effects we observe, and, secondly, that while
the effects we observe, in connection with the
consequences of action - with all that has to do
with our appreciation of right and wrong, <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">good</span>
and evil, and moral principle - can readily
enough be associated with the idea of <span class="t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">Divine</span>
will, embodying sanction or disapproval, they are
none the less to be recognized as a vast
department of natural law, which, <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">though</span> dealing
with resources of a super-physical <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">nature</span> beyond
the reach of experimental research, constitute
none the less a department of natural <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t11 t13 t14 t15 t16 t18 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">law</span> as
uniform and definite as those which have to do
with the behaviour of matter.
We <span class="t11 t12 t22 t25 t27 hoverable">find</span> ourselves in this world, under conditions
which enable us to recognize it as an arena of
<span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t5 t7 t8 t9 t11 t12 t13 t14 t16 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t29 hoverable">spiritual</span> evolution; but it is even more
obviously an arena of a complicated system of <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t11 t13 t14 t15 t16 t18 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">law</span>
relating to <span class="t1 hoverable">physical</span> matter, and in reference to
this <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">great</span> <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">body</span> of <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t11 t13 t14 t15 t16 t18 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">law</span> we may even extend our
observation beyond the limits <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t7 t8 t11 t12 t13 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t25 t29 hoverable">within</span> which, as a
rule, I think it <span class="t8 t12 t17 hoverable">wise</span> to confine our attention.
In presence of attempts sometimes made to
interpret or speculate concerning the origin and
<span class="t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">Divine</span> government of the <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t24 t25 t26 t28 t29 hoverable">whole</span> universe, I have
often ventured to suggest that it is unwise to do
more than endeavour to comprehend the origin and
purpose of our Solar System. At the best, in
reference to that, we can never hope to do more
than obtain fragmentary conceptions, and dimly to
picture in the <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">mind</span> the story of its origin and
the theory of its final perfection. But in

reference to <span class="t1 hoverable">physical</span> <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t11 t13 t14 t15 t16 t18 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">law</span> we are enabled to
perceive that the code which is manifestly
operative in the Solar System is certainly, to
some extent - possibly in its entirety applicable to the innumerable systems distributed
through the infinitudes of space. It is certain,
for example, that the fundamental <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t11 t13 t14 t15 t16 t18 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">law</span> of
gravitation, governing all masses of <span class="t25 hoverable">matter</span>
<span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t7 t8 t11 t12 t13 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t25 t29 hoverable">within</span> our view, is also operative in distant
systems of a wholly different <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t29 hoverable">order</span> where a dual
or multiple system of Suns can be distinctly
observed as obedient to the <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t11 t13 t14 t15 t16 t18 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">law</span> which governs the
motion of our own planets in their orbits. And
beyond this the resources of spectroscopic
observation enable us to identify, in distant
Suns, some of the varieties under which <span class="t25 hoverable">matter</span>
manifests to us in our laboratories, and to
speculate, not unreasonably, on the probability
that the so-called chemical elements with which
we are acquainted here are also the materials of
which distant Solar Systems are constructed, and
which, most probably, are obedient in such
systems to the same laws of chemical affinity
that we are enabled to investigate in handling
those elements on earth. The value of this
observation has to do, of course, with the manner
in which it tends to suggest an otherwise
unrecoginizable unity in the <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t24 t25 t26 t28 t29 hoverable">whole</span> cosmos, even
if it is hardly profitable for us to pursue that
idea much farther. But <span class="t10 t12 t16 t20 t21 t25 t26 t27 hoverable">whether</span> we think of the
natural laws affecting <span class="t25 hoverable">matter</span> in their cosmic or
in their more limited aspect, we cannot but be
equally driven to the conclusion that the <span class="t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">Divine</span>
Power, which builds up definite worlds and
systems, impresses on the complex organisms <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">thus</span>
<span class="t16 hoverable">created</span> the characteristics they exhibit when the
<span class="t1 t2 t3 t5 t9 t12 t15 t16 t17 t19 t22 t24 t25 t26 hoverable">creation</span> is accomplished.
Along the lines of ordinary astronomical
speculation, as also by the <span class="t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">light</span> of esoteric
teaching, we are enabled to formulate a broad
conception of the manner in which the worlds of a
system like our own are built up by the

aggregation in the first instance of relatively
homogenous <span class="t25 hoverable">matter</span> available throughout space.
Astronomy deals with the development of Suns and
planets, from nebulæ; occult teaching follows
along somewhat the same path, <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">though</span> going back a
little earlier in the story, and recognizing the
formation of the nebulæ as the result of <span class="t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">Divine</span>
Will operating on the infinite expanse of etheric
substance. But <span class="t10 t12 t16 t20 t21 t25 t26 t27 hoverable">whether</span> we imagine that by virtue
of laws pervading the Universe, etheric <span class="t25 hoverable">matter</span>
when aggregated into <span class="t1 hoverable">physical</span> molecules is
inherently invested with the <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">power</span> of endowing
those molecules with the attributes we recognize
in the chemical elements, or <span class="t10 t12 t16 t20 t21 t25 t26 t27 hoverable">whether</span> we imagine a
Will which, by the first hypothesis, emanates
from some cosmic influence, to be reproduced by
the will of the <span class="t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">Divine</span> <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">Power</span> to which our system
is directly due, the same conclusion emerges from
either hypothesis. The attributes of matter,
constituting in their entirety that which we
describe as the laws of Nature, are the
expression of <span class="t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">Divine</span> Will, either consciously
operating throughout the Universe directly, or
indirectly passed on through the will of the
<span class="t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">Divine</span> <span class="t1 t4 t8 t16 t21 t25 t29 hoverable">Beings</span> to whom the <span class="t11 t16 hoverable">existence</span> of each Solar
System is due. And apart from the general force
of reasonable speculation along these lines, I
have been incidentally assured that clairvoyant
observation of a <span class="t23 hoverable">high</span> <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t29 hoverable">order</span> will confirm this
conclusion in a curious and interesting way.
To render this suggestion intelligible we must
remember, of course, that wherever we <span class="t9 t11 t20 t21 t22 t23 t27 hoverable">speak</span> of
<span class="t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">Divine</span> Will operating in regions of <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">Nature</span> <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t7 t8 t11 t12 t13 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t25 t29 hoverable">within</span>
our own purview, we have to understand that it
operates through a vast hierarchy of subordinate
agency. Such agency has, of course, to be
recognized as associated with varieties of
<span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t5 t7 t8 t9 t11 t12 t13 t14 t16 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t29 hoverable">spiritual</span> evolution quite independent of the
<span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t26 t27 t29 hoverable">human</span> kingdom; and in dealing with these, we are,
of course, moving through a region of <span class="t1 t2 t3 t5 t6 t7 t8 t10 t12 t14 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t25 t26 t29 hoverable">thought</span> in
which manifestation is obscure, and observation
extremely difficult. But none the less, I have

know it to be asserted by qualified observers
whom I have been disposed to trust, that where
important resarches, connected with some of the
<span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">great</span> laws of Nature, have been in progress,
<span class="t1 t4 t8 t16 t21 t25 t29 hoverable">beings</span> of some super-human <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t29 hoverable">order</span> have actually
been present, watching or perhaps guiding the
progress of <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t26 t27 t29 hoverable">human</span> enlightenment in connection
with the departments of <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">Nature</span> it is their duty
to preside over. If this be actually the case, it
serves to emphasize the main idea with which I am
at present concerned, the direct bearing of
conscious will on the laws of matter, which, at
cruder stages of <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t26 t27 t29 hoverable">human</span> thought, the science of
the period contrived to regard as compatible with
an atheistic contempt for all conceptions
relating to a <span class="t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">Divine</span> origin. That worship of
<span class="t25 hoverable">matter</span> per se which characterized a certain
variety of scientific thought, in the last
century, is no less ludicrously discredited by
the illuminated <span class="t14 t24 hoverable">intelligence</span> represented by the
<span class="t1 t5 t11 t16 hoverable">Higher</span> Occultism, than the equally crude
conception of primitive theology which, while
