certainly recognizing <span class="t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">Divine</span> <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">Power</span> as a factor in
the Universe, assumed it to be operative in a <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">way</span>
which we now perceive to be as little in harmony
with the <span class="t0 t2 t3 t4 t5 t7 t8 t9 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">truth</span> of <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">things</span> as the grosser
materialistic belief. The notion that the <span class="t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">Divine</span>
Being does no more than pronounce a word, in
<span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t29 hoverable">order</span> that natural phenomena shall be evoked,
fully armed, ex nihilo, is hardly less absurd,
hardly less derogatory to the <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">nature</span> of Divinity
than the opposite belief that <span class="t25 hoverable">matter</span> existed from
the eternity of the past, and can, by its own
combinations, give rise to <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t26 t27 t29 hoverable">human</span> consciousness.
Even our comprehension of the natural machinery
by means of which <span class="t1 hoverable">physical</span> effects are produced
may serve, for instance, to put a new complexion
on the <span class="t1 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t17 t18 t19 t24 t25 t26 t28 t29 hoverable">meaning</span> of the familiar expression, "Let
there be light." That the sensation in <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t26 t27 t29 hoverable">human</span>
<span class="t1 t7 t9 t12 t14 t19 t29 hoverable">consciousness</span> of <span class="t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">light</span> is an expression of <span class="t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">Divine</span>
Will, is emphatically one of the ideas I am eager
to emphasize, but we know that the result is

produced by the complicated mechanism of etheric
vibration, and that Divinity had a more
complicated task to perform, in providing for the
sensation of light, than <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">would</span> have been evolved
in the simple utterance of a decree. The
behaviour of the ether, in conveying vibrations
from distant sources of light, to the planets
requiring illumination, is complicated to that
degree that our investigations, as yet, have but
vaguely hinted at some of its complexities; but
the illustration serves to suggest the <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">way</span> in
which the results aimed at in <span class="t1 t2 t3 t5 t9 t12 t15 t16 t17 t19 t22 t24 t25 t26 hoverable">creation</span> are
obtained by what, relatively to early theological
belief, must be regarded as elaborate and
laborious methods; methods almost certainly,
associated with a stupendous hierarchy of
subordinate agencies reflecting the <span class="t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">Divine</span> Will
at every stage of the process.
But so far I have been dealing only with half the
idea I want to convey; that which is, in a
certain sense, the least important half, because
it involves ideas which, independently of occult
research, will probably be found floating in the
<span class="t1 t2 t3 t5 t6 t7 t8 t10 t12 t14 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t25 t26 t29 hoverable">thought</span> of the period, <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">though</span> perhaps, in most
cases, more vaguely than when clarified by a
broad and comprehensive appreciation of the
world's evolution, as a whole. The expansion of
the idea into the region of intangible cause and
effect, is certainly not <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">yet</span> familiar to ordinary
psychological speculation. But, to begin with,
all of us who have been appreciative of
Theosophical teaching on the comprehensive scale,
will be familiar with the idea that what is known
as the <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t11 t13 t14 t15 t16 t18 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">law</span> of Karma, is a <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t11 t13 t14 t15 t16 t18 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">law</span> operative on the
moral plane, as definitely as the <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t11 t13 t14 t15 t16 t18 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">law</span> of
gravitation controls the region of <span class="t1 hoverable">physical</span>
manifestation. But that <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t11 t13 t14 t15 t16 t18 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">law</span> is generally <span class="t1 t2 t3 t5 t6 t7 t8 t10 t12 t14 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t25 t26 t29 hoverable">thought</span>
of as a vague expression of <span class="t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">Divine</span> Will; and even
with such opportunity as may be furnished by
familiarity, in some cases, with the evolution of
specific Egos through a <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t24 t26 t27 t29 hoverable">long</span> series of lives,
<span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">though</span> it is exceeding difficult to recognize it

as working with the regularity so plainly
observable when we are dealing with the laws of
<span class="t1 hoverable">physical</span> Nature, nevertheless, we do broadly
recognize the idea that conduct in <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">life</span> of a
specific <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t29 hoverable">order</span> is productive of definite
consequences, following an inevitable rule, and
not subject in each <span class="t1 t3 t5 t16 t19 t25 hoverable">case</span> to specific judgements
resembling those of a <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t26 t27 t29 hoverable">human</span> autocrat. None the
less, however, when we think of Karma, <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">good</span> or
bad, as operative to produce agreeable or painful
conditions in the <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">life</span> or lives following any
action in question, it is difficult to get out of
the habit of thinking that the Ego concerned has
somehow been the subject of a judgement. The
<span class="t1 hoverable">physical</span> laws of <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">Nature</span> seem so fundamentally
welded with <span class="t25 hoverable">matter</span> that it is only with a mental
effort we can comprehend them as in <span class="t0 t2 t3 t4 t5 t7 t8 t9 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">truth</span> the
expression of a conscious will emanating from, or
reflected from, conscious will on some level of
<span class="t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">Divine</span> existence. On the other hand, the moral
aspects of conduct, the rightness or wrongness of
specific action, suggest instinctively the idea
that their conformity, or non-conformity, with
the intentions of God, is the explanation of
their rightness or their wrongness. In this <span class="t1 t3 t5 t16 t19 t25 hoverable">case</span>
a mental effort is required to establish the
conception that the <span class="t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">Divine</span> will is so
marvellously penetrating and precise in its
operation that it cannot any longer be <span class="t1 t2 t3 t5 t6 t7 t8 t10 t12 t14 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t25 t26 t29 hoverable">thought</span> of
as due, so to speak, to capricious spasms of
admiration or disapproval, but is as uniform in
its operation as the <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t11 t13 t14 t15 t16 t18 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">law</span> of gravitation - as
complex in its character as the laws of chemical
affinity. It is Law, enacted once for all and
applicable to all conceivable varieties of
circumstances.
The conception with which we are <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">thus</span> inevitably
faced by a profound study of the <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t24 t25 t26 t28 t29 hoverable">whole</span> subject,
is that the <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t24 t25 t26 t28 t29 hoverable">whole</span> scheme of morals, in the
broadest acceptation of that term, is governed by
a <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">body</span> of <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t11 t13 t14 t15 t16 t18 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">law</span> as comprehensive as the <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t11 t13 t14 t15 t16 t18 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">law</span> of
gravitation, as detailed as those which are

studied in chemical laboratories, where the will
of God, in reference to matter, is investigated
by experiment and even guided, by the <span class="t8 t11 t14 t19 hoverable">free</span> will
of man, towards purposes we may <span class="t3 t8 t9 t10 t11 t18 t19 t20 hoverable">desire</span> to
subserve. And just as the <span class="t1 hoverable">physical</span> <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t11 t13 t14 t15 t16 t18 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">law</span> is
operative, not merely with <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">great</span> masses of
matter, but with microscopic morsels, or even
with ultra-microscopic particles, so the moral
<span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t11 t13 t14 t15 t16 t18 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">law</span> can penetrate the smallest crevices of our
moral nature, dealing as appropriately with the
pettiest short-comings, with the feeblest
aspirations upward, as with the grandest
achievements of philanthropy or the foulest
varieties of crime.
It must be allowed that we cannot easily escape
from old habits of thought, nor give up the trick
of thinking of any particular faculty we may
possess as a gift of Nature, of any suffering we
may be <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">called</span> <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">upon</span> to endure as a chastisement
inflicted by a <span class="t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">Divine</span> <span class="t0 t2 t5 t7 t12 t17 t19 t20 t27 t29 hoverable">Master</span> for our good. We
retain, in many cases, even the habit of
regarding "our daily bread" as something which is
given to us "this day," and for which it is
decent, on our part, to return thanks, as we sit
down to table. Such habits of <span class="t1 t2 t3 t5 t6 t7 t8 t10 t12 t14 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t25 t26 t29 hoverable">thought</span> are pretty
and harmless in their place, for <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">people</span> who do
not care to penetrate, with open eyes, into the
mysteries of life, who are content with the
simplicities of a reverent attitude and
unconsciously content to wait till a later
opportunity for realizing that nothing can excite
a more profoundly reverential attitude of <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">mind</span>
than a clear vision, reaching in, or up, to the
actual <span class="t0 t2 t3 t4 t5 t7 t8 t9 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">truth</span> of things. But the Occult student
need not be the slave of any tradition, however
useful it may have been in its time, and if the
idea I am endeavouring to suggest is rightly
apprehended, it can never present itself to any
<span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">mind</span> as at war with the reverential spirit. On
the contrary, it is calculated to enhance our
reverence for the <span class="t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">Divine</span> <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">Power</span> above, when we
realize that the <span class="t12 t20 t25 t26 t29 hoverable">wisdom</span> that guides its exercise

is sufficiently profound, extensive, and
penetrating to formulate laws which deal with all
the varieties of moral condition to which the
<span class="t8 t11 t14 t19 hoverable">free</span> will of mankind, an essential factor in
<span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t5 t7 t8 t9 t11 t12 t13 t14 t16 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t29 hoverable">spiritual</span> evolution, can possibly give rise.
Nor when the almost infinite resources of <span class="t8 t11 t14 t19 hoverable">free</span>
will <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t7 t8 t11 t12 t13 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t25 t29 hoverable">within</span> the domain of <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t11 t13 t14 t15 t16 t18 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">law</span> are recognized,
will the recognition of an all-pervading system
of moral <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t11 t13 t14 t15 t16 t18 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">law</span> be, in any way, confusion to the
mind. At the present stage of average <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t26 t27 t29 hoverable">human</span>
development, that element of <span class="t8 t11 t14 t19 hoverable">free</span> will <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t7 t8 t11 t12 t13 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t25 t29 hoverable">within</span>
<span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t26 t27 t29 hoverable">human</span> <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">nature</span> is hardly illuminated with
sufficient <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">knowledge</span> to render it capable, so to
speak, of steering a chosen path through the
complexities of the law. But the law, itself,
provides compensation for the embarrassments of
ignorance while ignorance prevails, at the same
<span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">time</span> that it provides opportunity for the
exercise of <span class="t8 t11 t14 t19 hoverable">free</span> will, when a later stage more
enlightened <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">knowledge</span> shall guide its exercise.
Nor even need we cast aside the early
anthropomorphic conception of Divinity which
appealed to the saintship of a more primitive
age, and responded to the <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t5 t7 t8 t9 t11 t12 t13 t14 t16 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t29 hoverable">spiritual</span> thirst of
humanity for a <span class="t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">Divine</span> <span class="t2 hoverable">object</span> of worship,
sufficiently like ourselves to excite adoration
and love. We who are, at present, concerned with
the attempt to comprehend the <span class="t1 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t17 t18 t19 t24 t25 t26 t28 t29 hoverable">meaning</span> of the
<span class="t1 t5 t11 t16 hoverable">Higher</span> Occultism, may be embarrassed, for a time,
by finding it impossible to retain
anthropomorphic conceptions of Divinity while, as
yet, our <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">knowledge</span> is insufficient to picture in
imagination the Divinity which, in some
mysterious fashion, is at once, as it were, the
fountain of the <span class="t0 t2 t5 t7 t8 t13 t15 t17 t18 t21 t22 t23 t26 t27 t28 hoverable">love</span> principle and the
destination of that principle as it <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t10 t11 t13 t14 t15 t16 t18 t19 t20 t21 t24 t25 t29 hoverable">works</span> in our
own nature. To suppose that the <span class="t1 t5 t11 t16 hoverable">Higher</span> Occultism,
because it puts aside some of the crude fancies
of humanity's childhood, embodies a hard, cold,
or unsympathetic conception of <span class="t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">Divine</span> rule, is to
misunderstand its <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t24 t25 t26 t28 t29 hoverable">whole</span> significance more
deplorably almost than this unfortunate result

can be accomplished by any other
misunderstanding. The essence of many religious
conceptions may still be retained in our thought,
even when their ecclesiastical presentation is
put from us as out of date, and the complete
grasp of the ideas I have been endeavouring, in
the course of this essay, to suggest - thoughts
so subtle that their clear presentation is a
<span class="t25 hoverable">matter</span> of extreme difficulty - will, for example,
help to emphasize, rather than to discredit, one
of the most beautiful phrases that can be
borrowed from the literature of early religion.
For our <span class="t8 t11 t14 t19 hoverable">free</span> will, with the help of improved
enlightenment, may enable us, in conformity with
the reign of <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t11 t13 t14 t15 t16 t18 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">law</span> on the moral plane, to vindicate
the profound <span class="t0 t2 t3 t4 t5 t7 t8 t9 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">truth</span> that <span class="t8 t11 t14 t19 hoverable">free</span> will, itself, is an
element of Divinity <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t7 t8 t11 t12 t13 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t25 t29 hoverable">within</span> our own nature, a
<span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">power</span> which may render us, each in our turn,
capable, in a certain sense, of rising above all
law, constrained <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">though</span> we may be, by relative
insignificance, to obey it for a time. I do not
mean that any <span class="t8 t11 t14 t19 hoverable">free</span> will of <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">man</span> can countervail
any detail of the moral <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t11 t13 t14 t15 t16 t18 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">law</span> pervading the system
to which we belong; but just as a clear
comprehension of <span class="t1 hoverable">physical</span> <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t11 t13 t14 t15 t16 t18 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">law</span> enables us to <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">work</span>
out results on the <span class="t1 hoverable">physical</span> plane, of which we
may be definitely regarded as the authors, so the
ultimate comprehension of the loftier <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t11 t13 t14 t15 t16 t18 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">law</span> will
enable us, if that figure of speech be
permissable, to ascend to regions of <span class="t11 t16 hoverable">existence</span> in
which we shall transcend its operation,
vindicating that old familiar phrase, in my <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">mind</span>
a moment ago, that in Divinity itself - not
merely in the sphere of manifestation on which
our potentialities may be developed - "we live
and move and have our being."

THE <span class="t1 t5 t11 t16 hoverable">HIGHER</span> OCCULTISM
THE instruction given in ancient Greece to those
who <span class="t0 t7 t11 t13 t14 t22 t23 t27 t28 hoverable">took</span> part in the meetings at Eleusis celebrated in history as the Eleusinian Mysteries
- related, as we have abundant <span class="t1 t3 t8 t25 hoverable">reason</span> to believe,
to super-physical <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">knowledge</span> concerning the <span class="t1 t5 t11 t16 hoverable">higher</span>
planes of Nature, of the kind that has been
freely promulgated amongst us in recent years.
Such <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">knowledge</span> is that with which we are engaged
in our study of the <span class="t1 t5 t11 t16 hoverable">Higher</span> Occultism. The eager
pursuit of super-physical <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">knowledge</span> has been a
leading characteristic of civilized <span class="t14 t24 hoverable">intelligence</span>
for the last fifty years, <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t7 t8 t11 t12 t13 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t25 t29 hoverable">within</span> which <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">time</span>
multitudes have come to know that communication
between this plane of <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">life</span> and that to which
humanity passes after the <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t29 hoverable">death</span> of the <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">body</span> is
possible. But the <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">great</span> movement - having a wider
scope than that which, importance as its
influence has been, is narrowed to the
consideration of experiences immediately
following the <span class="t1 hoverable">physical</span> <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">life</span> - the study of the
<span class="t1 t5 t11 t16 hoverable">Higher</span> Occultism with which we are now concerned,
originated with the Theosophical Society, the
branches of which spread now over the <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t24 t25 t26 t28 t29 hoverable">whole</span>
world. This <span class="t1 hoverable">Society</span> was, at all events as regards
this country, the channel through which recent
enlightenment has been poured, and this it
becomes necessary to glance back over the history
of the current movement in <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t29 hoverable">order</span> to appreciate
the importance of the <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">work</span> it has been priviliged
to accomplish, as also in <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t29 hoverable">order</span> to appreciate the
dignity of the task which lies before it. And to
do this effectually it is necessary to look back
even farther than to those earlier beginnings of
modern civilization when the <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">knowledge</span> that we
have been enabled to handle so freely was already
in the possession of a few, but guarded for these
few, in accordance with what was then held to be
imperative necessity, by secrecy of the most
rigid order.
At a period <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t24 t26 t27 t29 hoverable">long</span> anterior to the establishment of

the Eleusinian Mysteries, similar teaching was
undoubtedly conveyed to students of Occultism
attached to Egyptian temples, and what we know
now enables us to realize that there never has
been a <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">time</span> in the history of mankind during
which the evolving race was <span class="t3 t13 t18 t24 hoverable">left</span> entirely <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">without</span>
guidance from those by whom the <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">great</span> laws
governing the <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t24 t25 t26 t28 t29 hoverable">whole</span> evolution were correctly
understood. In the childhood of the race, indeed,
as we are now in a position to apprehend so
clearly, such <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">knowledge</span> was only possessed by
representatives of a more advanced evolution,
trusted, under <span class="t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">Divine</span> Providence, with the
regulation of the <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t24 t25 t26 t28 t29 hoverable">whole</span> undertaking - with the
nurture and education of the new race of which
they were in charge. But gradually, as the more
advanced representatives of this race attained
something resembling maturity of intelligence, a
few amongst them, qualified by exceptionally
rapid advancement, were priviliged to share in
the <span class="t12 t20 t25 t26 t29 hoverable">wisdom</span> of their preceptors. In this way,
<span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">without</span> having any detailed <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">knowledge</span> of the
manner in which the progress was accomplished, we
can appreciate, <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">without</span> the least shadow of
uncertainty, the <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">way</span> in which the initiated
adepts of our own <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t26 t27 t29 hoverable">human</span> family first became
organized as a distinct association, qualified by
degrees to assume the responsibilities originally
belonging to the representatives of the superior
race <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">whose</span> contact with humanity is dimly
suggested in history by vague traditions of
<span class="t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">Divine</span> Kings. But for many milleniums the Adepts
of our humanity held it to be premature to share
their <span class="t12 t20 t25 t26 t29 hoverable">wisdom</span> with the indiscrminate multitude.
The Occult student is enabled to appreciate the
considerations which induced them to maintain
this reserve. All <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">knowledge</span> in varying degrees,
according to its importance, is associated with
varying degrees of moral responsibility. Putting
the idea in language with which most of us are
now familiar, the Karma of action, distinctly at
variance with the loftier purposes of <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t5 t7 t8 t9 t11 t12 t13 t14 t16 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t29 hoverable">spiritual</span>
evolution, becomes terribly emphasized when such

action is realized by the agent as in conflict
with the <span class="t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">Divine</span> purpose. This idea is susceptible
of elaborate expansion, but in its simplest <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t10 t11 t12 t13 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t29 hoverable">form</span>
is the vindication of that policy of secrecy as
applied to super-physical <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">knowledge</span> which some of
us familiar with the publicity rightly attached
to the progress of discovery in <span class="t1 hoverable">physical</span> science,
are sometimes disposed to resent. Dealing,
however, for the moment merely with the course of
events, we have to recognize that all information
accessible to <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t26 t27 t29 hoverable">human</span> research connected with those
<span class="t1 t5 t11 t16 hoverable">higher</span> planes of Nature, concerning which we are
now able to <span class="t9 t11 t20 t21 t22 t23 t27 hoverable">speak</span> so freely, was as a <span class="t25 hoverable">matter</span> of
<span class="t24 hoverable">fact</span> guarded from public dissemination by the
vows which, until very recently, precluded an
initiate from disclosing the secrets of
initiation.
But we are now enabled to realize that <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">knowledge</span>
formerly included amongst the secrets of
initiation is <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">knowledge</span> of a kind which, sooner
or later, every <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t26 t27 t29 hoverable">human</span> being must possess as a
condition providing for his progress along the
path of evolution marked out for him by the <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">great</span>
design. To appreciate the <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">true</span> importance of that
<span class="t1 t5 t11 t16 hoverable">Higher</span> Occultism with the study of which we are
now concerned, it is necessary that the <span class="t5 hoverable">full</span>
significance of the idea I have just endeavoured
to express should be grasped by everyone who
takes part in such <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">work</span> as that we have now in
hand. Earlier impressions with reference to the
teaching conferred on students of Occultism in
former ages, are generally to the effect that
such teaching must have been intensely
interesting, that it invested the possessor with
powers of a kind unfamiliar to ordinary life,
that it was something so desirable in itself that
no personal sacrifices were allowed to stand in
the <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">way</span> of those who aspired to it, that no
perils daunted them, that no temptations of a
wordly <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">nature</span> could turn them aside from its
pursuit. All such conceptions were perfectly
sound as far as they went, but they failed

entirely to interpret the <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">great</span> primary motive
that inspired those who pursued occult <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">knowledge</span>
with a correct appreciation of all that its
acquisition signified. It is <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">true</span> that the Adept
and, in a lesser degree, those who are advancing
along the path leading to adeptship, acquire
<span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">knowledge</span> of transcendent interest, and powers
the dignity of which cannot easily be
exaggerated. But these rewards are not those
which the enlightened aspirant for adeptship is
seeking in his <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t24 t26 t27 t29 hoverable">long</span> and laborious efforts to make
progress in that direction. That which he soon
learns to realize, if morally capable of
continuous advance along the path he has chosen,
is suggested by the simple <span class="t0 t2 t3 t4 t5 t7 t8 t9 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">truth</span> that the path
leading to adeptship is the condensed epitome of
the <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t24 t25 t26 t28 t29 hoverable">whole</span> design which <span class="t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">Divine</span> <span class="t12 t20 t25 t26 t29 hoverable">Wisdom</span> has sketched
out on an enormous scale for the ultimate
progress of all humanity. The supreme
achievements of adeptship establish those who
attain it on the moral, intellectual, and
<span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t5 t7 t8 t9 t11 t12 t13 t14 t16 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t29 hoverable">spiritual</span> level which represents the culmination
of all that is possible for the <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t26 t27 t29 hoverable">human</span> race as
such. Occult Science is so concatenated
altogether in its vast entirety, that these <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">great</span>
truths can only be fully grasped by those who
have completely assimilated the teaching now
available for all of us who care to profit by it,
concerning the <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t24 t25 t26 t28 t29 hoverable">whole</span> design in which the <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t26 t27 t29 hoverable">human</span>
race is involved. But all who have profited
effectually by the literature of modern Occultism
will be in a position to appreciate the force of
what I have just said, and even those who as <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">yet</span>
are merely approaching the <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">great</span> study, under the
influence of that sympathetic feeling for it now
so widely diffused, will no doubt be able to
catch the significance of the fundamenal <span class="t0 t2 t3 t4 t5 t7 t8 t9 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">truth</span> I
have endeavoured to express, and will <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">thus</span> be
ready to perceive the manner in which the study
of the conditions leading upwards towards
adeptship casts a flood of <span class="t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">light</span> <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">upon</span> the future
progress of the <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t26 t27 t29 hoverable">human</span> race; while conversely, the
study of the teaching we have been privileged to

receive concerning the future destinies of the
race, will invest progress towards adeptship with
a dignity far greater than that assigned to it at
an earlier period of thought, by observers who
merely supposed that it was aimed at for the sake
of its <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">knowledge</span> and its power.
Reverting now to the course of events, we have to
begin by contemplating the attitude of the
advanced occultist towards the <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">world</span> at large, at
a period anterior to the recent outburst of
specific teaching. Of course it was obvious to
those already on adept levels, at any period of
the past to which we may look back, that sooner
or later the <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">knowledge</span> they so jealously guarded
<span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">would</span> have to be disseminated broadcast
throughout the world. But their <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">knowledge</span> also
enabled them to perceive that the <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t24 t25 t26 t28 t29 hoverable">whole</span>
stupendous scheme of <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t26 t27 t29 hoverable">human</span> evolution was
susceptible of division into <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">two</span> <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">great</span> halves. It
has been the task of modern interpreters of
Occultism to describe the characteristics of
these <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">two</span> <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">great</span> phases of evolution in
considerable detail, and we know that throughout
the first half of the process - frequently
described as the downward arc of evolution - the
<span class="t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">Divine</span> purpose was gradually fulfilled by the
differentiation of the diffused <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t5 t7 t8 t9 t11 t12 t13 t14 t16 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t29 hoverable">spiritual</span> energy
animating the undertaking, into specific centers
of consciousness, these constituting, when
developed, <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t26 t27 t29 hoverable">human</span> Egos, qualified to accumulate
experience through a <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t24 t26 t27 t29 hoverable">long</span> course of successive
incarnations, and gradually to arrive, in that
way, at the midway station of the <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t24 t25 t26 t28 t29 hoverable">whole</span> <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">great</span>
journey, with no other duty, so to speak, up to
that time, than those relating to their own
individualization, to their acquisition of
strength and capacity as separated entities each
conscious of its own interests. Looking back
indeed to earlier races of mankind anterior even
to the mighty Atlantean race immediately
preceding our own, we may realize, almost with
surprise, from our present point of view, that

the most sublime virtue we now are qualified to
admire - and some of us perhaps, in some degree,
qualified to aspire to - the virtue of
unselfishness, did not even dawn as a conception
on the <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t26 t27 t29 hoverable">human</span> <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">mind</span> in the beginning.
On the contrary, there was a stage, during the
progress of humanity along the downward arc, when
selfishness was the <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t11 t13 t14 t15 t16 t18 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">law</span> of progress - of such
progress as was then desired in accordance with
the <span class="t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">Divine</span> purpose. But from the midway stage of
<span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t26 t27 t29 hoverable">human</span> evolution onwards, new conceptions of right
and wrong became possible. Of course the midway
stage was not reached by the <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t24 t25 t26 t28 t29 hoverable">whole</span> <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t26 t27 t29 hoverable">human</span> race
simultaneously, but a considerable <span class="t3 t17 t26 hoverable">number</span> of
millions may have been standing fairly in the
front, by the <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">time</span> the Atlantean race had lived
through half the period of the <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">life</span> assigned to
it. And from that period onward, it became
theoretically possible for those members of the
<span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t26 t27 t29 hoverable">human</span> family who had most completely fulfilled
the programme of <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">Nature</span> up to that <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">time</span> to
appreciate the loftier purposes of the further
evolution awaiting them during the <span class="t2 t3 t5 t10 t12 t18 t19 t21 t24 t25 t26 t27 hoverable">second</span> half of
the <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">great</span> evolutionary process - during the
upward arc leading towards <span class="t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">Divine</span> perfection.
We do not know with precision how soon it became
theoretically possible for the most advanced
members of our own family to receive, from the
superior teachers who preceded them, the
<span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">knowledge</span> which we now handle so freely and
describe as the <span class="t1 t5 t11 t16 hoverable">Higher</span> Occultism; but at all
events, during the latter half of the Atlantean
race some members of our own <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t26 t27 t29 hoverable">human</span> family were
enabled to appreciate the lofty design sketched
out for their advancement, to detach themselves
from the chaotic throng of their self-seeking
contemporaries, and to establish here and there,
even in that early world, centres of initiation
from which their influence began in a faint,
diluted fashion to radiate through the world, and
towards which those <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">whose</span> spontaneous interior

progress had invested them with appropriate
qualifications were drawn into the paths of
<span class="t1 t5 t11 t16 hoverable">higher</span> knowledge. But millenniums had to
accumulate until thousands were no longer
adequate to record the progress of the years,
before the adept fraternity could contemplate the
possibility of disseminating the <span class="t12 t20 t25 t26 t29 hoverable">wisdom</span> they
possessed broadcast through the world. Some
elevated moral principles, as the progress of
mankind along the upward arc proceeded, were of a
kind which it was possible to convey with safety
to the multitude, and that possibility found its
expression in the fondation of all the <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">great</span>
religions of the <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">world</span> which have emanated, as we
see now <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">without</span> the possibility of mistake, from
the <span class="t12 t20 t25 t26 t29 hoverable">wisdom</span> of early adeptship. That suggesion
need not be held at variance with the belief
which assigns a <span class="t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">Divine</span> origin to some religions
of the kind referred to. <span class="t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">Divine</span> purposes are
worked out in all cases through subordinate
agencies, and the comprehension of this, in many
ways, is one of the illuminating discoveries that
we are enabled to reach through the study of
Occultism. But at all events, those who
appreciate the <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t5 t7 t8 t9 t11 t12 t13 t14 t16 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t29 hoverable">spiritual</span> and educational
blessings conferred on humanity by religion, may
readily erect on that primary belief the further
conception that at a certain stage of <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t26 t27 t29 hoverable">human</span>
progress specific <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">knowledge</span> of <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t5 t7 t8 t9 t11 t12 t13 t14 t16 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t29 hoverable">spiritual</span> science
may, <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">without</span> offending against the dignity of
religion, be super-added to it. And what we know
now is that for some centuries, adept observers
of <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t26 t27 t29 hoverable">human</span> growth in this fifth race of ours - the
first beyond the Atlantean on the upward arc of
evolution - have been on the watch for
indications which may show that an adequate
<span class="t3 t17 t26 hoverable">number</span> of those <span class="t3 t13 t18 t24 hoverable">left</span> hitherto to the simpler
influence and guidance of religious thought,
might become qualified for the reception in its
entirety, or at all events, in considerable
measure, of that <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t5 t7 t8 t9 t11 t12 t13 t14 t16 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t29 hoverable">spiritual</span> science from which
religion, in the first instance, had its rise.

We can see now, looking back 100, 200, or even
300 years, that some experiments were made by the
adept experts of this science, to ascertain
<span class="t10 t12 t16 t20 t21 t25 t26 t27 hoverable">whether</span> amongst ordinary humanity <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">people</span> were
ripe for <span class="t1 t5 t11 t16 hoverable">higher</span> teaching in a sufficient degree
to justify its public dissemination. To trace the
details of these experiments <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">would</span> be a
considerable task by itself, which indeed some of
us have attempted to carry out by studying the
<span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">life</span> histories of distinguished occultists
throughout the Middle Ages. But passing over
that, for the moment, we have to recognize that
until our own <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">time</span> such experiments were held to
be unsuccessful, and so we come at last - along
the train of <span class="t1 t2 t3 t5 t6 t7 t8 t10 t12 t14 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t25 t26 t29 hoverable">thought</span> I have been following - to
an intelligent comprehension of the circumstances
that prompted the recent outburst of teaching
from adept sources. That teaching embodied in the
earliest Theosophical books was itself
experimental in its inception, but unlike
previous attempts of a similar character, was
crowned with success. Sufficient numbers of
<span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">people</span> in the modern <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">world</span> - or leaving out of
<span class="t3 t4 t5 t7 t8 t10 t12 t16 t19 t21 t24 t25 t26 t29 hoverable">account</span> whatever has been done in the East, I may
fairly say in this modern European <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">world</span> of ours
- have shown themselves entitled, by the
readiness of their appreciation, to receive
occult teaching in such abundant volume, that we
stand now in a position, in that respect, of
intellectual advancement, far exceeding the
corresponding position reached by those who, as a
privilige individually earned and guarded by vows
of secrecy, were taught something of the <span class="t1 t5 t11 t16 hoverable">Higher</span>
Occultism when the Mysteries were celebrated at
Eleusis.

THE OBJECTS OF THE THEOSOPHICAL
<span class="t1 hoverable">SOCIETY</span>
1. - THEOSOPHICAL "BROTHERHOOD"

FROM <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">time</span> to <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">time</span> we may usefully review the
gradually improving conceptions we have been
enabled to <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t10 t11 t12 t13 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t29 hoverable">form</span> concerning the grand purposes
underlying the Theosophical Movement. The phrases
in which these were ultimately crystallized do
not (though this matters little) reflect the
ideas present to the minds of those who, in 1875,
did actually, in a certain sense, "found" the
Society. At that <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">time</span> it was the result of
interest excited among a small group of persons
frequenting Madame Blavatsky's rooms in New York,
by the exhibition of her wonderful Occult powers.
As Colonel Olcott explains in his Diary Leaves a
lecture was given in September, 1875, at Madame
Blavatsky's rooms by a certain Mr. Felt, of whom
we lose sight afterwards, on the Adept Magic of
Egyptian priests. Colonel Olcott then suggested
the formation of a <span class="t1 hoverable">Society</span> to study this subject.
That was done, and <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">though</span> the title
"Theosophical" was adopted (doubtless under
occult guidance), Colonel Olcott at one <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">time</span>
proposed to <span class="t3 t11 t18 t27 hoverable">call</span> it a "Miracle Club."
The <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">word</span> "Brotherhood" does not creep into its
records till some <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">years</span> later. It was first <span class="t4 hoverable">used</span>
by Mr.C.C.Massey and his friends in London when
they formed a British branch of the New York
Society. They described its purpose as being "to
discover the <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">nature</span> and powers of the <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t26 t27 t29 hoverable">human</span>
soul," and they <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t9 t10 t11 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">went</span> on to declare that they
believed in "a <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">great</span> intelligent First Cause and
in the <span class="t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">Divine</span> sonship of the <span class="t0 t1 t2 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">spirit</span> of Man, and
hence in the immortality of that <span class="t0 t1 t2 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">spirit</span> and in
the universal Brotherhood of the <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t26 t27 t29 hoverable">human</span> race."
Colonel Olcott <span class="t0 t7 t11 t13 t14 t22 t23 t27 t28 hoverable">took</span> this hint and developed the
idea in a new statement of subjects as follows:
"(1) The study of Occult Science; (2) the

formation of a nucleus of universal brotherhood;
(3) the revival of Oriental literature." The <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">word</span>
"brotherhood" was afterwards shifted into the
first place, but it was always accompanied by the
qualifying term "Nucleus." It was not used, and
should never be used, by Theosophists with the
significance attached to it by those concerned
with mundane politics or social reconstruction on
the <span class="t1 hoverable">physical</span> plane. The <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">word</span> in its theosophical
<span class="t1 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t17 t18 t19 t24 t25 t26 t28 t29 hoverable">meaning</span> refers to the Unity of <span class="t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">Divine</span>
<span class="t1 t7 t9 t12 t14 t19 t29 hoverable">consciousness</span> on lofty planes of Nature, and to
the nucleus for the reflection of that Unity on
the <span class="t1 hoverable">physical</span> plane that may be formed by
theosophical students who appreciate the teaching
aright.
The gross democratic <span class="t1 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t17 t18 t19 t24 t25 t26 t28 t29 hoverable">meaning</span> attached to the term
"brotherhood" is an insult to theosophical
teaching. The <span class="t1 t7 t9 t12 t14 t19 t29 hoverable">consciousness</span> which expands into
perfected humanity is, no doubt, in a subtle
metaphysical <span class="t0 t2 t3 t4 t5 t8 t10 t17 t19 t25 t26 hoverable">sense</span> identical in its <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">nature</span> with
the <span class="t1 t7 t9 t12 t14 t19 t29 hoverable">consciousness</span> not merely of the humbler
classes in civilized countries, but with that
also of the crocodile, the dog, the Australian
savage, and the <span class="t0 t2 t5 t7 t12 t17 t19 t20 t27 t29 hoverable">Master</span> of Wisdom. But this does
not mean that all manifested <span class="t1 t7 t9 t12 t14 t19 t29 hoverable">consciousness</span> in
whatever vehicle we <span class="t11 t12 t22 t25 t27 hoverable">find</span> it is, therefore,
invested with equal claims on our respect. It is
invested with equal claims on our sympathy, and
that is how <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">people</span> who do not appreciate subtle
distinctions drift into the misuse of the term
"brotherhood." If the sheep and the guinea-pig
are included in the universal brotherhood, <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">well</span>
and good, but we do not ask the sheep and the
guinea-pig to contribute their opinions to
discussion of the suffrage question, for example.
And that <span class="t1 t2 t3 t5 t6 t7 t8 t10 t12 t14 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t25 t26 t29 hoverable">thought</span> is a clue to the fallacy
involved in regarding theosophical brotherhood as
leading to political socialism. Theosophical
teaching concerning <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t26 t27 t29 hoverable">human</span> evolution shows us the
<span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t26 t27 t29 hoverable">human</span> family at present at very different stages
of development. It rescues us from the oldfashioned blunder - arising from the ignorant

delusion that each new child is a new <span class="t1 t2 t3 t5 t9 t12 t15 t16 t17 t19 t22 t24 t25 t26 hoverable">creation</span> to the effect that all have equal rights.
According to a phrase classical in political
writing, all are equally entitled to "life,
liberty, and the pursuit of happiness," but with
very varied claims on the privilege of shaping
laws providing for the fufilment of that
fundamental idea.
Thus, to let the formula in which the objects of
the Theosophical <span class="t1 hoverable">Society</span> are generally expressed
distort the purpose of the movement to suit the
purpose of any mundane theory of social reform is
a very grevious blunder. From the beginning all
qualified exponents of the Theosophical Movement
have warned us to keep clear of all political
contamination. The <span class="t1 hoverable">Society</span> may include persons of
very varied political opinions, but <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t7 t8 t11 t12 t13 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t25 t29 hoverable">within</span> the
<span class="t1 hoverable">Society</span> their only duty is to study and promote
the study of the super-physical <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t5 t7 t8 t9 t11 t12 t13 t14 t16 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t29 hoverable">spiritual</span> science
gradually unfolded for our benefit and through us
for the benefit of all mankind. The fulfilment of
that duty should be compatible with perfect
harmony of feeling <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t7 t8 t11 t12 t13 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t25 t29 hoverable">within</span> the Society, where it
is needless and undesirable to discuss varied
beliefs as to how the <span class="t1 hoverable">physical</span> welfare of the
community may be best promoted. We should not
furnish unsympathetic critics of our real <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">work</span>
with an excuse for pretending to regard us as a
<span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">body</span> of <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">people</span> entangled with questionable
schemes for subversive changes on the <span class="t1 hoverable">physical</span>
plane.
2. - THE STUDY OF COMPARATIVE RELIGIONS
By those who concern themselves with it, this
<span class="t2 t3 t5 t10 t12 t18 t19 t21 t24 t25 t26 t27 hoverable">second</span> "object" is liable to be misunderstood. By
a larger <span class="t3 t17 t26 hoverable">number</span> it is disregarded. It has a very
definite purpose really. Briefly stated, that is,
to <span class="t4 t6 t7 t9 t12 t13 t14 t15 t17 t18 t20 t22 t23 t24 t26 t27 hoverable">bring</span> out by such study the <span class="t24 hoverable">fact</span> that at the
basis of all religions worth talking of there are
certain fundamental ideas, more or less vaguely

hinted at, which are clearly <span class="t0 t2 t3 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">set</span> forth in
Theosophical teaching. Theosophical writers have
sometimes too emphatically emphasized the idea
that Theosophy is not a religion. Of course it is
not, in the <span class="t0 t2 t3 t4 t5 t8 t10 t17 t19 t25 t26 hoverable">sense</span> that it has no hard and fast
creed of the kind that most religions adopt. But
no one who really understands Theosophical
teaching is in need of any other religion. A real
comprehension of the <span class="t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">Divine</span> Hierarchy, and of the
laws governing <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t26 t27 t29 hoverable">human</span> evolution, covers the <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t12 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t24 t25 t26 t28 t29 hoverable">whole</span>
area of <span class="t1 t2 t3 t5 t6 t7 t8 t10 t12 t14 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t25 t26 t29 hoverable">thought</span> and emotion which any religion at
its best can cover (besides covering a <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">good</span> deal
more). Not on that <span class="t3 t4 t5 t7 t8 t10 t12 t16 t19 t21 t24 t25 t26 t29 hoverable">account</span> will any <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">true</span>
Theosophist repudiate any religion with which by
race or nationality he may be traditionally
connected. Here we have a very pretty subtlety to
consider. If any Theosophist identified race,
residence, and habits of <span class="t1 t2 t3 t5 t6 t7 t8 t10 t12 t14 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t25 t26 t29 hoverable">thought</span> with this
country is asked the question, "Are you a
Christian?" what should he answer? To say "No"
(because in his inner <span class="t1 t7 t9 t12 t14 t19 t29 hoverable">consciousness</span> he felt that
occult <span class="t12 t20 t25 t26 t29 hoverable">wisdom</span> superseded all religions having a
definite name) <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">would</span> be misleading and in bad
taste. My answer in such a <span class="t1 t3 t5 t16 t19 t25 hoverable">case</span> <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">would</span> be,
"Certainly; of course I am." I might go on to
explain that I had no sympathy with the
caricature of Christianity provided for us by
most of the European Churches, but that <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">would</span>
only be possible if the conversation were
protracted.
The idea to enforce is, that any one who takes up
any particular religion and makes a close study
of that, embellishing its crudities as far as he
can by the results of his own thinking, is not
doing anything which resembles the fulfilment of
the <span class="t2 t3 t5 t10 t12 t18 t19 t21 t24 t25 t26 t27 hoverable">second</span> <span class="t2 hoverable">object</span> of the Society. On the
contrary, he is pressing against it. The more he
succeeds in recommending to respect and attention
any particular religion in preference to others,
the more he is tending to defeat the <span class="t2 t3 t5 t10 t12 t18 t19 t21 t24 t25 t26 t27 hoverable">second</span>
<span class="t2 hoverable">object</span> of the Society, the grand underlying
purpose of which - veiled rather than fully

expressed by the formal enumeration of objects is to convey to the large numbers of <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">people</span> now
fit to receive it, the magnificent volume of
<span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">knowledge</span> concerning <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t5 t7 t8 t9 t11 t12 t13 t14 t16 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t29 hoverable">spiritual</span> <span class="t0 t2 t3 t4 t5 t7 t8 t9 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">truth</span> hitherto in
the exclusive possession of the Elder Brethen of
humanity.
This could not have been done at a much earlier
period. Clumsy religions, brutal bigotry, atheism
(the result of disgust developed among the most
intelligent by the stupidity of priests and
clergy), all stood in the way. But the experiment
was made in these latter years, and has been
justified by partial success. Multitudes all over
the <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">world</span> do appreciate the gift of occult
knowledge. Of course, besides these, many rush in
<span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">without</span> understanding the real purpose of the
movement, caught by some phrase associated with
it, into which they read their own
prepossessions. They may impede the progress of
the <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">great</span> <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">work</span> for a time, but there are forces
behind this that must prevail in the end. Far
beyond the limits of the <span class="t1 hoverable">Society</span> the fascination
of occult teaching is spreading through the
cultured classes. To that growth we must look
forward with confident hope, even if we, or some
of us, get a little out of patience with mistaken
ideas permeating the <span class="t1 hoverable">Society</span> at this early stage
of its existence. The Theosophical Movement is
much bigger than the Theosophical Society, which
must undergo <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">great</span> purification if it is, in
future years, destined to lead the Theosophical
Movement. The movement itself is pressing towards
a period when advanced thinkers will not be
comparing medieval religions, but will be
comparing whichever of these appeals best to
their sympathies, with the grand <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t5 t7 t8 t9 t11 t12 t13 t14 t16 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t29 hoverable">spiritual</span> truths
conveyed to them by the theosophical revelation recasting their favourite religion, if they cling
to it at all, in harmony with these truths. At
the end there will be many who <span class="t11 t12 t22 t25 t27 hoverable">find</span> in the
teaching which we still <span class="t3 t11 t18 t27 hoverable">call</span> "occult" all the
religion they need. Others will prefer to

decorate it with some of the phraseology of their
earlier faith. <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">Thus</span> ceremonial religions will
survive by their various names, and in the midst
of all there will be a central block of thinkers,
more or less indifferent to ceremonial, who will
be content to <span class="t3 t11 t18 t27 hoverable">call</span> themselves "Theosophists,"
pure and simple. But the same ideas will permeate
all groups, and <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">great</span> progress will then have
been made in the development of that
"brotherhood" the "nucleus" of which we, who
understand our task, are <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">called</span> <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">upon</span> to "form" at
this commencement of the stupendous religious
construction, the beautiful results of which
those adequately gifted with foresight can
discern beyond the horizon.
3. - THE POWERS LATENT IN <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">MAN</span>
The <span class="t7 hoverable">third</span> <span class="t2 hoverable">object</span> of the <span class="t1 hoverable">Society</span> is less liable to
be misunderstood than either the first or second,
but is perhaps the most important, and, like any
other idea expressed in concise language, is open
to various interpretations. It is formally stated
in these terms: "To investigate the unexplained
laws of <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">Nature</span> and the powers latent in Man."
These <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">words</span> properly understood may be held to
inaugurate the study of an entirely new science.
The mistake sometimes made is to suppose that
they merely prescribe an attempt to cultivate
hitherto undeveloped faculties theoretically
latent in each of us. That, in most cases, <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">would</span>
prove an extremely unsatisfying or disappointing
pursuit. Most <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">people</span> of this age and race have
come into the present <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">life</span> <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">without</span> the
potentiality of such development in themselves.
As with every other attribute we possess the
potentiality of psychic perception can only exist
as the product of some effort made in a former
life. Many theosophists accept en bloc the theory
of Karma, and at once proceed to ignore it when
they think of themselves. They are too often
encouraged to do this by <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">people</span> endowed with

psychic faculties who <span class="t11 t12 t22 t25 t27 hoverable">find</span> these so natural and
easily <span class="t4 hoverable">used</span> that they cannot help thinking that
anyone might acquire them by working for that end
with sufficient earnestness of purpose. Volumes
(reckoning such writing in the aggregate) have
ben <span class="t0 t11 t24 hoverable">written</span> to assure candidates for psychic
development that if they will only "lead the
life" - be ascetics in the <span class="t25 hoverable">matter</span> of food, drink,
etc., etc. - they will be able to verify
Theosophical teaching for themselves. One might
just as <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">well</span> tell a weak, undersized boy that by
eating underdone beefsteaks and using the
dumbbells he <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">would</span> make himself able to go into
the ring and beat a prize-fighter. The boy's
Karma has not endowed him with an athletic body,
and he must be content to <span class="t4 t18 hoverable">use</span> it for pursuits it
is adapted to deal with.
Of course it is <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">true</span> that there are cases in
which partially endowed persons may greatly
stimulate their latent faculties. It is only a
question of their Karmic condition. There are all
degrees of this condition to consider. At one end
of the scale we have <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">people</span> who are naturally
psychic from childhood onwards, and who, if they
<span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">take</span> pains, develop into <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">great</span> clairvoyants and
seers in mature life. At the other end of the
scale we have those who, however gifted
intellectually, morally, and physically, have no
glimmering of psychic faculty and could not
develop that even if they made the struggle to do
so the passion of a lifetime and ruined their
health by asceticism. Between these <span class="t0 t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 t6 t7 t8 t9 t10 t11 t12 t13 t14 t15 t16 t17 t18 t19 t20 t21 t22 t23 t24 t25 t26 t27 t28 t29 hoverable">two</span> extremes
there are all varieties of condition, and in some
of these appropriate effort may give rise to
results. I will only add, as a personal
